Décor ya mabaya ya blond ekitisaka motema mingi, sake ya premium eza malamu mingi mpe mosala eza malamu mingi.

Nayebi esika mpe bato oyo bosengeli koya awa te mpo na romantic, ya kobenda likebi ya ambiance to service mitano ya minzoto oyo eza na sommlier mpe maze ya mindondo ya kapitene mpe ya nsima ya bato oyo basalaka na restora - oyaka mpo na bilei ya solo, makambo oyo esepelisaka yango, ndenge makambo ezalaka.

Maponi na ngai eza: - Scallion Pancake (oyo batɔkisi na jus ya ndunda, ya ntina mingi mpe ya elɛngi) - Guizhou Chicken - Shredded Squid Family Style (moko ya biloko oyo nalingaka mingi) - Sichuan Spicy Soft Shell Crab - Shuizhu Fish (oyo eza mpo na bato ya makasi ya Sichuan oyo balingaka bilei, nakoki te kolendisa baninga na ngai ya Amerika mpo eza pilipili mingi.
Ndakisa eza supu oyo ezalaki pene ya 6 oz na dolare 12 mpe mayebo esika $12 mpona pene ya 1oz.

Nasengeli kokebisa motángi ete bonene ya biteni eza moke mpenza (mingimingi ba appetizer), yango wana soki oza na likanisi ya kolya kino ekotonda mpe oza te na likanisi ya kosenga menu ya sipesiale ya sipesiale ya chef, komibongisa mpo na kosomba mpe kofuta appetizer (1 elubu mpo na moto mokomoko mpo biteni na yango eza te mpo na kokabola),  Entrée ya monene, mpe udon ya malili na nsuka ya bilei.
Bilei eyaki nsima ya miniti 20 nsima ya kobenga ngai, malili mpe soggy.
Tolyaki awa na sanza ya misato, 2006 mpe tosɛngaki bolei ya liboso ya teyatre ya 3-course na mpepo ya vinyo.

Ata badolare 20 ya entrée ezalaka ntalo mingi te, na New York City, eza mpenza na bilei ya malamu koleka na molongo wana, mpe yango wana Sapphire, atako eza kitoko na mopepe, na ntembe te ekozala te restora oyo nakozonga.
Kasi thai eza mpenza monene te -- bland mpe ekesenisami te.
Kasi eloko oyo ngai ná mwasi na ngai tozalaki koyina ezalaki makasi mpenza mpe ezalaki koyoka lokola 'bar' to 'pub'.
Ba-server mosusu esalaka ete omona lokola nde bazali kosala yo malamu mpo omemela yo bilei.
Mpo na kobanda, bayebisaki biso ete etikali miniti 30 mpe tobandaki kokende, ntango bato oyo bayambaki biso balobaki ete bakobenga biso na telefone na biso ya mabɔkɔ ntango mesa ebongisamaki.
Atako tozalaki koluka saladi ya mokolo na mokolo mpe mwa mbuma ya mbuma oyo tozalaki kozwa ezalaki malamu mingi.
Mopepe eza malamu mingi soki ozali koluka esika ya nsima ya mosala mpe lolenge ya ntalo moke ya kolekisa nsima ya midi ya wikende.
Bankolo mpe bato ya mosala bazalaka na boboto mpe pizza na bango ezali kitoko mingi.
Ive asengaki mosali moko ya cart azwa lokasa ya lotus oyo azingaki loso mpe azongisaki loso na nsima mpe autaki kolongwa wana.
Mbala mingi bilei ezalaka malamu kasi ya solo eza te esika ya kopema ya kokende.
Heureusement tobikisaki esika mpo na BBQ Salmon, Sea Bass mpe Crispy Duck.
Na boumeli ya bambula, ezalaki ntango nyonso kopesa bilei mpe vinyo ya malamu mpenza.
Menu ya vinyo ya nkasa misato, lokasa moko entrée mpe horedevous.
Once mpo na kolya mpe mbala moko mpo na brunch.
Nalingi nde kolya.

Nazali kokamwa na botaleli ya babola- namoni esika oyo ya kozala ya kotelema ya Italie na esika oyo etondi na talo ya Italie- talo ya minene, mopepe ya malamu, mosala ya malamu mpe liste ya vinyo ya kokamwa.
Bapesaka menu ya ndenge moko kasi baza na masanga ya bozalisi oyo etondi na masanga mpe bankombo ya matama -- kasi bafutaka yo mbongo.
Mpo tozalaki na reservation te, tokokaki kaka kofanda na jardin ya nsima, kasi ezalaki malamu mingi, ezalaki mosika mpe ezalaki kokoka na bileko ya kitoko.

Sushi ezalaki banda na mwayene kino na nse ya mwayene, mosala ya kozela ezalaka ntango nyonso sub-par mopepe elongwaka na kitoko kino na kosilikisa mpenza (soki ofandi na esika wana koleka kuku, ba acousitcs ezalaka horrid, eloko nyonso ezoyokana ezalaka makasi mpenza).
Bonne fêtes bisous bisous - Sara
Lokola tomonaki Ping's na internet, tokɔtaki na ba qualm kasi mbala moko batyaki biso na pete na matanga ya mbisi oyo epesaka yo mbote ntango u ezotambola.
Ndɛkɛ yango ezalaki kitoko mpe ezalaki ndenge mosusu te mpe pasta ezalaki na elɛngi mingi.
Bilei ezalaki ya sika te, supu ezalaki bland mpe ezalaki na mafuta mingi.
Service eza ya boninga, talo eza malamu - ngonga ya kokabola ezalaki mwa malembe, kasi mpona ndenge pizza oyo eza na elɛngi, nandimi kobosana yango.
Moto oyo azalaki kotɛka masanga na mobembo na ngai ya nsuka ezalaki mpenza bonkonde na boye ete nakozonga lisusu te.
Menu ya takeout elobi ete osengeli kokeba na menu oyo ebakisami oyo ezali kopesa bilei mingi ya italie, nakoki kozela te!
Mpona bilei minene ya Chinois oyo eza pene, ozali na Wu Liang Ye na Grand Sichuan kaka na bloke moko oyo eza mosika.
Bato ya mosala bazalaki na mosala mingi ya kosɛnga sushi mpo na kolya mpe na nsima bazalaki kotanda yango mpo na kolya na bar mpo ata komemela ngai chèque na ngai.
Nazalaki awa nsima ya mwa baposo mpe tozalaki na makambo ya mabe mpenza ya kosalisa bakiliya na restora moko boye.
KOBOMBA makambo te, batoli ya ntalo mingi mpe makambo oyo ezali kotungisa bato te.
Elɛngi yango esalaka ete monɔkɔ na yo ezala mai mingi koleka.
kasi, mosala nde etikaka elɛngi ya mabe na monɔkɔ na ngai.
Longola mosala ya crappy oyo euti na bato mibale, eza malamu mingi.
Bato oyo bazalaki kosala na restora batyaki likebi te longola kaka ete mobeko yango ekómaki na mesa liboso tósilisa biso.
Esika eza ya kitoko, ya mikolo oyo pe ya kosakana pe nakozonga lisusu mbala na mbala.
Mbala mingi nakendaka kuna na nsima na butu soki nabimi na mosala yango wana nasengeli te kobunda na ebele ya bato to na milɔngɔ.
Libungutulu yango ezali moke, biloko yango ezali kobima sika mpe basali bazali boboto.
Na kotaláká zingazinga, namonaki shambre moko etondi na bato ya New York bazali kolya bilei ya solo na restora ya solo, kasi te ndako ya clubhouse ya bato ya mobulu oyo bazalaki koluka komonana.
Tosukisaki eksperiansi na biso monene na kozala na Gulab Jamun (dessert) oyo mopesi - bilei alendisaki ye.
Na boumeli ya basanza 3 oyo eleki, molakisi mpe bato ya mosala babongwanaki mpe ezalaki te mpo na makambo ya malamu.
Mingi mpenza azalaki kolinga nsoso tikka mpe naan, mpe dals.
Bilei ezali kobenda likebi ya bato ya lokumu ya scrumptious bombay style chaat na ndakisa bhelpuri, sevpuri mpe samosa chaats, mpe baappetizer mosusu ya minene ya Inde.
Nayebi te soki nakoki kobenga bilei awa ya Inde mpo eza bosangani ya oyo ezomonana neti eza ya Lifalanse na eloko ya Inde to ya exotic.

Bilubu oyo bazalaki kopesa ezalaki ya ndenge mosusu, elɛngi mingi mpe ya sika oyo eutaki na ba boudin ya mwana mpate, sardines oyo eza na bisikiti, shrimp ya monene ya mobimba na crème pistachio ya kokamwa (oyo eleki malamu mpe ya sika oyo nasalá naino te).
Nazalaki na bilei ya nsɔmɔ, mpe server na biso etambwisaki biso na vinyo moko ya kitoko mpenza na ntalo na biso, na esika epesa biso nzela ya kosomba vinyo ya ntalo ndenge moko oyo ezalaki malamu te.
Basali ya kozela bazalaka kitoko, esengo, mpe mpo na eteni eleki kitoko (na ndenge ya kitoko ya kitoko ya esthétiques, te na ndenge wana azali s-way-cuter-than-me-that-b@#$* way).
Bolei ya butu makasi na butu ya mokolo ya pɔsɔ.
Basali bazalaka ntango nyonso na boninga kozanga komonana lokola bazali kongɛnga, mpe mokambi ya kolamba apesaki biso mbote mbala mibale.
Moto kaka moko ya boboto oyo azalaki kosala na bar yango.
Loso ezalaki malamu te mpe balambaki yango makasi mpenza ezalaki mpasi.
Nazeli koleka ngonga moko mpo na kosomba bilei.
Werra akomisa yo na ndako, bilei eza kitoko pe mopepe eza kitoko mingi!

Tosalaki bisika ya kolya na ebandeli mpe tokamwaki mpenza, ezalaki kokundwela ngai nkɔkɔ na ngai ya mobali, bisika na yango ya kala ya Italie oyo eza na makambo mingi ya kosepelisa ya kosepela na yango.
aspects: Esika ya kobomba bilei ya mpokwa
polarities: Esika ya kobomba bilei ya mpokwa

sentences: Supu oyo eza na pizza ezalaka malamu mpenza na ai mpe tomati ya sika mpe ezalaka te skimp.
Ntango nazalaki kofanda na Upstate na boumeli ya mwa ntango nazalaki kosomba bagels na frigo mpe balingaki kozala kaka malamu koleka biloko mosusu nyonso.
Mosala yango ezali malamu mpenza, décor ezali malamu, mpe bilei yango ezali kitoko mpe ezali na biteni minene.
Banda na caviar ya kokamwa kino na basali ya restora oyo bayambaka bapaya, nazalaki komiyoka lokola mokonzi mpe nazalaki kosepela na segonde na yango nyonso.
pasta ya mayebo ya porcini ezalaki elɛngi te, ndenge moko mpe tagliatelle ya mbu.
Mosala yango ezalaki kotya likebi mpe makanisi na ye ya biloko ya menu ezalaki mpenza na elembo.
Meka appetizer ya shrimp ya pilipili (lisusu, eza te motuya eleki monene na mokili kasi eza na motuya mingi) mpe Vindaloo ya mwana mpate eza monene.
Basali basalisaka bango na ndenge ya kokamwa mpe batyaka likebi.
Tozalaki kolanda bilei ya chef Lyle zingazinga ya New York banda mbula 15 mpe atako etikali kaka classique, makambo na ye ya sika na bisitro fare esalaki ete tózongela mpe tozonga.
Sushi eza mwayene pe talo eza eloko nyonso kasi.
Ebombelo ya esika yango mpe bawese oyo ebombamaki esalaki ete bato básɛka malamu.
Moto oyo azalaki kosala na restora asopelaki ngai mpenza mai na lobɔkɔ mpe akendaki.
Sandwich ya Reuben ya malamu koleka!
Atako ambiance mpe mopepe ezalaki monene, bilei mpe mosala ekokaki kozala malamu mingi.
Baluchi's eza na bilei ya makasi mpe kobongisa kitoko na ntalo ya malamu.

Ata nsima ya kopusa ye na Ray's ya lokumu oyo eza ya kelasi te, Sal alamuki lisusu mpona komema ba legacies ya noko ya tata na ye na komunga, bolingo ya solo mpona bato ya mboka na ye, mpe tóbosana te Pizza ya kokamwa!
Balakisaki miniti 15 nsima ya konyangwisa tuna yango.

Atako na ntembe te okofanda na mesa oyo eza na esika oyo ezomonana neti shambre ekoki mpenza te (ata soki parti na yo eza monene ndenge nini), atomosphere ya molunge ebongi na ba quartiers ya nkaka- okozala na esengo mpe okobosana esika ya makasi oyo ozali na yango.
Etando ezali monene!!
Nazali bobele komituna ndenge nini okoki kolya bilei kitoko motindo wana mpo na mwa mosolo moke.
Kozela awa eza molai mpona dim sum, kasi soki osepelaka te na kokabola bamesa to soki mopepe ya dim sum ya ndenge ezalaka mpenza eza te gig na yo, oyo eza lolenge mosusu ya kitoko (mpo na Chinatown).
Pizza yango ezalaki mpenza malamu.
Mosala yango ezalaki ya boboto mpe mopɛpɛ ezalaki bongobongo.
Eza pete na kozwa reservation na esika ya likolo na NYC na liyebisi ya poso moko.

Nasɛngaki libata ya tamarind mpe mwasi na ngai basɛngaki makaroni na mosuni ya ngombe ya mabelé, mpe biso mibale tosepelaki mingi na ndenge bilei ezalaki kobimisa elɛngi ya Thaïlande na ndenge tokanisaki te.
Quality ya bilei eza malamu mingi mpe ntalo na yango eza ntalo moke, ekangamaka na ngulu, mbisi, soso, mwana mpate mpe ndunda.
Bilei eza malamu na ndenge ya malamu, mpe ambience, malamu, eza likambo ya makanisi, basusu bakoki komona ete eza eloko ya sukali, nakanisaki ezalaki kaka kosilikela.
Mosala yango ezalaki malamu mpenza mpe bilei yango ezalaki elɛngi.
Anti-pasta ezalaki malamu mingi, mingimingi calamari, ndenge moko mpe na bisika ya pasta oyo ezalaki kotonda mingi.

Bazalaki na mayonnaise te, babosanaki toast na biso, batikaki biloko (ie fromage na omelete moko), na nse ya molunge makasi mpe bacon esilaki mpenza kolamba yango epanzanaki na saani ntango osimbaki yango.
Kopona vinyo ya malamu mpenza, Gigondas ebongi na ntalo, mpe champagne ya ndako ezali na motuya mingi.

Baza na bière ya ndenge na ndenge koleka 100 ya kopesa mopaya na bango mpo yango esepelisaki mobali na ngai mingi mpe bilei ezalaki kitoko, soki nasengeli kolendisa elubu esengeli kozala pumkin tortelini.
bonne nuit, bisous bisous.
Bilubu ya misuni ekembisaka sikoyo biloko oyo baponaki, atako eza naino na ebele ya biloko oyo baponaka oyo esepelisaka bandunda.
Tango olingi eteni ya mosuni ya ngombe, motó na likolo.

Banda na application ya complimentary chef ya squash ravioli ya butternut ya kitoko na supu ya truffle ya kitoko kino na manteka ya kokamwa mpe langostine entré ya pete kino na dessert oyo nakoki koyeba lisusu te mpo na cabernet ya mampa ya gato ya fabulous oyo tozalaki komela -- mpokwa mobimba ezalaki kokamwisa.
solo O.K. pizza.
Nalei epai ya Saulo, mbala mingi, bilei ezalaka ntango nyonso malamu, na ndenge ya mabe mpenza.
Meka Pad Thai, eza fabulous pe talo na bango eza talo moke mpenza!
Mpo na bato oyo balingi bilei ya minene bakisa mpe mosala monene, Roxy ezali esika ya KOKIMA!
Kasi, mampa mpe kokatakata mwana mpate oyo nazalaki na yango liboso ya kolya ezalaki mpenza malamu.
Kasi pizza yango ezali nzela ya kosɛnga mbongo mingi.
Nalyaki pizza mbala nyonso mibale mpe caprese salad appetizer.
Mosika na deegan ya monene ozwaka basi na bisika nyonso ya engumba.
Esika oyo eza na baribs ya kitoko ya ndenge ya Chine ya BBQ na ville.
Service eza ya kokamwa, kasi eleki ndelo te, mpe décor ememaka elɛngi ya SoHo ya trend na Queens.
Bambwa ya mɔtɔ ezalaki malili na katikati pe ba buns ezalaki stale.
Eza super-trendy mpe ezalaka ntango nyonso na moto ya kozwa kiti wana ya mpamba, yango wana emonani ete mosala ya bakiliya emonanaki ete eza na ntina te.
Try: ya pas de soucis.
Bapaya mosusu basepelaki na pizza, santa fe ya salade ekatami mpe mbisi mpe chips.
Kasi, kozela na yango ezali na ntina mingi.
Tozalaki na desserts ya minene (ata mpe cannoli ya malamu koleka oyo nazalaki na yango) mpe na nsima bapesaki masanga nsima ya kolya, na ndako.
aspects: Nsima ya komela masanga na mpokwa
polarities: Nsima ya komela masanga na mpokwa

sentences: Ambience eza kitoko mpe kitoko mpona masolo, yango wana mbala mosusu kolya bilei ya midi ya bongobongo awa elingaki kozala malamu mingi.

Tozalaki naino kofanda na bar wana tozalaki komela sangria, kasi kokutana mosika na bar ntango tobalukaki lisusu, $2 esilaki bato oyo bazalaki pembeni na biso balobaki ete moto oyo azalaki koteka masanga azwaki yango.
Nsima ya kosepela mpenza na bar tofandaki na mesa moko mpe tozalaki kolya bilei ya mpokwa.

Guacamole+shrimp appetizer ezalaki mpenza monene, biso mibale tozalaki na filet, ya malamu mpenza, ezalaki mpenza te lokola ba frites oyo eyaki na yango, kasi filet ezalaki malamu mpenza, moko te kati na biso azalaki komema.
Biloko nyonso emonanaka minene, masanga, décor, bilei, ata mpe bato.
Loso ezalaki malamu te mpe balambaki yango makasi mpenza ezalaki mpasi.
Esika ya malamu mpenza, bilei ya kitoko mpe mosala ya boninga.
Bato ya mosala baza te moninga ya boboto to ya makoki mingi, mpe ngai nazali stickler mpo na mosala, kasi makambo mosusu nyonso etali esika oyo ebongisaka yango.
Miniti 20 mpo na reservation na biso kasi epesaki biso ntango ya kozala na mwa ba cocktails mpe kosepela na bisika oyo eza zingazinga na biso mpe moko na mosusu.
Sandwich ya Pastrami ezalaki lokola buttah mpe na ba pickles mpe bière ya malili oyo ezalaki na ngalasi mpo na kosukola yango, ezalaki mpenza likambo ya kosepelisa.
Mesa oyo ezalaki pembeni na biso etunaki ye soki ye moko azalaki kobuka mbuma yango ntango nsukansuka molangi na bango ya vinyo oyo elekaki molai ekómaki.
Bilei ya malamu (épinard mpe ba dumplings ya masangu mpe curry ya massamman), ya boninga mingi mpe ezangi bozoba mpe esika ya kosukola ya peto mpe ya funky.
Mwasi na ye Tanya, mwasi na ye oyo ayambi bato malamu, azali kosilisa ezaleli ya kobɔndisa na kozaláká na esengo nyonso mpe na boboto.

Pizza ya pamba ezalaki soggy mpe pizza ya kosala mushroom ya zamba(generation ya misato-Fornini) oyo tozalaki na yango tobetamaki na mafuta ya truffle na katikati( lisusu ezalaki kosala ete ezala pɔtɔpɔtɔ) mpe eloko moko te na oyo etikali.
aspects: Pizza ya zamba (generation ya misato Fornini) pizza
polarities: Pizza ya zamba (generation ya misato Fornini) pizza

sentences: Nionso oyo ebongaki na porte ya lopango.

Oyo toyokanaki na yango mingi eza orrechiete oyo eza na boudin na nsoso (mbala mingi bato oyo basalaka na restora bazalaka na boboto mpona kokabola saani na katikati mpo ozwa komeka misuni nyonso mibale).
Nakolendisa mingi Nina na moto nyonso oyo alingi kozala na bolei ya bolingo na kati ya motema molunge oyo etondi na babuji mpe bafoto ya libota.
Mesa na biso ya moke mpo na bato mibale (basaani ya bolei oyo bakakisaki na ndelo) ezalaki mpenza na katikati ya moko ya banzela ya bato oyo bazalaki kosala na restora.

Mosala yango ezalaki kotya likebi, kasi ezalaki na bomoko, bilei yango ezalaki malamu mingi koleka barestora mingi oyo eyebanaki mingi na Midtown mpe liste ya vinyo ezalaki mingi mpe ezali na ntalo mingi.
Esika oyo elingaki kosalelama malamu mingi na kozaláká kotambwisama na etuluku moko oyo eyebi mpenza mosala ya bakiliya.
Kasi, bazwi pastrami ya kokamwa mpenza mpe supu ezobeta esika wana.
Koswa mokomoko ya bilei na Kai ezalaki solo kitoko, ya sika, mpe ya kitoko.
Pizza ya kitoko mpona esika ya kolya na midi.
Bilei eza mwayene, mpe nakoki koloba ete ata restora ya chaine Baluchi ezalaka na elɛngi ya malamu.
Banda na baappetizer ya ebandeli, scallops ezalaki kokamwisa, tii na souffle ya shokola ya kitoko oyo eza na sorbet ya rasberry mint, tosepelaki mingi na makambo ya elɛngi oyo ezalaki koyoka.
Bilei ya malamu (épinard mpe ba dumplings ya masangu mpe curry ya massamman), ya boninga mingi mpe ezangi bozoba mpe esika ya kosukola ya peto mpe ya funky.
Osengeli kozala na lasagna ya crabmeat oyo eza libanda ya mokili oyo mpe pudding ya mampa ya chocolat mpo na dessert.
Eza lokola nde bazwaki nsoso oyo etikali, basopelaki mafuta mpe bapanzaki pilipili na likolo na yango (supu ezalaki translucent mpe motane).

Mosala yango ezalaki kotya likebi, kasi ezalaki na bomoko, bilei yango ezalaki malamu mingi koleka barestora mingi oyo eyebanaki mingi na Midtown mpe liste ya vinyo ezalaki mingi mpe ezali na ntalo mingi.
Tokutanaki naino te na mikakatano mpo na kosɛnga mbongo na bilei to na nsɔngɛ na yango, mpe bilei ezalaki kopesama nokinoki, kasi tozali kobika bobele na mwa miniti moke na makolo longwa na yango.
Soki ozali koluka Sushi ya bonkɔkɔ ya kokoka, kende awa - soki ozali koluka biloko ya kosangisa oyo esepelisaka, meka sushi ya Gari (ngambo ya este).
Tokendeke mokolo ya yambo mpona kobongisa prix mpe makambo tokutanaki na yango na bilei ekokani na Blue Ribbon.
Mpo na esika yango, ntalo na yango ebongi mpenza.
Tolyaki libanda na patio ya nsima, oyo ebongi na yango po eza kitoko pe miziki ezoyoka malamu kuna.
Natikalá naino te na cheescake ya ndenge wana.
Waitstaff azali malamu mingi, atyaka likebi mingi.
Ba snobs ya barestora eza na mposa ya kotungisa te, oyo eza esika ya moke, ya kartye.
Meka salmon ya tandoori!
Liste ya vinyo eza monene te, mpe biloko ya sukali etindamaka banda na Bruno's na nse ya balabala, oyo eza malamu te ndenge ezalaki kala.
Na nsima, tosɛngaki barulo ya dinosaure mpe thon sashimi ya mpɛmbɛ.
Lisusu, soki olingi te kofanda na mesa moko boye, osengeli te!
Kasi, kicker ya solo ya menyu eza bana ya ngombe to nsoso oyo eza na matiti ya chili mpe ya ndímo-ndímo.
Lobanzo kaka moko oyo nazali na yango eza na bato ya slighly oyo basalaka na restora nyonso oyo basɛngaka biloko ya kolya mpe babwakaka bilei na nse, bazali kobimisa yo mbangu.
Kasi ntango ofandi bato oyo basalaka na restora bazalaka malamu mpenza, balimbolaka makambo nyonso oyo eza na menu, mpe ntalo ya bilei ezalaka mpenza ntalo moke mpo na mosala oyo ozwaka.
Mbisi elekaki ndelo.
Gros bisous, bonne nuit!

Mwana na biso alingaka pizza mingi mpe toza na pizzaria ya Neapolitan oyo eza na certificat na engumba na biso (Seattle), tolingaki likambo oyo pene ya mingi - mpe bokeseni ezalaki mingi na oyo etali kolinga moto na esika ya kokanisa nyonso na restora nyonso mibale.
Lisusu, loso ezalaki na eleko moko te, yango wana sushi ezalaki bland mpe ezalaki mbindo.

Kasi kosenga ata moke te bacon na retare na nite (ezala platter to na mikate, mpona likambo wana eutaka te na esika nyonso ya kozwa) mpo eza banda na ntongo frying ekomaka makasi mpenza neti bacos, ezokisa molar na ngai.
Ambiance eza moke bilei eza te ya phenomenal, kasi bilei mosusu ezalaka malamu mpenza, na ndakisa parmesan ya aubergine, veal na carozza chicken saltimbocca.
Ekoki kozala mwa kotonda na wikende, kasi vibe eza malamu mpe eza bilei ya France ya malamu koleka oyo okokuta na esika wana.
Bilei ya pete ya kobɔndisa mpe biloko nini ya mɔtɔ mpe ya lage.
Cornelia Street emonanaka neti esika ya Broadway mpona West Side Story mpe na kati ya Po eza kitoko mingi na quaint ya kitoko mpenza okoki te kozala na likolo ya esika ya bolei ya bolingo na NYC.
Bonne fêtes bisous bisous - Sara

Nayebi esika mpe bato oyo bosengeli koya awa te mpo na romantic, ya kobenda likebi ya ambiance to service mitano ya minzoto oyo eza na sommlier mpe maze ya mindondo ya kapitene mpe ya nsima ya bato oyo basalaka na restora - oyaka mpo na bilei ya solo, makambo oyo esepelisaka yango, ndenge makambo ezalaka.

Ata soki bamesa ekoki kozala na konfinema makasi, mwinda ya buji, bilei mpe mosala efutaka mingi.

Pizza eza kitoko - basalelaka mozzarella ya sika na esika ya fromage ya ntalo moke, ya glace, ya shredded oyo ezalaka mingi na pizzaria mingi.
Ba cours 2 ya liboso ezalaki malamu mingi, kasi echantillon ya shokola ezalaki na bozwi mingi mpona ngai mpe vinyo ya dessert oyo eza mosika mpenza na sukali.
Bilei ya kokamwa na ntalo oyo bakoki kopakola mpenza ezongisaka ngai kaka pene ya mikolo nyonso mosusu na restora oyo ya solo ya Thaïlande.
Bilei ezalaki malamu mingi mpe mosala ezalaki lisusu malamu koleka.

Mbala ya liboso oyo nakendeki, mpe etuluku ya jazz ya bomoi mpe atmosphere, nasɛngaki salade ya Lobster Cobb.
Thalia eza restora moko kitoko oyo eza na bato ya kitoko oyo basalelaka yo, kasi bilei ekokani mpenza te.

Ezalaka ntango nyonso ya kofungwama, koleisa ba chou ya Pakistan oyo eza na molongo na Crosby St., yango wana bato mingi babongolaka biloko na bilei koleka ndenge okoki kokanisa (elingi koloba, eza ya kokamwa ya sika).

Mesa mokomoko ezali na nzungu ya mai ya mɔtɔ oyo bazindaka na likoló na yango, mpe ozwaka ba platters ya misuni ya mikemike oyo bakati na biteni, ndunda ndenge na ndenge, mpe makaroni ya loso mpe talatala.
Okoki mpenza kozwa salade 2 ya motuya soki omemi yango na ndako mpe obakisi yango na mwa lettuce!
Meka thon ya crunchy, ezali po na kokufa.

Nha Trang, atako ayebana mingi mpo na kozanga libɔndisi mpe kobongisa makambo, bato ya mosala ya kozela malembe na ndenge ya nsɔmɔ mpe bilei ya noki ya nsɔmɔ, eza moko ya barestora ya malamu ya Vietnam oyo nakendá naino te. pho ezalaka elɛngi mpe ezalaka na bavegtable ya sika mpenza.
Vinyo ezalaka ntango nyonso malamu, tapas ezalaka ntango nyonso yummy, mingimingi na limpa ya pita ya molunge.

Bruscetta eza mwa soggy, kasi ba salade ezalaki ya sika, ezalaki na bosangani ya kitoko ya biloko ya pondu (eza glace te) bilei nyonso bapesaka piping ya mɔtɔ oyo euti na kuku.
Appetizer eza na esika moko pene ya $7 mokomoko mpe bilei ya minene eza kati ya $11 pe $16.
Supu ya mɔ́tɔ mpe ya nsɔ́mɔ ezalaki na mɔ́tɔ makasi te mpe ezalaki elɛngi bobele na pilipili mpe eloko mosusu te.

Tebaalina mayonnaise, beerabidde toast yaffe, yaleka ebintu (ie cheese in a omelet), wansi w'ebbugumu ery'ebbugumu era bacon yali efumbiddwa nnyo n'egwa ku mbaawo ng'ogikutte.

ekiro nga tetulina nteekateeka, twalindirira mu bbaala okumala akaseera naye maneja yali mulungi nnyo era yafuula okulinda kwaffe okuba okw'amaanyi.

Ma aysan haysan mayonnaise, waxay illoobeen rootigeena, waxay ka tageen waxyaabo (ie cheese in an omelet), heerkulkii ka hooseeyey kulaylka iyo baconkii ayaa aad u weyn kariyey waxay ku jajabtay saxanka markaad taabatay.

habeen boos la'aan, waxaan ku khasbannahay in ay ku sugaan baarka muddo yar, laakiin maamuluhu wuxuu ahaa mid aad u fiican oo ka dhigay our sugi waayo-aragnimo weyn.

Wiilkeenu wuxuu jecel yahay pizza waxaana haysannaa pizza-ga Neapolitan ee magaalada gurigeena (Seattle), waxaan jeclaanay ku dhawaad sida ugu badan - farqigana wuxuu ahaa mid ku saabsan doorbidista shakhsi ahaaneed marka loo eego wixii ka-fikiraya labada makhaayad midkood.
Intaas waxaa dheer, bariisku ma lahayn xanbaaj, sidaa daraadeed sushigu wuxuu ahaa mid jilicsan oo laga yaqyaqsadaa.

Laakiin ha dalbanin dooxada goor dambe oo ku taal nite (mid xeedhada ama rootiga ku jira, waayo arintaas kama dalbato wax kasta oo laga soo qaado meel) sida ay tahay tan iyo subaxdii ayaa si adag u soo baxday u dhawaad sida bacaha oo kale, waxyeello u geysato molars-kayga.
Ambiance waa mid yar, raashinka ma aha mid cajiib ah, laakiin suxuunta qaar ayaa aad u fiican, sida parmesan ukunta, hilibka ku jira carozza chicken saltimbocca.
Waxaa laga yaabaa in uu yara buuxsamo dhammaadka usbuuca, lakiin vibe-ku wuu fiican yahay waana cunnada ugu fiican ee faransiiska aad ka heli doonto degaanka.

Liiska khamriga Great, si macquul ah jaban.--Sara

Waan fahamsanahay aagga iyo aagga aanad u baahnayn in aad halkan u timaado jaceyl, soo jiidasho leh ambiance ama adeegga shanta xiddigle oo ka kooban dheellitir iyo miisas adag oo ah kabtanka iyo kuwa gadaal sugayaasha - waxaad u timaadaa cuntooyinka dhabta ah, dhadhanka, waayo-aragnimada.
Ma hubo halka kan hore ee eegaya, lonk, cunay, laakiin Sawlos wuxuu joogaa xaafad weyn oo cunto weyn ayuu leeyahay!
Qurxinta waa mid aad u fudud laakiin raaxo leh.

Haddii aad ku jirtid koox weyn, meeshan waa mid fiican sababtoo ah waxay ku talineysaa in lala wadaago - waxay leeyihiin susans caajis ah oo ku yaalla miisaska intooda badan - xitaa qoysaska waxay dareemi karaan raaxo halkan.

Qataar qabow oo cunto weynu ku buuxdo, Iyo tons oo ah biir aad u fiican.
Aad u awoodi karo oo aad u fiican jamhuuriyadda!

Shaqaalaha waa mid aad u fiican, specjal: gabadhaas ka danbeeya bar, chic yurub.

In kastoo aad shaki la'aan la fadhiisan doonaa miis leh waxa ay u muuqataa sida yar ku filan qolka (aan loo eegayn waxa xajmiga xisbigaaga), atomosphere diiran yahay qiimihiisu yahay quarters cidhiidhi ah- waxaad yeelan doontaa xiiso leh oo ilowday oo ku saabsan kaalinta adag aad ku jirto.
Waxaa jiray sugid dheer oo miis ka baxsan, laakiin waxa ay ahayd wax yar oo aad u kulul ee qorraxda si kastaba sidaas miiska insde our ahaa mid aad u fiican.

New Jersey waxaan ku nool nahay oo mar kasta oo aan galo Magaalada New York waxaan ka soo iibsanaa bagels in la cuno kulul ka dibna si baraf u noqda (waxay ii sheegeen in haddii aan soo wac si, ay u soo saari doonaan baabuurka sidaas darteed ma aha inaan raadiyo baarkinka).

Meeshan waa in ay ku kacaysaa mulkiileyaasha nasiib u leeyihiin in ay dhisaan.

Aniga iyo xaaskeyga waxaan had iyo jeer ku raaxeystaa da'da yar, oo aan had iyo jeer si fiican u tababaran laakiin si saaxiibtinimo ah, shaqaale, kuwaas oo dhammaantood leeyihiin sheeko.

Waxaan ku turunturooday on this dabaqa labaad socod-up laba Jimco ka hor markii aan la joogay laba saaxiibo magaalada ka L.A. Iyagoo lovers sushi halis ah, waxaan fadhiistay baar sushi si ay u noqoto u dhow ficilka.

Aadka lagu talinaynaa in this sida qiimaha weyn ee sushi fiican iyo adeeg.

Waxaad ku bixinaysaa jawiga, taas oo ah wax fiican, laakiin waxaa laga heli karaa meelo badan oo ku yaal Bay Ridge.
Jawiga wuu badnaa laakiin wuxuu ahaa mid weyn oo ah nooca bistro-ka.
Jawiga iyo jawigaba waa sida oo kale.
Darbiga cagaaran ee cagaaran ee cagaaran ayaa ka taga wax badan oo la doonayo, laakiin cuntadu aad ayey u fiican tahay.
Adeeggu wuxuu ahaa mid degdeg ah oo saaxiibtinimo leh, cuntaduna waxay ahayd mid aad u macaan badan waxayna heleen saxaro kulul oo aad ku darto cuntadaada.
Waxay ku taallaa dhammaadka block weyn.

Service ahaa devine, oysters halkaas oo dareen ah sida ay soo, iyo qiimaha aan la garaaci karin!!

Great for kooxaha, weyn ee taariikhda a, weyn u quraac hore ama nightcap a.

Waa in aan uga digaa akhristaha in cabirka qaybaha ay aad u yar yihiin (gaar ahaan appetizers-ka), markaa haddii aad qorsheyneysid in aad wax ka cunto illaa aad buuxsanto oo aadan damacsaneyn in aad dalbato cabirka dhadhaminta khaaska ah ee kariyaha, u diyaari inaad dalbato oo aad bixiso lacag cabitaan ah (1 saxan qof kasta maxaa yeelay qaybaha maahan wax lala wadaago),  entrée ugu weyn, iyo udon qabowga dhamaadka cuntada.

Bariiska la shiilay waa mid cajiib ah halkaan.

Waxaa naloo sheegay in ay sugitaanku uu ku dhow yahay labaatan daqiiqo oo aysan jiri doonin wax dhibaato ah nagama jirto wicitaankeenna 8:00 pm.
Si fiican ayey noogu dhaqmeen, cuntaduna waxay ahayd mid aad u cusub oo si fiican loo diyaariyey.
Markii ugu horeysay ee aan New York joogno, waxaana qasab noo ahaa inaan isku dayno New York Bagel.
Waxay leeyihiin Indian dhab ah oo qiimo la yaab leh.
Kalluunka oo dhan duban cajiib ah, dhirfaan weyn.
Inkasta oo aan sameeyey xajmiga at 3pm ee isla habeenkii ilaa Dinnerbroker, waxaan ku fadhiistay miiska leh mid ka mid ah aragtida ugu fiican!
baar Great, baartenders ugu qurux badan oo aad abid arkay (gaar ahaan marwada maraakiibta casaan ah).
Adeegga waa mid heer sare ah loo safeeyey: fadhigeena waxaa dib loo dhigay 35 daqiiqo oo dhaaftay booskeenna iyo maitre d' raaligelin ka bixiyay oo si joogto ah noogu hayay apprised horumarka.
Raashinku wuxuu ahaa mid ganacsi oo aad u kulul isla markaana aad u fiican oo leh qaybo badan.

Bruscetta waa soggy yar, laakiin salads waxay ahaayeen kuwo cusub, waxaa ka mid ah isku dhafka fiican ee cagaaran (ma aha barafberg) dhammaan suxuunta waxaa loo adeegaa tuubooyinka kulul ee ka yimaada jikada.
Appetizers waxay joogaan meel ku dhow $7 midkiiba iyo suxuunta ugu weyni waa inta u dhaxaysa $11 iyo $16.
Maraqii aadka u kululaa ee saabuunta ahaa mid si aan loo dulqaadan karin oo kulul ayay dhadhamisay kaliya bababays iyo wax kale.
Weli, tijaabi hal mar, maadaama haddii aad ku dambeyso inaad jeclaato cuntada, waxay noqon kartaa mid ka mid ah khibradaada cuntada ee ugu fiican.

Waxaan nahay kuwo aad u gaar ah oo ku saabsan sushi oo labaduba waxay ahaayeen fadlan leh doorasho kasta oo ay ka mid ahaayeen: isku darka ceviche (gaarka ah), iskudhafka duubka, sashimi kala duwan, sushi iyo duub, laba nooc oo dartood, iyo tempura muuska.
Great for kooxaha waaweyn iyo dabaaldegyada - our super happy fadhiidka ahaa madadaalada fiidkii.
Runtii waan jeclaa taabashada kala duwan ee inovated kaas oo ah jeebka uu raashinka siiyaa.
Cuntada badda waa wax lala yaabo, waxaa ku jira liis fiican oo khamri ah, iyo liisanka abid is bedelaya ayaa had iyo jeer bixiya wax yaabo aad u weyn.
Raashinku gabi ahaanba wuxuu ahaa mid aad u xun!
Meeshani waa joogsi weyn oo raashin weyn ah.
markii ugu horraysay ee uu sushigu aad u fiiqnaa, mar labaad oo ay yara caga-jiiddo.
Kwakukhona ukulinda isikhathi eside kwetafula ngaphandle, kodwa kwakushisa kancane kakhulu elangeni nakanjani ngakho-ke itafula lethu le-insde lalimnandi kakhulu.
Zombili izikhathi sasilinda kahle ngaphezu kwesigamu sehora etafuleni (yize sasinokubhukha).

Abazange babe nemayonnaise, bakhohlwa i-toast yethu, bashiya ngaphandle izithako (ie ushizi ku-omelet), ngaphansi kwamazinga okushisa ashisayo futhi i-bacon yayiphelile kakhulu iphekwe yaqhekeka epuletini lapho uyithinta.
Ukudla kwakumangalisa, futhi insizakalo yayishesha futhi iwusizo, kodwa hhayi ukuthwala ngokweqile noma ukuphuthuma.
Ngenkathi begcina i-capex incane, benza ukufaka imali ethile kuma-bagels, ngoba baphakathi kokuhle kakhulu edolobheni.
Uma uthanda umculo wakho waqhuma futhi uhlelo alukhulu kangako futhi uma ufuna ukukhokha okungenani i-100 dollar bottle minimun ke uzoyithanda lapha.
ISIKHALAZO ESIKHULU: AKUKHO UKUTHOSA OKUTHOLAKALAYO.
Sigijime kancane sekwephuzile ukubhukha kodwa kwakungeyona inkinga ukuthola itafula lethu ngokushesha.
THe Pizza newayini kwaba kakhulu-inkonzo kakhulu--kodwa yini ngempela MADE le ndawo kwaba endaweni yokudlela ngemuva.
ubusuku ngaphandle kokubhuka, kwadingeka silinde ebha isikhashana, kodwa umphathi wayemnandi kakhulu futhi wenza ukulinda kwethu isipiliyoni esikhulu.
Sasine-pot-stickers eyayikhulu futhi isidlo se-tempura esasikhulu.
Angizange ngidle i-chop yewundlu emnandi njengaleyo,amasaladi amnandi ngempela agqoke i-lemon namafutha omnqumo angeziwe we-virgnin.
Le ndawo ayiqhathanisi nekaMamoun ngokwentengo, ukusha, inani, kanye nekhwalithi ye-consisent, kodwa lokho kuwumbono wami nje.
Ngakho-ke, imenyu ibhalwe nge-chalk ngaphezu kwekhanda lakho futhi konke kuzwakala kumnandi.
Kusukela enkonzweni esabekayo, kuya ekudleni kwe-bland, kungasaphathwa abaphathi abangaxhumani, isipiliyoni jikelele sasisabekayo.
I-waitress yaphakamisa izingilazi zewayini ezahamba kahle kakhulu nokudla.
Izinhlobonhlobo ezintsha kakhulu, ezinhle kakhulu, kanye nokulethwa okusheshayo.
Ipuleti lewayini noshizi liningi futhi ayikwazi ukulinda ukuzama i-fondue noma i-table grilling.
I flavour eyizingqabavu futhi ezicashile.
Ukugubha usuku lokuzalwa, abathathu bethu baya eMare belindele ukudla okukhulu.
Kwakungathi amaseva akhohlwe ukuthi empeleni asebenza lapho futhi esikhundleni salokho ayefuna ukuzitika futhi aphole.

Inhlanzi intsha futhi ucezu ngalunye lunqunywe ekupheleleni futhi lunongiwe ngumpheki we-sushi (ngokuvamile nge-wasabi encane entsha kanye ne-soy sauce kodwa futhi ngezinye izikhathi ngosawoti othile wolwandle).
Inkonzo yayikhohlisa, ama-oyster lapho kufika khona inyama njengoba eza, futhi intengo ayikwazi ukushaywa!!
Konke mayelana nokudla !!
benza ukunikeza isaphulelo se-15% ekugcineni, kwakunganele, njengoba bazi ukuthi insizakalo yayisabekayo.
Ngesikhathi kungena umndeni wabanika izinhlelo zokusebenza zokuhlola ama-palets abo, wabe eseba-oda.
Iya lapha isidlo sakusihlwa romantic kodwa hhayi i all out wow yokudlela isipiliyoni.
Gcina imali yakho futhi ungachithi amakhalori akho, iya ku-Margharita's ku-Washington Street esikhundleni, banokudla okumangalisayo kanye nensizakalo ye-BEST.
I-Decor i-minimalist futhi ihlanzekile - akukho lutho lokuphazamisa noma ukuncoma.
Killer Sushi!

Kumele ngixwayise umfundi ukuthi ubukhulu bezingxenye buncane kakhulu (ikakhulukazi ama-appetizers), ngakho-ke uma uhlela ukudla uze ugcwele futhi ungazimisele uku-oda imenyu ekhethekile yokunambitha yompheki, lungiselela uku-oda futhi ukhokhe i-appetizer (isidlo se-1 kumuntu ngamunye ngoba izingxenye akuzona zokwabelana),  i-entrée eyinhloko, kanye ne-udon ebandayo ekupheleni kokudla.
Kuyihlazo ukuthi indawo enhle, elula njenge-Pink Pony ingabhujiswa kakhulu yinkonzo ye-lousy.
Uma ufuna ukudla okukhulu ngentengo ehloniphekile, iya ku-Del Frisco's!
Sasine-crawfish ebilisiwe futhi naphezu kokwenza umonakalo, kwakuyithani lokuzijabulisa futhi elimnandi kakhulu kanye.
Thina, kwakukhona abane bethu, safika emini - indawo yayingenalutho - futhi abasebenzi benza sengathi sibabeka futhi babenolaka kakhulu.
ngingacela nje ukuthi kungabi khona uwoyela ngesikhathi esizayo.
Sa-oda kuphela ama-dessert neziphuzo, kodwa akukho ukugcwaliswa okunikeziwe.
Zombili zimnandi, abapheki banobungane futhi bazimisele ukuthatha isikhashana futhi bakhulume nawe futhi babambe isandla sakho.
Ukudla kuyinto esabekayo - nakanjani zama bass striped.
Nakuba i-Spider Roll ingase ibukeke njengenselelo yokudla, nge-soft shell crab elengayo ngaphandle kwe-roll, kufanelekile kahle intengo oyikhokhayo kubo.
Abasebenzi banake kakhulu futhi cishe ngaso sonke isikhathi singathola itafula.

Iphasishi elincane liholela endaweni encane lapho kukhona khona ama-counter amathathu amancane amhlophe anamathayela, umonakalo omkhulu (izitaki zamabhodlela, amaphilisi) kanye ne-counter encane ephethe ama-entrees angu-12-14.
Insizakalo ihlala imbi noma kunjalo, ungalindeli okuningi kwanoma yini kusuka kwiseva yakho, futhi ngeke ngincome ukuletha usuku lapha noma.
Noma kunjalo, noma yimaphi ama-quibbles mayelana nomthethosivivinywa ayengaphandle kwe-set by the pour-your-own measures of liquers okwakuyi-courtesey yendlu ...
Ngenxa yalokho, ama-burger abo awa ezandleni zabo futhi enza umonakalo kangangokuthi benza'nt bazizwe befuna ukuwaqeda.
Imenyu yayibonakala inezitsha ezihlukahlukene zabathandi bokudla kwasolwandle nezindlela ezithakazelisayo zokuzilungiselela.
Uma ungajwayelene ne-cuisine, ungase uhlangabezane nezinkinga zoku-oda lapha futhi uqiniseke ukuthi uletha imali eningi nawe njengoba bengamukeli amakhadi esikweletu.
Indawo kwakungekho nzima kakhulu ukuthola, kodwa kwaba uhlobo egcwele, ngokushesha nje lapho mina nesithandwa sami sathola ukudla kwethu, umugqa wafinyelela emnyango.
I-Steak Tartare ukubheja okukhulu, bakulungisa etafuleni.
Ngicela uma ukucabanga kwakho ngakho hamba, futhi uhlale ukulinda ngeke uphoxeke.
Imenyu ayifani naleyo ekwiwebhusayithi.
I-tuna roll enomsoco yayihle ngokungajwayelekile futhi i-rock shrimp tempura yayisabekayo, i-appetizer enkulu yokwabelana!
Ukudla kwakumangalisa, inkonzo yayiqaphela kakhulu futhi inomuntu, futhi kanjani ngaleyo ambience!
Abaphathi nabanikazi babengenawo umhlaseli ngalokhu futhi bathembisa ukubiza i-exterminator kodwa abazange badumazeke noma baxolise njengoba bengingalindela.
Besihlela ukuthola i-dessert kodwa i-waitress ngokuyisisekelo ngokusebenzisa ibhilidi kithi ngaphambi kokuba sithole ithuba loku-oda.
Angiyena umgxeki wokudla, kodwa ngingathanda ukucabanga ukuthi nginesipiliyoni esincane ngaphansi kwebhande lami ngihlale e-NY iminyaka yokugcina ye-11.

Ngenkathi i-Sapphire ngokuqinisekile ingaswele i-ambiance, futhi mhlawumbe ine-decor engcono kakhulu yanoma iyiphi indawo yokudlela yaseNdiya engiye kuyo eNew York City, ukudla kwakungeyona into engangithembele kuyo.
Amazambane e-tuna ne-wasabe amahle kakhulu.
i dont ngokuvamile oda iwayini nge indian ngakho i abakwazi ukuphawula ohlwini lwabo iwayini noma iwayini labo.
Angizange ngikhononde, ngawuthanda kakhulu umkhathi.
Bakhohlwa sandwich, akazange afake izimfoloko plastic, futhi akazange afake pita nge ngoqwembe hummus.

Iphasishi elincane liholela endaweni encane lapho kukhona khona ama-counter amathathu amancane amhlophe anamathayela, umonakalo omkhulu (izitaki zamabhodlela, amaphilisi) kanye ne-counter encane ephethe ama-entrees angu-12-14.
Ngemuva kokufika kwenkambo eyinhloko, asizange sibone i-waiter yethu okungenani imizuzu engu-40!
Futhi, ama-sandwich (eduze kwe- $ 7) awazange eze nanoma yini efana nama-chips noma uhlangothi.
Izimpawu, amamenyu ekhethekile, ukudla, ngisho nazo zonke waitstaff ZONKE NGOKUPHELELE Japanese.
BUt isidlo sabo esihle kakhulu yi-thh Thai spiced curry noodles nge-shrimp - isidlo esingabiza u- $ 23.95 yizindawo eziningi, kodwa yi- $ 16 lapha.
Izingxenye manje zincane kakhulu, amasoso anomdlandla ngokweqile ngokuvamile angadliwa ngenkathi insizakalo iseyinhle, indawo yokudlela, ngenxa yokuthandwa kwayo, ibonakala i-frantic.
Ubukhulu bengxenye lapha bukhulu, futhi i-sushi inhle.
I-steak inhle, inhlanzi inhle futhi i-sushi yayikhulu ngokumangalisayo.
Okokuqala, i-waitress yayinganaki ngokuphelele izikhathi ze-2 esambona ngazo (okungajwayelekile endaweni yokudlela enamathebula we-6) futhi wathola i-oda lethu elingalungile.
Ukudla okukhulu ngamanani anengqondo, kwenza kusihlwa okungeke kushaywe!
Ungahambi wedwa---abantu ababili abanele konke okuhlangenwe nakho, ngama-pickle kanye nokukhethwa kwenyama nokudla kwasolwandle.
umculo omuhle, ukudla okukhulu, inkonzo esheshayo amanani ezingabizi.
Ngenkathi kunezindawo eziningi zokuya ku-sandwich enhle yenkomo e-corned, i-Katz's ine-charm ngakho.
ngezinye izikhathi i uthole ukudla okubi futhi inkonzo embi, ngezinye izikhathi i uthole inkonzo enhle enhle nemibi.
I-pizza iyona engcono kakhulu uma uthanda i-pizza encane e-crusted.
Yebo kumele ulinde ukuhlala futhi ngoba encane yayo ayikho indawo yokulinda futhi isihlalo ebha sathathwa sonke.
Noma kunjalo ukudla ngokwakho kuhle kakhulu.
Abasebenzi be-accomodating, ukudla kwakumnandi ngokuphelele futhi indawo iyathandeka.
Isinkwa yisinkwa esithambile se-paratha (ngokungafani nesinkwa esicacile abasisebenzisa eCalcutta), futhi ukugcwaliswa kuyisitayela se-tandoori futhi kunambitheka kakhulu.
Ngenxa ye-crust encane ebucayi, ama-take-out pies athola i-soggy emabhokisini abo.
Isitayela esithandwa kakhulu Izakaya (Sake kanye nengxenye encane izitsha sake-friendly ).
Ukudla okukhulu, amanani amakhulu, inkonzo enkulu.
Babengakwazi nokwenza isaladi eyayikhanga.
Imenyu yashintsha, izingxenye zazincane nakakhulu kunangaphambili, isidlo se-lentil sasinosawoti ngaphezu kwe-edibility, isidlo selayisi se-basmati sasingenakho ukunambitheka.
Ngeke iphule ibhange kodwa nami bengingeke ngibuye ukudla.
Ngokuqondene nenkonzo, ama-waitresses ayengenabuhlobo ngokukhethekile, kodwa athola umsebenzi.
Ukunambitheka kukhulu, futhi imenyu ibanzi.
I-waitress yaphakamisa izingilazi zewayini ezahamba kahle kakhulu nokudla.
Ukunambitheka okukhazimulayo kokudla kunqoba i-palate, kwamukela ngempela ubuhle be-cuisine eyiqiniso yaseThailand.
UWinnie nabasebenzi bakhe bayiqembu elihle kakhulu ongalithola likukhonza.
I-pizza imnandi - basebenzisa i-mozzarella entsha esikhundleni se-cheese eshibhile, eqandisiwe, eqoshiwe evamile ku-pizzaria eningi.
Ngokuvamile 3 vs. 4 izinto isidlo ngasinye.
Kini nonke entsha ekudleni kwamaNdiya, zama i-Paneer Roll, ucezu lwezulu.
Wonke ama-appetizers namasaladi ayehle kakhulu, i-steak yayiphuzisa umlomo futhi i-pasta yayimnandi!!
I-palak paneer yayijwayelekile, futhi ngangingeyona i-fan ye-malai kofta.
Umnikazi unobungane kakhulu futhi ungumfana omkhulu, hamba uzame i-pizza yakhe, uzoyithanda!
I-blond wood decor iduduza kakhulu, i-premium sake inhle kakhulu futhi insizakalo inkulu.

Ngiyaqonda indawo kanye nabantu akudingeki uze lapha nge-ambiance yothando, ehehayo noma insizakalo yezinkanyezi ezinhlanu ezifaka i-sommlier kanye ne-maze eyinkimbinkimbi yomphathi kanye nama-waiters emuva - uze ukudla okuyiqiniso, ukunambitheka, isipiliyoni.

ukukhetha kwami yilezi: - I-Scallion Pancake (ethosiwe ngejusi yemifino, ekhethekile kakhulu futhi enambithekayo) - Inkukhu yaseGuizhou - Isitayela Somndeni we-Shredded Squid (enye yezintandokazi zami siqu) - i-Sichuan Spicy Soft Shell Crab - Shuizhu Fish (lena yabalandeli bokudla be-hardcore Sichuan, ngeke ngincome kubangani bami baseMelika njengoba inomsoco kakhulu.
Isibonelo isobho okuyinto kwaba mayelana 6 oz for $ 12 zamadola kanye amakhowe lapho $ 12 mayelana 1oz.

Kumele ngixwayise umfundi ukuthi ubukhulu bezingxenye buncane kakhulu (ikakhulukazi ama-appetizers), ngakho-ke uma uhlela ukudla uze ugcwele futhi ungazimisele uku-oda imenyu ekhethekile yokunambitha yompheki, lungiselela uku-oda futhi ukhokhe i-appetizer (isidlo se-1 kumuntu ngamunye ngoba izingxenye akuzona zokwabelana),  i-entrée eyinhloko, kanye ne-udon ebandayo ekupheleni kokudla.
Ukudla kwafika ngemva kwemizuzu engu-20 ngifonele, ngibanda futhi ngi-soggy.
Sadla lapha ngoMashi, 2006 futhi wayala pre-yaseshashalazini 3-course dinner nge iwayini indiza.

Ngenkathi uhla lwe- $ 20 entrée lungabizi ngokweqile, eNew York City, nakanjani kukhona ukudla okungcono kulelo banga, futhi ngakho-ke i-Sapphire, naphezu komkhathi othandekayo, cishe ngeke ibe yindawo yokudlela engizobuyela kuyo.
Kodwa i-thai nakanjani ayikho enkulu -- i-bland futhi ayihlukaniseki.
Kodwa into mina nomkami esasiyizonda yayizwakala kakhulu futhi kwakuzwakala sengathi 'ibha' noma 'i-pub'.
Amanye amaseva akwenza uzizwe sengathi akwenzela umusa wokukulethela ukudla.
Ukuqala, satshelwa ukuthi kukhona ukulinda imizuzu engu-30 futhi saqala ukuhamba, lapho i-hostess inikeza ukusishayela umakhalekhukhwini wethu lapho itafula selilungile.
Nakuba sasifuna ulethisi ojwayelekile kanye namanye ama-walnuts amasaladi esiwatholile ayemakhulu.
Umkhathi mkhulu uma ukufuna kwakho indawo ebekiwe emuva kanye nendlela engabizi yokuchitha ngempelasonto ntambama.
Abanikazi nabasebenzi banobungane futhi i-pizza yabo imnandi.
U-Ive wacela umlindi wenqola iqabunga le-lotus eligoqiwe irayisi futhi waphendula emuva irayisi wavele wahamba.
Ukudla ngokuvamile kuhle kodwa ngokuqinisekile akuyona indawo yokuphumula yokuya.
Ngenhlanhla sasindisa indawo ye-BBQ Salmon, i-Sea Bass ne-Crispy Duck.
Eminyakeni edlule, ihlale inikeze isipiliyoni sokudlela ezijabulisayo ngokudla kwekhwalithi newayini.
Imenyu yewayini enamakhasi amathathu, ikhasi elilodwa le-entrée kanye nokwesabekayo.
Kanye for dinner futhi kanye for brunch.
thanda ukudla.

Ngiyamangala ngokubuyekezwa okungalungile- ngithola le ndawo ukuba ibe yi-standout Italian endaweni egcwele ama-Italian- amanani amakhulu, umkhathi omkhulu, insizakalo enhle kanye nohlu lwewayini olumangalisayo.
Banikeza imenyu efanayo kodwa baneziphuzo zokudala ezithwele utshwala namagama e-cheeky -- kodwa bayakubiza.
Ngenxa yokuthi sasingenakho ukubhuka, sasingahlala kuphela engadini yangemuva, kodwa kwakukuhle, kufihliwe futhi kuphelele esimweni sezulu esihle.

I-sushi ibilokhu isuka esilinganisweni kuya ngaphansi kwesilinganiso, insizakalo yokulinda ihlale ingaphansi kwe-par umkhathi usuka kumnandi kuya kokucasula ngempela (uma uhlala endaweni engaphesheya kwekhishi, ama-acousitcs athukuthele, yonke into ezwakalayo izwakala kakhulu).
Uhlu olukhulu lwewayini, olunentengo enengqondo.--Sara
Njengoba sithole i-Ping's ku-intanethi, sangena ngokwesaba kodwa ngokushesha sabekwa kalula ngamathangi ezinhlanzi akubingelela njengo-u walk in.
I-quail yayimnandi futhi iyingqayizivele futhi ama-pasta ayegcwele ukunambitheka.
Ukudla kwakungeyona into entsha, amasoso ayeyi-bland futhi enamafutha kakhulu.
Isevisi inobungane, amanani alungile - isikhathi sokulethwa sasihamba kancane kancane, kodwa ngendlela le pizza enambitheka ngayo, ngizimisele ukuyibheka.
I-bartender ekuhambeni kwami kwakamuva yayikhohlakele ngendlela emangalisayo kangangokuthi angisoze ngabuyela emuva.
Imenyu yokuthatha ithi ukugcina iso ngaphandle kwemenyu enwetshiwe enikeza izitsha eziningi zase-italy, angikwazi ukulinda!
Ukuze uthole ukudla okukhulu kwe-chinese eduze, une-Wu Liang Ye ne-Grand Sichuan nje i-block away.
Abasebenzi babematasa kakhulu be-oda i-sushi yesidlo sakusihlwa bese beyibeka ukuze badle ebha ukuze baze bangilethele isheke lami.
Ngangilapha emasontweni ambalwa emuva futhi saba nesipiliyoni esibi kakhulu sezinsizakalo zamakhasimende endaweni yokudlela.
AKUSEKHO ukubhuka, amathiphu abizayo nezinto ezicasulayo.
Ukunambitheka kwenza umlomo wakho ube ngamanzi ukuze uthole okuningi.
kodwa-ke, yinkonzo eshiya ukunambitheka okubi emlonyeni wami.
Ngaphandle kwenkonzo ye-crappy evela kubantu ababili, kuhle kakhulu.
Abaphathi abazange banake ngaphandle kokuthi ibhilidi laphenduka etafuleni ngaphambi kokuthi siqede.
Indawo sleek, yesimanje futhi ukudlala futhi i uzobuya futhi kaningi.
Ngivame ukuya khona kamuva ebusuku lapho ngisuka emsebenzini ukuze ngingabhekani nezihlwele noma imigqa.
I-crust inciphile, izithako zisha futhi abasebenzi banobungane.
Uma ngibheka, ngabona igumbi eligcwele abantu baseNew York bejabulela ukudla kwangempela endaweni yokudlela yangempela, hhayi i-clubhouse ye-fabulous ezama ukubonwa.
Siqede isipiliyoni sethu esikhulu ngokuthi uGulab Jamun (dessert) anconywe yi-waiter.
Phakathi nenkambo yezinyanga ezingu-3 ezedlule, umpheki nabasebenzi bashintsha futhi kwakungekho okungcono.
Ikakhulukazi ethandwa inkukhu tikka kanye naan, futhi dals.
Ukudla inludes edumile scrumptious bombay isitayela chaat ezifana bhelpuri, sevpuri futhi samosa chaats, kanye nezinye appetizers omkhulu indian.
Angiqiniseki ukuthi ngingabiza ukudla lapha i-Indian njengoba kuyi-fusion yalokho okubonakala sengathi isiFulentshi nge-Indian noma i-exotic touch.

Izitsha ezinikezwayo zaziyingqayizivele, zinambitheka kakhulu futhi zisanda kusuka kumasoseji wewundlu, ama-sardines anamabhisikidi, ama-shrimp amakhulu aphelele kuya ku-ayisikhilimu emangalisayo ye-pistachio (engcono kakhulu futhi entsha kunazo zonke engake ngaba nayo).
Ngaba nokudla okwesabekayo, futhi iseva yethu yasiqondisa ewayinini elihle kakhulu ebangeni lethu lentengo, esikhundleni sokusivumela ukuthi sithenge iwayini elinentengo efanayo eyayingalungile.
Abasebenzi bokulinda kumnandi, kumnandi, futhi isikhathi esiningi langa (ngendlela emangalisayo yobuhle bobuhle, hhayi ngokuthi yena-way-cuter-than-me-that-b@ # $ * indlela).
Ube nesidlo sakusihlwa ebusuku ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.
Abasebenzi bebelokhu benobungane ngaphandle kokubonakala be-grating, futhi umpheki uye wasibingelela izikhathi ezimbalwa.
Isisebenzi esinobungane kuphela kwakungumfana ebha.
Ilayisi lalisezingeni elibi futhi laliphekwe kabi kakhulu kwakunzima.
Ngilinde isikhathi esingaphezu kwehora elilodwa ukudla.
Abasebenzi benza uzizwe usekhaya, ukudla kukhulu futhi umkhathi uyamangalisa!
Senze ukubhuka kwesidlo sakusihlwa sokuqala futhi sahlabeka umxhwele ngokuphelele, kungikhumbuza ugogo wami, indawo yayo yakudala yesikole sase-Italy enezinto eziningi ezimnandi zokuncoma.
I-sauce ku-pizza inhle kakhulu nge-garlic kanye notamatisi omusha futhi aba-skimp.
Ngesikhathi ngihlala enyakatho isikhashana ngangithenga iqhwa lama-bagels futhi ayesazoba ngcono kunanoma yikuphi okunye.
Inkonzo inhle kakhulu, i-decor inkulu, futhi ukudla kumnandi futhi kuza ngezingxenye ezinkulu.
Kusukela ku-caviar emangalisayo kuya ku-waitstaff enomusa, ngazizwa njengamakhosi futhi ngajabulela yonke imizuzwana yayo.
I-porcini mushroom pasta ekhethekile yayinganambitheki, kanjalo ne-tagliatelle yokudla kwasolwandle.
Le nsizakalo yayiqaphela futhi iziphakamiso zakhe zezinto zemenyu zazilungile emkhawulweni.
zama i-appetizer ye-shrimp ebabayo (futhi, hhayi inani elikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni kodwa kufanelekile intengo) futhi i-vindaloo yewundlu inkulu.
Abasebenzi bayasiza ngendlela emangalisayo futhi balalela.
Besilokhu silandela ukudla kompheki uLyle ezungeze iNew York iminyaka engu-15 futhi ngenkathi sihlala siyi-classic, izinto zakhe ezintsha ezine-bistro fare zisenze sabuya futhi sabuya.
I-sushi isilinganiso futhi amanani noma yini kodwa.
Ukuhlobisa kwendawo kanye nezindlu zangasese ezifihliwe kwenza ukuhleka okuhle.
Empeleni i-waiter yathela amanzi esandleni sami yahamba.
Kuhle Reuben sandwich wake!
Ngenkathi i-ambiance nomkhathi kwakukhulu, ukudla nenkonzo kwakungaba ngcono kakhulu.
I-Baluchi's inokudla okuqinile kanye nokuhlobisa okuhle ngamanani afanele.

Ngisho nangemva kokuxoshwa yi-no-class Famous Ray's, uSal uphinde wavuka ukuze aqhubeke namafa kamalume kayise ngokumomotheka, uthando lweqiniso ngomphakathi wakhe, futhi masingakhohlwa i-Outstanding Pizza!
Bakhombisa imizuzu engu-15 ngemuva kokuncibilika kwe-tuna.

Nakuba ngokungangabazeki uzohlala etafuleni ngalokho okubonakala sengathi indawo encane ngokwanele (kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ubukhulu beqembu lakho), i-atomosphere efudumele ifanele amakota axinekile- uzozijabulisa futhi ukhohlwe ngendawo eqinile okuyo.
Umkhathi mkhulu!!
Ngiyazibuza nje ukuthi ungaba kanjani nokudla okumnandi kangaka kwemali encane kangaka.

Ukulinda lapha isikhathi eside i-dim sum, kodwa uma ungathandi ukwabelana ngamatafula noma uma umkhathi ojwayelekile we-raucous dim sum ungeyona i-gig yakho, lokhu kungenye indlela ebukekayo (ye-Chinatown).
I-pizza yayihle ngempela.
Le nkonzo yayinobungane futhi umkhathi wawungajwayelekile.
Kulula kakhulu ukuthola ukubhuka endaweni ephezulu e-NYC ngesaziso sesonto.
Nga-oda i-tamarind duck futhi umkami wa-oda ama-noodle ngenyama yenkomo yomhlaba, futhi sobabili sajabula ngendlela izitsha ezavusa ngayo ukunambitheka kweThailand ngezindlela ezingalindelekile.
Ikhwalithi yokudla inhle kakhulu futhi intengo ishibhile, inamathele enyameni yengulube, inhlanzi, inkukhu, iwundlu nemifino.
Ukudla kufanelekile okungcono kakhulu, futhi i-ambience, kahle, indaba yombono, abanye bangase bakubheke njengento emnandi, ngacabanga ukuthi kuyacasula nje.
Inkonzo yayihle kakhulu futhi ukudla kwakumnandi.
I-anti-pasta yayihle kakhulu, ikakhulukazi i-calamari, njengoba kwakunjalo nokugcwalisa ama-pasta mains.

Abazange babe nemayonnaise, bakhohlwa i-toast yethu, bashiya ngaphandle izithako (ie ushizi ku-omelet), ngaphansi kwamazinga okushisa ashisayo futhi i-bacon yayiphelile kakhulu iphekwe yaqhekeka epuletini lapho uyithinta.
Ukukhethwa okukhulu kwewayini, i-Gigondas ifanele intengo, futhi i-champagne yendlu iyinani elikhulu.
I babe phezu 100 uzinyosi ezahlukene ukunikela isivakashi sabo ukuze lokho kwenza umyeni wami ujabule kakhulu futhi ukudla kwaba okumnandi, uma kumele batusa isidlo kumele kube pumkin tortelini.
Inkonzo enkulu, ukudla okukhulu.
Izitsha zenyama manje zihlobisa okukhethiwe, nakuba kusekhona inani elikhulu lokukhetha imifino.
Uma ufuna ucezu lwenyama yenkomo, ikhanda ngaphezulu.

Kusukela kuhlelo lokusebenza lompheki wokuncoma we-butternut squash ravioli ebucayi ku-truffle sauce emnandi kuya ku-buttery emangalisayo kanye ne-tender langostine entrée kuya ku-dessert engingayikhumbuli ngenxa ye-Cakebread Cabernet enhle kakhulu esasiyiphuza -- kusihlwa sonke kwakumangalisa.
Kuyinto nje O.K. pizza.
Ngidle kuSawule, izikhathi eziningi, ukudla kuhlale kuhlala kuhle njalo, ngokunyanyekayo.
Zama Pad Thai, kungcono fabulous futhi amanani abo ezishibhile kangaka!
Kubantu abafuna ukudla okukhulu kanye nenkonzo enkulu, iRoxy iyindawo yokugwema!
Isinkwa nama-chops wewundlu enganginawo ngaphambi kokudla kwakukuhle kakhulu, noma kunjalo.
Kodwa pizza indlela ezibizayo.
Ngibe ne-pizza zombili izikhathi kanye ne-caprese salad appetizer.
Right off the deegan ezinkulu uthola ladies kusuka kulo lonke idolobha.
Le ndawo has the best Chinese isitayela BBQ izimbambo edolobheni.
Inkonzo ingavamile, nokho ayikhukhumezi, futhi ukuhlobisa kuletha ukunambitheka kwe-SoHo ehamba phambili eQueens.
Izinja ezishisayo zazibanda phakathi futhi ama-buns ayengama-stale.
Kuyinto super-nemfashini futhi kukhona njalo umuntu ukuthatha ukuthi isihlalo ezingenalutho, ngakho kubonakala sengathi kwamakhasimende iye yathathwa hhayi ingqikithi.
Zama i-sea bass.
Ezinye izivakashi wajabulela pizza, santa fe isaladi oqoshiwe nenhlanzi kanye chips.
Its kuwufanele ukulinda Nokho.
Sasinama-dessert amakhulu (kufaka phakathi i-cannoli engcono kakhulu engake ngaba nayo) bese benikeza isiphuzo ngemuva kokudla kwakusihlwa, endlini.
I-ambience inhle futhi imnandi ingxoxo, ngakho-ke isidlo sasemini esingajwayelekile lapha cishe kungaba kuhle kakhulu.
Sasisahleli ebha ngenkathi siphuza i-sangria, kodwa sibheke kude nebha lapho sibuyela emuva, i- $ 2 yayihambile abantu abaseceleni kwethu bathi i-bartender yayithatha.
Ngemuva kokuzijabulisa ngempela ebha sahlala phansi etafuleni futhi sadla isidlo sakusihlwa.
I-Guacamole + shrimp appetizer yayinkulu ngempela, sobabili sasine-filet, enhle kakhulu, ayizange ithande kakhulu ama-frites afika nawo, kodwa i-filet yayihle kakhulu, akekho kithi owayekhathalela.
Konke kubukeka kuhle, iziphuzo, ukuhlobisa, ukudla, ngisho nabantu.
Ilayisi lalisezingeni elibi futhi laliphekwe kabi kakhulu kwakunzima.
umkhathi Excellent, izitsha okumnandi inkonzo enhle futhi friendly.
Abasebenzi akuyona inobungane noma abanamakhono kakhulu, futhi nginamathele enkonzweni, kodwa konke okunye ngale ndawo kwenza.
Imizuzu engu-20 yokubhuka kwethu kodwa yasinika isikhathi sokuthi sibe nama-cocktails ambalwa futhi sijabulele indawo esizungezile nomunye.
I-sandwich ye-Pastrami yayifana ne-buttah futhi ngama-pickle kanye nobhiya obandayo oneqhwa ukuyigeza phansi, kwakuyinto ejabulisayo.
Ithebula eliseceleni kwethu labuza ukuthi ngabe wachoboza amagilebhisi ngokwakhe lapho ibhodlela lawo lewayini elide ekugcineni lifika.
Ukudla okukhulu (isipinashi kanye nama-dumplings ommbila kanye ne-massamman curry), insizakalo enobungane kakhulu futhi engenangqondo kanye nendawo yokugezela ehlanzekile ne-funky.
Umkakhe uTanya, i-hostess, uqedela umoya oduduzayo ngokujabulisa ukufudumala nomusa.

I-pizza ecacile yayiyi-soggy kanye ne-mushroom yasendle yokudala (isizukulwane sesithathu-Fornini) i-pizza esasinayo yayigcwele amafutha e-truffle phakathi ( futhi okwenza kube ne-soggy) kanye ne-nothingon konke okunye.
Zonke kalula zilethwe kwesokudla emnyango.
Intandokazi yethu okuvunyelwene ngayo yi-orrechiete nge-sausage nenkukhu (ngokuvamile ama-waiters anomusa ngokwanele ukuhlukanisa isidlo ngesigamu ukuze uthole ukusampula kokubili inyama).
Ngingakuncoma kakhulu uNina kunoma ubani ofuna ukuba nesidlo sakusihlwa sothando enhliziyweni efudumele ezungezile egcwele amakhandlela nezithombe zomndeni.
Ithebula lethu elincane lababili (amapuleti esidlweni alengiswe phezu komphetho) laliphakathi kwenye yezindlela ze-waiter traffic.
Le nsizakalo yayiqaphela, kodwa ingafaki, ukudla kwakungcono kakhulu kunezindawo zokudlela eziningi ezidume kabi eMidtown futhi uhlu lwewayini lukhulu futhi lunentengo enhle.
Le ndawo ingakhonzwa kangcono kakhulu ngokuqhutshwa yiqembu eliqonda ngempela insizakalo yamakhasimende.
Kodwa-ke, bane-pastrami emangalisayo kakhulu futhi amasobho ashaye indawo.
Ukulunywa ngakunye kokudla eKai ngempela kwakumnandi, kusha, futhi kuhle.
I-pizza enkulu yendawo yokudla kwasemini.
Ukudla isilinganiso, futhi ngingasho ngisho chain yokudlela Baluchi sika ukunambitheka kangcono.
Kusukela ekuqaleni appetizers, scallops kwaba Amazing, ukuze okumnandi ushokoledi souffle nge rasberry Mint sorbet, sajabula imizwa ukunambitheka.
Ukudla okukhulu (isipinashi kanye nama-dumplings ommbila kanye ne-massamman curry), insizakalo enobungane kakhulu futhi engenangqondo kanye nendawo yokugezela ehlanzekile ne-funky.
Kumele ube ne-crabmeat lasagna ephuma kuleli zwe kanye ne-chocolate bread pudding ye-dessert.
Kufana nokuthi bathatha inkukhu esele, bathela amafutha futhi bafafaza i-pepper powder phezu kwayo (isoso lalikhanya futhi libomvu).
Le nsizakalo yayiqaphela, kodwa ingafaki, ukudla kwakungcono kakhulu kunezindawo zokudlela eziningi ezidume kabi eMidtown futhi uhlu lwewayini lukhulu futhi lunentengo enhle.
Asikaze sibe nezinkinga zokushaja isidlo noma ithiphu, futhi ukudla kwahanjiswa ngokushesha, kodwa siphila imizuzu embalwa kuphela ukuhamba kusuka kubo.
uma ufuna i-sushi yendabuko ephelele, iya lapha - uma ufuna inhlanganisela ethakazelisayo, zama i-sushi ye-gari's (empumalanga).
Sihamba ngoMsombuluko ukulungiswa kwe-prix futhi isipiliyoni sethu ngokudla siye saqhathaniswa ne-Blue Ribbon.
Ukuze indawo, amanani anengqondo kakhulu.
Sasidla ngaphandle kuvulandi ongemuva, okufanelekile njengoba kupholile futhi umculo uzwa kahle lapho.
Angikaze ngibe ne-cheescake enje.
I-Waitstaff inkulu, iqaphela kakhulu.
Indawo yokudlela snobs akudingeki ukukhathazeka, lena encane, umakhelwane uhlobo indawo.
Zama i-salmon ye-tandoori!
Uhlu lwewayini alukhulu, futhi ama-dessert athunyelwa kusuka eBruno's phansi emgwaqweni, okungekuhle njengoba kwakukade kunjalo.
ke sa-oda imiqulu ye-dinosaur kanye ne-white tuna sashimi.
Futhi, uma ungafuni ukuhlala etafuleni elithile, akudingeki!
i-kicker yangempela yemenyu, noma kunjalo, yi-cubes yenkomo noma inkukhu ene-chili ne-lemon utshani.
Ukukhathazeka kuphela enginakho nge-slighly all-business waitstaff aba-oda futhi baphonse ukudla phansi, bekuphuthuma ngaphandle.
Kodwa lapho uhleli ama-waitresses amakhulu, achaza konke kwimenyu, futhi intengo yokudla ishibhile ngempela kwinsizakalo oyitholayo.
Inhlanzi yakhiwa ngokweqile.
Iwayini elikhulu, ukudla okukhulu.

Indodana yethu ithanda i-pizza futhi sine-pizzaria eqinisekisiwe ye-Neapolitan edolobheni lethu lasekhaya (Seattle), sithande lokhu cishe kakhulu - futhi umehluko wawungaphezu kokukhetha komuntu siqu kunanoma yikuphi ukucabanga kunoma iyiphi indawo yokudlela.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, irayisi lalingenazo izinongo, ngakho-ke i-sushi yayiyi-bland futhi inyanyekayo.

Kodwa ungalokothi oda ubhekeni sekwephuzile at nite (noma ngoqwembe noma sandwich, ngoba leyo ndaba musa kunoma iyiphi indawo ukuthatha out) njengoba kusukela ekuseni ukuthosa kuvela kanzima cishe like bacos, ukulimaza molars yami.
I-ambiance incane ukudla akuyona into emangalisayo, kodwa ezinye izitsha zinhle kakhulu, njenge-eggplant parmesan, i-veal ku-carozza inkukhu saltimbocca.
Kungenzeka ukuthi igcwele kancane ngezimpelasonto, kodwa i-vibe inhle futhi ukudla okuhle kakhulu kwesiFulentshi ozothola endaweni.
Ukudla okulula okududuzayo nokuthi yiziphi izingxenye ezishisayo ne-lage.
I-Cornelia Street ibukeka njengesethi ye-Broadway ye-West Side Story futhi ngaphakathi kwe-Po i-quaint epholile kakhulu ngempela awukwazi phezulu ukubeka isidlo sothando e-NYC.
Uhlu olukhulu lwewayini, olunentengo enengqondo.--Sara

Ngiyaqonda indawo kanye nabantu akudingeki uze lapha nge-ambiance yothando, ehehayo noma insizakalo yezinkanyezi ezinhlanu ezifaka i-sommlier kanye ne-maze eyinkimbinkimbi yomphathi kanye nama-waiters emuva - uze ukudla okuyiqiniso, ukunambitheka, isipiliyoni.
Awuqiniseki ukuthi umhlaziyi wangaphambilini, i-lonk, wadla kuphi, kodwa uSawule usendaweni enkulu futhi unokudla okukhulu!
I-decor ilula kakhulu kodwa ikhululekile.
Uma useqenjini elikhulu, le ndawo iphelele ngoba iphinde icomends ukwabelana - bane-susans evilaphayo ematafuleni amaningi - ngisho nemindeni ingazizwa ikhululekile lapha.
Nakuba amatafula angase abekwe eduze, i-candle-light, i-food-quality kanye ne-service overcompensate.
Ukudla kwakubukeka ku-appetizing kakhulu futhi kumnandi kusukela kwafika ezinhlobonhlobo zamapuleti amahle.
Ama-dosas ayi-skimpy, angathandeki futhi aconsa ngamafutha, futhi ngokwami ngingaphuza i-popcorn topping ngaphambi kokuba ngidle enye yalezi.
Ibha epholile ngokudla okukhulu, namathani obhiya omuhle kakhulu.
I-ambient engabizi kakhulu futhi enhle kakhulu!
Ukudla kukhulu, inkonzo ilungile.

Kodwa ungalokothi oda ubhekeni sekwephuzile at nite (noma ngoqwembe noma sandwich, ngoba leyo ndaba musa kunoma iyiphi indawo ukuthatha out) njengoba kusukela ekuseni ukuthosa kuvela kanzima cishe like bacos, ukulimaza molars yami.
Le yindawo enhle njalo yokudla isidlo sasemini noma isidlo sakusihlwa.
Abasebenzi lapho futhi ngokuphelele ukulayisha bagel nge ukhilimu ushizi (uthola kancane ezingcolile).
Indawo ipholile kakhulu futhi insizakalo iyashesha futhi iyaphulukisa.
Ukudla kwakukhulu.
nje wabuya ekudleni kwasemini eTamarind futhi kwakubaluleke kakhulu.
Le nsizakalo ngezinye izikhathi ayinakho ukugxila futhi akulungile uma uphuthuma kodwa angikaze ngiphathwe ngolaka.
Umculo wenza umsindo omncane ngezinye izikhathi, kodwa kwangenza nje ngafuna ukuncika eduze nomkami omuhle, futhi njengoba ngenza, ngathola i-whiff ye-corriander.
Yindawo yokudlela ephelele yesitayela sokuphila se-NY, yathola umklamo opholile, iziphuzo ezi-awsome nokudla kanye ne-lot's yabantu ababukeka kahle abadla futhi belenga ebha epinki ...
I-hostess inolaka kuze kube seqophelweni lokuhlasela.
Imenyu ye-sake akufanele inganakwa!
Kodwa-ke, ehlobo lika-2003, kubonakala sengathi abaphathi bashintshile futhi umnyango omkhulu omkhulu uye wathathelwa indawo ye-glass front ridding ngokwayo ye-getup emnyama yothando.
Qiniseka ukuzama zonyaka, futhi njalo okumnandi, okukhethekile.
Ngeke siphinde siye kule ndawo ukuze sidle kahle.
Ushizi ipuleti kuyinto injabulo ezihlukahlukene futhi bargain omkhulu at $ 10.
Ngathola ukuthi ukudla kuvelele, ikakhulukazi isidlo se-salmon enganginazo.
Saqala nge-cheese fondue (ingxube yezandla) futhi sengeze ama-apula ne-kielbasa ukucwilisa.
Into kuphela emangalisayo kunokudla (okuyinto engavamile) yinkonzo.
I-Thalia iyindawo yokudlela enhle enabantu abahle abakukhonzayo, kodwa ukudla akuhambisani kahle.
Ikhwalithi yokudla kule ndawo yokudlela ehambisana ne-jazz ebukhoma emnandi yenza le ndawo ibe yi-10 ephelele!
Umfana wami wayeneNew England Chowder kwakuhle kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi umklomelo kufanele uye eLobis Bisque.
Bengingeke ngize ngikhononde nakancane uma ukudla okungenani kunambitheka kahle kodwa ikhwalithi yokudla yayiyi-crappy, futhi.
Ngingakuncoma ukubhuka ngezimpelasonto noma kunjalo.
Isitayela esithandwa kakhulu Izakaya (Sake kanye nengxenye encane izitsha sake-friendly ).
abantu bakhohlakele kancane futhi yi-york entsha!
Indawo emangalisayo!
Ukudla kumnandi futhi kulungiselelwe kahle kanye nenkonzo enobungane neyomuntu.
Saqala nge-lox kanye nama-mussels (i-ive engcono kakhulu eyake yaba nayo, kuze kube nini) futhi saba ne-cod ne-trout yesidlo sakusihlwa.
Uma ufuna ikhwalithi enhle, ukudla okungabizi - lena indawo.
Futhi izingxenye ezinkulu ngempela.
Ukuhlala kwaba uma bezama ukuthola inani eliphezulu labantu endaweni yokudlela, ngakho-ke yiba mnandi kumakhelwane wakho uma udla lapha.
I-parmesan ye-eggplant nayo inkulu, futhi umngane wami okhulele eManhattan uthi akekho okhonza i-ziti ebhakwe kangcono nge-meatsauce.
Le ndawo has realy sushi fresh kanye imenyu enhle enkulu cuisine Japanese zakudala.
Ngabe ngithole i-cole slaw kanye ne-knish uma isisu sami sinesikhala esikhulu.
Ukudla kwakulungiselelwe kahle futhi inkonzo ingaqondile.
Izihlalo azikhululekile uma uhleli odongeni emabhentshini okhuni.
Intengo inengqondo nakuba insizakalo impofu.
Lapho ngiphuma isidlo sakusihlwa esihle, ngithanda i-ambiance enhle kanye nokudla okuhle kakhulu.
I-Pizza ihle kakhulu, njengoba kunjalo ne-pasta eyenziwe ekhaya.
Isidlo sasemini safika nama-pickels kanye ne-slaw, akukho ukushaja okwengeziwe.
Ngezinhlobonhlobo ezinkulu kwimenyu , ngidla lapha kaningi futhi angikaze ngibe nesithukuthezi .
Le yindawo enhle njalo yokudla isidlo sasemini noma isidlo sakusihlwa.
Yebo, basebenzisa izithako ezinhle, kodwa ngisho nezithako ezinhle azenzeli i-pizza enhle ngaphandle kokuthi umuntu azi ukuthi angathola kanjani i-crust kahle.
Abasebenzi bahle kakhulu, i-specjal: leyo ntombazane ngemuva kwebha, i-european chic.

Servings ezincane for entrée main, i kwadingeka salmon (akazange umxhwele) intombi kwadingeka inkukhu, kwakukuhle.
safika lapha ngoMgqibelo ebusuku obugcwele futhi sasihleli khona lapho yize sekuphele imizuzu engu-15 yokugcina kwethu.
I-Halibut yayinosawoti kakhulu, i-dessert yayinjalo (ungachithi noma yimaphi amakhalori akho) futhi inkonzo yayimpofu.
Ngaba ne-tuna tartare ngenxa, i-mushroom ravioli ene-pinot noir, kanye ne-chocolate sampler enewayini le-dessert nge- $ 49.
Ngisho ne-pasta imnandi lapha (into engavamile ezindaweni zokudlela ze-pizza zaseNew York).
I-steak emnandi, i-loin yengulube, imisebenzi.
Iziphuzo zazihle kakhulu, futhi i-dessert yayinhle.
Futhi uKruno, umphathi wesiphuzo uyi-bartender engcono kakhulu engingakafiki kuyo.
Umkhathi omuhle, inhlanganisela yazo zonke ikhodi yokugqoka umculo eshisayo iqinile ngaphandle koLwesihlanu.
Ngincoma ama-shrimp we-garlic, i-okra (bindi), nanoma yini enewundlu.
Uma ufuna ezinye duck eyosiwe, inyama yengulube noma inkukhu ku irayisi nge ginger, zama kubo!
Ukudla inludes edumile scrumptious bombay isitayela chaat ezifana bhelpuri, sevpuri futhi samosa chaats, kanye nezinye appetizers omkhulu indian.
Indawo epholile yokulenga nabangani bakho ngeziphuzo ezimbalwa ezinempilo nama-dessert.
Ngiye ezindaweni eziningana ze-Dim Sum futhi lokhu kufanele kube yi-WORST.
Ngahamba nabangani be-5 futhi sahlala etafuleni kancane futhi asizange sizizwe siphuthuma nhlobo yize kwakukhona ukulinda.
Mina nomyeni wami siye saba khona izikhathi ezimbalwa futhi isikhathi ngasinye sasihlala ebha ye-sushi (umpheki uYoshi) futhi sa-oda yonke into ala carte.
Ukudla kuvelele futhi insizakalo iyashesha, inobungane futhi ichwepheshe kakhulu.
Futhi ekuphethweni kwaleli phupho lokupheka isheke lanikezwa itafula lethu ngokugwaza ingilazi yamanzi.
Ukudla kwakumangalisa, futhi insizakalo yayishesha futhi iwusizo, kodwa hhayi ukuthwala ngokweqile noma ukuphuthuma.
I-ambience izolile kakhulu futhi ithule.
Ngingakuncoma uRoxy ngalokho, kodwa hhayi ukudla kwabo.
Ngenkathi igumbi lingakhululekile ikakhulukazi, uma usuhleli uzokhohlwa ngakho konke ngaphandle kwalokho okusepuletini lakho.
Ukuphoxeka kuphela kwaba ijazi isheke amantombazane ababebonakala bengazi ukuthi ikhasimende ebusuku ngokoqobo non-matasa (ngoba ijazi isheke amantombazane).
Ama-waitresses amnandi-futhi ungathola nje ukuhlala kwenkonzo yokuphikisana.
Iwayini inkonzo yayihle kakhulu futhi.
I-Dim Sum yayinjalo-ngakho, kodwa hhayi emangalisayo.
I-Rao's inensizakalo engcono kakhulu nomkhathi e-NYC.
Intengo enengqondo kakhulu.
Kusukela ekuqaleni appetizers, scallops kwaba Amazing, ukuze okumnandi ushokoledi souffle nge rasberry Mint sorbet, sajabula imizwa ukunambitheka.
Ama-Bagels avelele, kodwa uthola lokho okukhokhayo.
Ngincoma kakhulu iCafe St. Bart's ngokudla kwabo, i-ambience kanye nenkonzo emangalisayo.
Abasebenzi be-accomodating, ukudla kwakumnandi ngokuphelele futhi indawo iyathandeka.
Ukudla okukhulu, ukubeka okukhulu kanye nenkonzo esabekayo.
Asikho isizathu senkonzo enjalo ye-lousy!
Mina nabangani bami sathola ushizi omangalisayo kanye nemenyu emnandi, entsha yasehlobo e-Artisanal izolo ebusuku.
Into kuphela emangalisayo kunokudla (okuyinto engavamile) yinkonzo.
Inhlanganisela fresh utamatisi sauce, fresh mozz ushizi, basil kanye inhlama benza ngofulawa amazwe, kwenza lokhu ingenye pizza kangcono e NY.
zombili ngentengo enengqondo kakhulu (azungeze i- $ 8 yesidlo sakusihlwa kanye ne- $ 5 yokudla kwasemini), futhi zimnandi futhi zigcwalisa.
Ukudla okukhulu, ukuhlobisa okukhulu, inkonzo enkulu.
Isobho le-udon kwakuyi-soy sauce namanzi.
Uma ucabangela intengo yabo ye- $ 6.25 yesidlo sasemini esikhethekile, isidlo sasincane ngokuhlekisayo.
I-Guacamole + shrimp appetizer yayinkulu ngempela, sobabili sasine-filet, enhle kakhulu, ayizange ithande kakhulu ama-frites afika nawo, kodwa i-filet yayihle kakhulu, akekho kithi owayekhathalela.
Isevisi esheshayo.

Kude lokhu kuphela ama-dessert aseShayina indawo engiyaziyo e-NY noma kuphi eduze eNyakatho-mpumalanga yeMelika ekhonza ama-dessert nge-frog jelly ezinhlobonhlobo ezimbalwa nezinyawo zengulube i-ginger ebilisiwe kuviniga omnyama.
Uma nje i-martini esheshayo ebha (engiyincoma uJeffery's) noma ingqondo eshaywa i-Roast Chicken, iya eVillage!
intandokazi yami siqu kuyinto konke bagel nge lox ukusabalala, kodwa zonke bagles kukhona ngokungakholwa okuhle.
Okokuqala, i-waiter eyayisikhonza yayinganaki ukusigcwalisa kuma-specials, engangizokhetha ukube ngangazi ngawo.
Isamba esifiphele simnandi ngenkathi amanani alula kakhulu esikhwameni.
Zama congee kanye donut like inhlama ezijulile ethosiwe babiza Ow Ley Soh, isinkwa okumnandi futhi amnandi ukunambitha.
Satshelwa ukuthi ukulinda kwaba cishe imizuzu engamashumi amabili futhi ngeke kube nenkinga yocingo lwethu lwekhethini lwe-8:00 pm.
Basiphatha kahle futhi ukudla kwakusha ngokwedlulele futhi kulungiselelwe kahle.
Isikhathi sethu sokuqala eNew York futhi kwadingeka sizame iNew York Bagel.
Bane-Indian eyiqiniso ngamanani amangalisayo.
Grilled inhlanzi yonke emangalisayo, spicing omkhulu.
Ngisho noma ngenza ukubhuka ngo-3pm ngobusuku obufanayo nge-Dinnerbroker, sasihleli etafuleni ngenye yombono omuhle kakhulu!
Ibha enkulu, ama-bartenders amaningi amahle kakhulu owake wabona (ngokuqondile inkosikazi ye-blond).
Inkonzo ihlanjululwe kakhulu: ukuhlala kwethu kwabambezeleka imizuzu engu-35 edlule ukubhuka kwethu futhi i-maitre d 'yaxolisa futhi yasigcina njalo sazisa intuthuko.
Ukudla kwakuhle kakhulu kodwa kwakushisa futhi kuhle ngezingxenye ezinkulu.
I-bruscetta kancane soggy, kodwa amasaladi ayesha, kuhlanganisiwe ingxube enhle imifino eluhlaza (hhayi iceberg) zonke izitsha zikhonzwa piping hot kusukela ekhishini.
Ama-Appetizers azungeze i- $ 7 ngayinye futhi izitsha eziyinhloko ziphakathi kwe- $ 11 ne- $ 16.
Isobho elishisayo futhi elimuncu lalishisa ngokungabekezeleleki futhi linambitheka nge-pepper kuphela futhi akukho okunye.
Noma kunjalo, zama kanye, kusukela uma uqeda ukuthanda ukudla, kungaba okunye okuhlangenwe nakho kwakho okuhle kakhulu kokudlela.

Sikhethekile kakhulu mayelana ne-sushi futhi sobabili sasijabulisa ngakho konke ukukhetha okubandakanya: i-ceviche mix (ekhethekile), ama-crab dumplings, i-sashimi ye-assorted, i-sushi ne-rolls, izinhlobo ezimbili ze-sake, kanye ne-banana tempura.
Kuhle kakhulu amaqembu amakhulu nemikhosi - i-waiter yethu ye-SUPER HAPPY kwakuwukuzijabulisa kusihlwa.
Ngangithanda ngempela ukuthinta okuhlukile futhi okuhlanganisiwe okungukuthi umpheki unikeza ukudla.
Ukudla kwasolwandle kuyamangalisa, kukhona uhlu oluhle lwewayini, futhi imenyu eshintsha njalo ihlala inikeza ezinye izimanga ezinkulu.
Ukudla kwakubuhlungu ngokuphelele!
Le ndawo iyindawo enkulu yokumisa ukudla okukhulu.
Okokuqala i-sushi yayivelele, okwesibili kwakuyi-bland encane.
Pakanga pane kumirira kwenguva refu kwetafura kunze, asi zvakanga zvishoma zvakanyanya kupisa muzuva zvakadaro saka tafura yedu ye insde yakanga yakanaka kwazvo.
Nguva dzose dziri mbiri takamirira zvakanaka kupfuura hafu yeawa yetafura (kunyange zvazvo taiva nekuchengetedza).

Vakanga vasina mayonnaise, vakakanganwa tosti yedu, vakasiya zvinhu zvinogadzirwa (kureva chizi mune omelet), pasi pekupisa kunopisa uye bacon yakanga yakanyanya kubikwa yakapunzika pane ndiro pawakaibata.
Chikafu chacho chaishamisa, uye basa racho rakanga rakakurumidza uye rinobatsira, asi kwete kupfuura-kubereka kana kumhanya.
Nepo ivo kuchengeta capex kuti zvishoma, vanoita kuisa imwe mari kupinda bagels, nokuti ivo pakati yakanakisisa muguta.
Kana iwe uchida mimhanzi yako yakaputitswa uye hurongwa hahusi hukuru uye kana iwe uchida kubhadhara kanenge 100 dhora bhodhoro minimun ipapo iwe uchazvida pano.
KUNYUNYUTA KUKURU: HAPANA TOASTING IRIPO.
Takamhanya zvishoma kunonoka nokuda kuchengetedza asi zvakanga zvisina dambudziko kuwana tafura yedu pakarepo.
THe Pizza uye waini zvakanga zvakaisvonaka-basa zvakare--asi chii chaizvoizvo MADE nzvimbo iyi yaiva kuseri kudyira nzvimbo.
Usiku pasina kuchengetedza, taifanira kumirira pabhawa kwenguva pfupi, asi maneja akanga akanaka kwazvo uye akaita kuti kumirira kwedu kuve chiitiko chikuru.
Takanga tine poto-zvinonamatira izvo zvakanga zvikuru uye tempura ndiro yakanga yakakura.
Handisati ndadya gwayana chop inonaka sezvo,saladi dzakanaka chaizvo dzakapfeka lemon uye extra virgnin olive oil.
Nzvimbo iyi haienzaniswi neMamoun's maererano nemutengo, kutsva, kukosha, uye unhu hwakatumirwa, asi ndizvo chete maonero angu.
Saka, menyu yakanyorwa mu chalk pamusoro pemusoro wako uye zvose zvinonzwika zvinonaka.
Kubva kune basa rinotyisa, kune zvokudya zvisina kunaka, tisingatauri nezvevatungamiriri vasina kugara, chiitiko chose chaityisa.
Waitress akakarakadza magirazi ewaini ayo akafamba zvakanaka zvikuru nezvokudya.
Iyo itsva, yakanakisisa yakasiyana-siyana, uye inokurumidza kuendesa.
The waini uye chizi ndiro zvakawanda uye havagoni kumirira kuedza fondue kana tafura grilling.
Iyo flavors yakasimba uye inonyengera.
Kuti tipemberere zuva rokuzvarwa, vatatu vedu takaenda kuMare tichikarira zvokudya zvikuru.
Zvakanga zvakafanana nemaseva akakanganwa kuti chaizvoizvo vaishanda ipapo uye panzvimbo pezvo vaida kutandara uye kutonhora.
Hove dzacho itsva uye chidimbu chimwe nechimwe chinochekwa kusvika pakukwana uye chakagadzirwa ne sushi chef (kazhinji ine zvishoma zvitsva wasabi uye soy sauce asiwo dzimwe nguva nemunyu wegungwa).
Basa rakanga riri devine, oysters apo munhu wenyama sezvavanouya, uye mutengo haugoni kurohwa!!
Zvose pamusoro pezvokudya !!
ivo vakaita kupa 15% discount pakupedzisira, zvakanga zvisina kukwana, sezvo vaiziva kuti basa racho raityisa.
Apo mhuri yakapinda akavapa mapurogiramu ekuedza mapalet avo, uye ipapo akarayira kwavari.
Enda pano kudya kwerudo asi kwete kune zvose kunze wow kudya ruzivo.
Chengetedza mari yako uye usatambisa macalorie ako, enda kuMargharita's paWashington Street panzvimbo, vane zvokudya zvinoshamisa uye basa rakanaka.
Decor is minimalist uye yakachena - hapana chekutsausa kana kurumbidza.
Killer Sushi!

Ndinofanira kunyevera muverengi kuti zvikamu zvakakura zviduku zvikuru (kunyanya appetizers), saka kana iwe uchironga kudya kusvikira wazara uye usina chinangwa chekuraira chef's special tasting menu, gadzirira kuraira uye kubhadhara appetizer (1 dish yemunhu mumwe nomumwe nekuti zvikamu hazvisi zvekugoverana),  chinhu chikuru entree, uye udon inotonhora pakupera kwekudya.
Zvinonyadzisa kuti nzvimbo yakanaka, yakakodzera sePink Pony inogona kuparadzwa kwazvo nebasa re lousy.
Kana iwe uri kutsvaga kudya kukuru pamutengo wakakodzera, enda kuDel Frisco's!
Takanga crawfish yakabikwa uye pasinei kuita kuvhiringidzika, yaiva tani mafaro uye zvikuru inonaka uyewo.
Isu, taiva vana, takasvika masikati - nzvimbo yacho yakanga isina chinhu - uye vashandi vakaita sokuti takanga tichiisa pamusoro pavo uye vakanga vakashata zvikuru.
Ndingangokumbira hapana mafuta next time.
Takangorayira zvokudya uye zvinwiwa, asi hapana refills yakapiwa.
Zvose zvinonaka, vabiki vane ushamwari uye vanoda kutora nguva uye kutaura newe uye kukubata ruoko.
Chikafu chinotyisa - zvechokwadi edza bass ine mitsetse.
Kunyange zvazvo Spider Roll inogona kutaridzika sechinetso chekudya, nenyoro shell crab yakaturikwa kunze kwemupumburu, zvakanaka zvakakodzera mutengo waunobhadhara kwavari.
Vashandi vanonyatsoteerera uye tinogona anenge nguva dzose kuwana tafura.

Mugwagwa wakatetepa unotungamirira kune imwe nzvimbo duku apo kune matatu maduku machena tiled counters, zvakanyanya kusagadzikana (stacks yemabhodhoro, midziyo) uye diki counter inobata 12-14 entrees.
Basa nguva dzose zvakaipa kunyange zvakadaro, usatarisira zvakawanda chero chinhu kubva Server yako, uye handingakurudziri kuunza musi pano kana.
Kunyange zvakadaro, chero quibbles pamusoro bhiri vakanga kure-akagadzwa nokudurura-yako-yako zviyero liquers izvo zvaiva courtesey imba ...
Somugumisiro, burgers dzavo dzakaparara mumaoko avo uye dzakaita kuvhiringidzika kwakadaro zvokuti vakaita nt kunzwa kuda kupedza navo.
Menyu yacho yairatidzika kuva nezvokudya zvakasiyana-siyana kune vanoda hove dzegungwa uye nzira dzinonakidza dzekugadzirira.
Kana iwe usingazivi nezvekudya, iwe unogona kusangana nematambudziko ekuraira pano uye iva nechokwadi chekuunza mari yakawanda newe sezvo vasingagamuchiri makadhi echikwereti.
Nzvimbo yacho yakanga isina kunyanya kuoma kuwana, asi yakanga yakazara mhando, ini nemukomana wangu patakangowana chikafu chedu, mutsetse wakasvika pasuo.
The Steak Tartare chinhu chikuru bheji, ivo kugadzirisa iwe patafura.
Ndapota kana kufunga kwako pamusoro payo kuenda, uye kugara kumirira hauzoodzwi mwoyo.
Iyo menyu haina kufanana neiyo iri pawebsite.
Iyo inonhuwira tuna roll yakanga yakanaka zvisina kujairika uye dombo shrimp tempura yaityisa, appetizer huru yekugovana!
The zvokudya zvakanga zvinoshamisa, basa akanga saka kunyatsoteerera uye personable, uye sei kuti ambience!
Vashandi nevaridzi vakanga vasina hanya neizvi uye vakavimbisa kudana muparadzi asi havana kuvhunduka kana kukumbira ruregerero sezvandaizotarisira.
Takanga kuronga kuwana dessert asi waitress chaizvoizvo kuburikidza bhiri kwatiri tisati tava nemukana kuraira.
Handisi mutsoropodzi wezvokudya, asi ndinoda kufunga kuti ndine ruzivo ruduku pasi pebhanhire rangu ndakagara muNY kwemakore ekupedzisira e11.

Nepo Sapphire zvamazvirokwazvo haisi kushaya ambiance, uye zvichida ine yakanakisisa decor chero Indian resitorendi yandave ndiri muNew York City, zvokudya zvakanga zvisiri izvo zvandakanga ndatarisira.
Iyo tuna uye wasabe mbatatisi yakaisvonaka.
Handiwanzorayira waini neIndia saka ini handigoni kutaura pamusoro pewaini yavo kana waini dzavo.
Handina kunyunyuta, ndaida atmosphere zvikuru.
Vakakanganwa sandwich, havana kusanganisira maforogo epurasitiki, uye havana kubatanidza pita ine hummus ndiro.

Mugwagwa wakatetepa unotungamirira kune imwe nzvimbo duku apo kune matatu maduku machena tiled counters, zvakanyanya kusagadzikana (stacks yemabhodhoro, midziyo) uye diki counter inobata 12-14 entrees.
Pashure pokunge kosi huru yasvika, hatina kuona waiter yedu kweanenge 40 MINUTES!
Uyewo, masangweji (pedyo ne $ 7) haana kuuya nechinhu chakafanana ne chips kana divi.
The zviratidzo, chinokosha menus, zvokudya, uye kunyange vose waitstaff vari ALL TOTALLY Japanese.
BUt chikafu chavo chakanakisisa ndeche thh Thai spiced curry noodles ne shrimp - chikafu chaizodhura $ 23.95 inzvimbo dzakawanda, asi iri $ 16 pano.
aspects: Thai spiced curry noodles ne shrimp
