sentences: Zvikamu zvino zviduku kwazvo, iyo sauces yakanyanyisa-kuda kazhinji isingadyiwi apo basa richiri rakanaka, resitorendi, nekuda kwekuzivikanwa kwayo, inoratidzika yakanyanyisa.
Chikamu chikuru pano chikuru, uye sushi yakanaka.
Iyo steak yakanaka, hove yakanaka uye sushi yakanga yakakura zvinoshamisa.
Kutanga kubva, waitress akanga zvachose unattentive ari 2 nguva takamuona(chienzi muresitorendi pamwe 6 matafura) uye akawana kuti yedu zvakaipa.
Chikafu chikuru pamitengo inonzwisisika, chinoita kuti manheru asingagoni kurohwa!
Usaenda wega---kunyange vanhu vaviri hazvina kukwana kune ruzivo rwose, ne pickles uye sarudzo yenyama uye seafoods.
Mimhanzi yakanaka, chikafu chikuru, basa rinokurumidza mitengo inokwanisika.
Kunyange zvazvo kune nzvimbo dzakawanda dzekuenda kune yakanaka corned beef sandwich, Katz's ine charm pamusoro payo.
Dzimwe nguva ndinowana zvokudya zvakaipa uye basa rakaipa, dzimwe nguva ndinowana basa rakanaka uye rakaipa.
The pizza ndiyo yakanakisisa kana uchida mutete crusted pizza.
Hongu iwe unofanirwa kumirira kugara uye nekuti diki yayo hapana nzvimbo yekumirira uye chigaro pabhawa chakatorwa zvose.
Kunyange zvakadaro, zvokudya pachawo zvakanaka chaizvo.
Vashandi vakanga vachigara, zvokudya zvakanga zvachose zvinonaka uye nzvimbo yacho inofadza.
Chingwa ndicho chingwa chinyoro cheparatha (kusiyana nechingwa chakajeka chavanoshandisa muCalcutta), uye stuffing iri tandoori styled uye inonaka zvikuru.
Nekuda kweiyo yakanyanyisa yakaonda crust, tora-kunze pies inowana soggy mumabhokisi avo.
Very yakakurumbira manyorerwo Izakaya (Sake uye chikamu chiduku sake-ushamwari ndiro ).
Chikafu chikuru, mitengo mikuru, basa guru.
Vakanga vasingagoni kunyange kugadzira saladi yaifadza.
Menyu yacho yakachinja, zvikamu zvakanga zviri zviduku zvikuru kupfuura kare, chikafu chelentil chakanga chine munyu kupfuura kudya, chikafu chemupunga che basmati chakanga chisina kunaka.
Hazvizoputsi bhangi asi iniwo handingadzoke nekuda kwekudya.
Kana toreva nezvebasa racho, vashandi vekudyira vakanga vasina ushamwari zvikuru, asi vakaita basa racho.
Zvinonhuwira zvikuru, uye menyu yakakura.
Waitress akakarakadza magirazi ewaini ayo akafamba zvakanaka zvikuru nezvokudya.
Zvokudya zvinopenya zvinonhuwira zvinokurira mukanwa, zvechokwadi kugamuchira kunaka kwechokwadi Thai cuisine.
Winnie nevashandi vake ndivo vashandi vakanakisisa vaunogona kuwana vachikushumira.
Iyo pizza inonaka - ivo vanoshandisa mozzarella itsva panzvimbo yeiyo yakachipa, yakaomeswa, shredded cheese yakajairika kune yakawanda pizzaria's.
Kazhinji 3 vs. 4 zvinhu padhishi.
Nokuti imi mose itsva Indian zvokudya, edza Paneer Roll, zviri chidimbu denga.
Zvose appetizers uye saladi zvakanga fabulous, steak akanga muromo kudiridza uye pasta akanga inonaka!!
Palak paneer yakanga iri standard, uye ini ndakanga ndisiri fan wemalai kofta.
Muridzi ane ushamwari chaizvo uye mukomana mukuru, enda edza pizza yake, iwe uchazvifarira!
Iyo blonde wood decor inonyaradza zvikuru, iyo premium sake yakaisvonaka uye basa rakakura.

Ndinonzwisisa nzvimbo uye vabereki iwe haufaniri kuuya pano kune rudo, kukwezva ambiance kana basa renyeredzi shanu rinoratidza sommlier uye maze yakaoma yekaputeni uye kumashure vashandi - iwe unouya nekuda kwezvokudya zvechokwadi, zvinonaka, ruzivo.

zvinyorwa zvangu ndeizvi: - Scallion Pancake (yakagochwa nemuto wemiriwo, inokosha chaizvo uye inonaka) - Guizhou Chicken - Shredded Squid Family Style (imwe yezvinhu zvandinofarira) - Sichuan Spicy Soft Shell Crab - Shuizhu Fish (iyi ndeye hardcore Sichuan chikafu mafeni, ini handingakurudziri kune shamwari dzangu dzeAmerica sezvo zvakanyanya kunhuhwirira.
Muenzaniso ndewemuto uyo wakanga uri pamusoro pe6 oz ye $ 12 madhora uye howa apo $ 12 inenge 1oz.

Ndinofanira kunyevera muverengi kuti zvikamu zvakakura zviduku zvikuru (kunyanya appetizers), saka kana iwe uchironga kudya kusvikira wazara uye usina chinangwa chekuraira chef's special tasting menu, gadzirira kuraira uye kubhadhara appetizer (1 dish yemunhu mumwe nomumwe nekuti zvikamu hazvisi zvekugoverana),  chinhu chikuru entree, uye udon inotonhora pakupera kwekudya.
Chikafu chakasvika maminitsi 20 mushure mekunge ndashevedza, kutonhora uye soggy.
Takadya pano muna March, 2006 uye takarayira pre-theatre 3-course dinner newaini ndege.

Nepo iyo $ 20 entrée range haisi yakanyanya kudhura, muNew York City, pane zvechokwadi chikafu chiri nani mune iyo huwandu, uye saka Sapphire, pasinei nekuti yakanaka mhepo, ingangove isiri resitorendi yandichadzokera.
Asi thai zvechokwadi haisi huru -- bland uye indistinguished.
Asi chinhu icho ini nemudzimai wangu taivenga chakanga chiri ruzha kwazvo uye chakanzwa se 'bar' kana 'pub'.
Mamwe maseva anoita kuti unzwe sokuti vari kukuitira zvakanaka kuti akuunze chikafu.
Kutanga, takaudzwa kuti kwakanga kune kumirira kwemaminitsi 30 ndokutanga kuenda, apo hostess akazvipira kutifonera pafoni yedu apo tafura yakanga yagadzirira.
Kunyange zvazvo takanga tichitsvaga lettuce yenguva dzose uye dzimwe walnuts, saladi dzatakawana dzakanga dzakakura.
Mhepo yakakura kana yako uchitsvaga nzvimbo yakaiswa kumashure uye nzira isingadhuri yekupedza masikati ekupera kwevhiki.
Varidzi uye vashandi vane ushamwari uye pizza yavo inofadza.
Ive akakumbira cart attendant for a lotus leaf wrapped rice and she replied back rice and just walked away.
Chikafu chinowanzova chakanaka asi zvechokwadi haisi nzvimbo yekuzorora kuenda.
Luckily takachengetedza nzvimbo yeBBQ Salmon, Sea Bass uye Crispy Duck.
Kwemakore, nguva dzose yakagovera ruzivo rwekudya runofadza nezvokudya zvepamusoro uye waini.
Three peji waini menyu, rimwe peji entrée uye horedevous.
Kamwe kudya kwemanheru uye kamwe chete brunch.
Ida zvokudya.
Ndinoshamiswa murombo wongororo- Ndinoona nzvimbo iyi kuva standout Italian munzvimbo yakazara Italian- mitengo huru, mhepo huru, basa rakanaka uye zvinoshamisa waini mazita.
Vanopa menyu imwecheteyo asi vane zvinwiwa zvekusika izvo zvakazadzwa nedoro uye mazita echeeky -- asi zvinokudhurira.
Nekuti takanga tisina kuchengetedza, taigona kungogara mubindu rekumashure, asi zvakanga zvakakura, zvakavanzika uye zvakakwana mumamiriro ekunze akanaka.

The sushi yave kubva avhareji kuti pasi avhareji, kumirira basa nguva dzose yave Sub-par mhepo anoenda kubva zvakanaka kuti chaizvoizvo zvinogumbura (kana iwe kugara munharaunda mhiri kicheni, ari acousitcs zvinotyisa, zvose echoes zvikuru ruzha).
Great waini mazita, zvine musoro mutengo.--Sara
Tawana Ping's paIndaneti, takapinda ne qualms asi takakurumidza kuiswa kuti tireruruke nematangi ehove anokukwazisa sezvo u kufamba mukati.
Iyo quail yakanga yakanaka uye yakasiyana uye pastas yakanga yakazara nekunakirwa.
Zvokudya zvakanga zvisiri zvitsva, muto wacho wakanga usina kunaka uye une mafuta zvikuru.
Basa rine ushamwari, mitengo yakanaka - nguva yekuendesa yakanga ichinonoka zvishoma, asi nokuda kwenzira iyo iyi pizza inonaka, ndinoda kuifuratira.
Mutengesi webhawa pashanyo yangu yemisi ichangobva kupfuura iyi akanga ane utsinye hunoshamisa kwazvo zvokuti handisati ndichizotongodzokera shure.
The takeout menyu anoti kuchengeta ziso kunze kwakawedzerwa menyu kupa zvakawanda italian ndiro, Handigoni kumirira!
Nokuti guru chinese zvokudya pedyo, une Wu Liang Ye uye Grand Sichuan chete block kure.
Vashandi vakanga vakabatikana zvikuru kuraira sushi kudya kwemanheru uye ipapo kuiisa kuti vadye pabhawa kunyange kundiunzira cheki yangu.
Ndakanga ndiri pano mavhiki mashomanana shure uye takanga tine ruzivo rwakaipisisa rwevatengi pane imwe resitorendi nguva dzose.
HAPANAZVE kuchengetedza, mazano anodhura uye zvinhu zvinonetsa.
Zvinonaka zvinoita kuti muromo wako uve nemvura yakawanda.
Zvisinei, ibasa rinosiya kuravira kwakaipa mumuromo mangu.
Other kunze crappy basa kubva vanhu vaviri, zvikuru.
Vashandi vakanga vasingateereri kunze kwokuti bhiri racho rakasvika patafura tisati tapedza.
Nzvimbo yacho yakanaka, yemazuva ano uye playfull uye ini ndichadzoka zvakare kakawanda.
Ndinowanzoenda ikoko gare gare usiku apo ndinobva kubasa saka handifaniri kubata nemapoka kana mitsetse.
Iyo crust yakaonda, zvinhu zvinogadzirwa zvitsva uye vashandi vane ushamwari.
Ndichitarisa kumativi, ndakaona kamuri rakazara nevagari veNew York vachifarikanya zvokudya chaizvoizvo muresitorendi chaiyoiyo, kwete clubhouse yefabulous kuedza kuonekwa.
Takagumisa ruzivo rwedu rukuru nekuita kuti Gulab Jamun (dessert) ikurudzirwe nemushandi.
Mukati memwedzi ye3 yapfuura, mubiki uye vashandi vakachinja uye zvakanga zvisiri nani.
Kunyanya kufarira huku tikka uye naan, uye dals.
The zvokudya inludes akakurumbira scrumptious bombay manyorerwo chaat akadai bhelpuri, sevpuri uye samosa chaats, uyewo mamwe makuru Indian appetizers.
Handina chokwadi kana ndingadai ndichidana chikafu pano chiIndia sezvo chiri fusion yeiyo inoratidzika kuva French neIndia kana exotic touch.

Zvidya zvakapiwa zvakanga zvakasiyana, zvinonaka chaizvo uye zvitsva kubva kune sadza regwayana, sardines nemabhisikiti, shrimp yakakura yose kune inoshamisa pistachio ice cream (yakanakisisa uye yakatsva yandakamboita).
Ndakanga ndine zvokudya zvinotyisa, uye server yedu yakatitungamirira kune waini yakanaka kwazvo mumutengo wedu, pane kutibvumira kutenga waini ine mutengo wakafanana iyo yakanga isiri yakanaka.
The kumirira mudonzvo inofadza, mafaro, uye zvikurukuru gorgeous (mune zvinoshamisa aesthetic kunakisa nzira, kwete pakuti iye-nzira-cuter-kupfuura-ini-kuti-b@# $ * nzira).
Manheru emusi weMugovera, ndakadya chikafu chemanheru.
Vashandi vagara vaine ushamwari pasina kuita sevanotaura, uye mubiki akatikwazisa kanoverengeka.
Nhengo yevashandi chete ine ushamwari yaiva mukomana pabhawa.
Mupunga wacho wakanga usina kunaka uye wakabikwa zvakaipa kwazvo zvokuti zvakanga zvakaoma.
Ndakamirira anopfuura awa imwe chete kuti ndidye.
Vashandi vanoita kuti unzwe kumba, chikafu chikuru uye mhepo inoshamisa!
Takaita mangwanani kudya Reservations uye vakanga zvakakwana kuororwa, anondiyeuchidza sekuru vangu, chikoro chayo chekare Italian nzvimbo pamwe mijenya mafaro zvinhu kuyemura.
Muto uri pa pizza wakanaka kwazvo negariki uye matomatisi matsva uye havana skimp.
Apo ndaigara kumusoro kwenyika kwekanguva ndaitenga freeze bagels uye ivo vaizova vachiri nani kupfuura chero ipi zvayo.
Basa racho rakaisvonaka, decor yakakura, uye chikafu chinonakidza uye chinouya muzvikamu zvikuru.
Kubva kune inoshamisa caviar kusvika kune vashandi vekumirira vane mutsa, ndainzwa semadzimambo uye ndainakidzwa nesekondi yega yega.
The porcini howa pasta chaiyo yakanga isina kunaka, ndizvo zvakaitawo zvokudya zvegungwa tagliatelle.
Basa racho rakanga richinyatsoteerera uye mazano ake ezvinhu zvemenyu akanga ari pachiratidzo chaipo.
Edza zvinonhuwira shrimp appetizer (zvakare, kwete kukosha kukuru munyika asi kukosha mutengo) uye gwayana vindaloo zvikuru.
Vashandi vanobatsira zvinoshamisa uye vanoteerera.
Tave tichitevera chikafu chemubiki Lyle kumativi eNew York kwemakore 15 uye nepo tichiramba tiri classic, zvitsva zvake ne bistro fare zvakaita kuti tidzoke uye tidzoke.
The sushi iri avhareji uye mitengo chinhu asi.
Nzvimbo yacho decoration uye yakavanzika yokugezera akaita kuti kuseka zvakanaka.
Weti yacho chaizvoizvo yakadira mvura paruoko rwangu ndokuenda.
Best Reuben sandwich nguva dzose!
Nepo ambiance uye mhepo yakanga yakakura, zvokudya uye basa zvaigona kunge zviri nani zvikuru.
Baluchi's ine zvokudya zvakasimba uye yakanaka decor pamitengo inonzwisisika.

Kunyangwe mushure mekusundwa kunze kweiyo isina-kirasi Famous Ray's, Sal akasimuka zvakare kuti aenderere mberi nenhaka yababamukuru vababa vake achinyemwerera, rudo rwechokwadi kunharaunda yake, uye ngatiregei kukanganwa Pizza Yakatanhamara!
Vakaratidza maminitsi 15 pashure pokunge tuna yanyauka.

Kunyange zvazvo iwe pasina mubvunzo uchagara patafura ine izvo zvinoratidzika sezvisina kukwana nzvimbo (zvisinei kuti ndeipi saizi yebato rako), atomosphere inodziya yakakodzera nzvimbo dzakamanikana- iwe uchanakidzwa uye wakakanganwa pamusoro penzvimbo yakasimba yauri.
Mhepo yacho yakakura!!
Ndinongoshamisika kuti ungadya sei zvokudya zvinonaka zvakadaro nemari shoma yakadaro.
The kumirira pano yakareba dim sum, asi kana iwe usingadi kugoverana matafura kana kana yakajairika raucous dim sum atmosphere haisi gig yako, iyi ndiyo yakatsvinda (yeChinatown) imwe nzira.
Pizza yakanga yakanaka chaizvo.
Basa racho rakanga rine ushamwari uye mamiriro ezvinhu akanga asina basa.
Zviri nyore kwazvo kuwana kuchengetedza pane imwe nzvimbo yepamusoro muNYC nechiziviso chevhiki.
Ndakaraira tamarind duck uye mudzimai wangu akarayira noodles nenyama yemombe, uye isu tose takafara nenzira iyo ndiro dzakamutsa Thai flavors nenzira dzisingatarisirwi.
Unhu hwezvokudya hwakanaka kwazvo uye mutengo wakachipa, namatira kune nyama yenguruve, hove, huku, gwayana nemiriwo.
Chikafu chacho chakanaka pane zvakanakisisa, uye ambience, zvakanaka, inyaya yemafungiro, vamwe vangafunga kuti chinhu chinonaka, ndakafunga kuti chaingova chinoshungurudza.
Basa racho rakanga rakaisvonaka uye zvokudya zvakanga zvinonaka.
Iyo anti-pasta yakanga yakaisvonaka, kunyanya calamari, sezvakanga zvakaita kuzadza pasta mains.

Vakanga vasina mayonnaise, vakakanganwa tosti yedu, vakasiya zvinhu zvinogadzirwa (kureva chizi mune omelet), pasi pekupisa kunopisa uye bacon yakanga yakanyanya kubikwa yakapunzika pane ndiro pawakaibata.
Kusarudzwa kukuru kwewaini, Gigondas inokosha mutengo, uye imba champagne inokosha zvikuru.

The vane pamusoro 100 doro dzakasiyana-siyana kupa muenzi wavo saka kuti akaita murume wangu kufara chaizvo uye zvokudya zvakanga zvinonaka, kana ndichifanira kukurudzira ndiro inofanira kuva pumkin tortelini.
Chikafu chikuru, chikafu chikuru.
Zvidya zvenyama zvino zvinoshongedza sarudzo, kunyange zvazvo kuchine huwandu hwakawanda hwezvisarudzo zvemiti-ushamwari.
Kana uchida chidimbu chenyama yemombe, musoro pamusoro.

Kubva kune inorumbidzwa chef app yeiyo yakanyanyisa butternut squash ravioli mune inonaka truffle sauce kune inoshamisa buttery uye nyoro langostine entrée kune dessert yandisingagoni kuyeuka nekuda kweiyo yakaisvonaka Cakebread Cabernet yatakanga tichinwa - manheru ose aishamisa.
Inongova O.K. pizza.
Ndakadya kuna Sauro, kakawanda, zvokudya nguva dzose zvinogara, zvinotyisa zvakanaka.
Edza Pad Thai, zviri fabulous uye mitengo yavo yakachipa kwazvo!
Kune vanhu vanoda chikafu chikuru pamwe nebasa guru, Roxy inzvimbo yekudzivisa!
Zvisinei, chingwa negwayana zvandaiva nazvo ndisati ndadya zvakanga zvakanaka zvikuru.
Asi pizza inzira inodhura.
Ndave ne pizza nguva dzose uye caprese saladi appetizer.
Right off the major deegan iwe unowana vakadzi kubva muguta rose.
Nzvimbo iyi ine yakanakisisa Chinese style BBQ mbabvu muguta.
Basa rinoshamisa, asi kwete kuzvidzora, uye decor inounza kuravira kweiyo trendy SoHo muQueens.
Imbwa dzinopisa dzakanga dzichitonhora pakati uye mabhanzi akanga akaoma.
Zviri super-trendy uye pane nguva dzose mumwe munhu kutora kuti chinhu chigaro, saka zvinoita sokuti vatengi basa rave kuonekwa kwete chokwadi.
Edza gungwa bass.
Vamwe vaenzi vakanakidzwa pizza, santa fe chopped saladi uye hove uye Chips.
Kumirira kwayo kwakakodzera.
Takanga desserts zvikuru (kusanganisira yakanakisisa cannoli ndakambova) uye ipapo vakapa pashure kudya kunwa, paimba.
The ambience akanaka uye akanaka kukurukurirana, saka zvakajairika masikati pano zvimwe zvingava zvakanakisisa.
Takanga tichiri kugara pabhawa tichinwa sangria, asi takatarisana kure nebhawa apo takadzokera shure, $2 yakanga yaenda vanhu vaiva pedyo nesu vakati bartender akatora.
Tapedza kunyatsonakidzwa pabhawa takagara pasi patafura ndokudya manheru.

Guacamole + shrimp appetizer yakanga yakakura chaizvoizvo, isu tose takanga tine filet, yakanaka kwazvo, haina kunyanya kufanana nema frites akauya nawo, asi filet yakanga yakanaka kwazvo, hapana mumwe wedu ane hanya.
Zvose zvinotaridzika zvikuru, zvinwiwa, decor, chikafu, kunyange vanhu.
Mupunga wacho wakanga usina kunaka uye wakabikwa zvakaipa kwazvo zvokuti zvakanga zvakaoma.
Excellent mhepo, zvinonaka ndiro zvakanaka uye ushamwari basa.
Vashandi havasi vane ushamwari kana vanokwanisa zvikuru, uye ini ndiri Stickler yebasa, asi zvimwe zvose pamusoro penzvimbo ino zvinogadzirisa.
20 maminitsi ekuchengetedza kwedu asi zvakatipa nguva yekuve nemacocktails mashomanana uye kunakidzwa nenzvimbo dzedu uye mumwe nomumwe.
Iyo Pastrami sandwich yakanga yakafanana nebuttah uye ne pickles uye doro rinotonhora chando kuigeza pasi, yakanga iri chiitiko chinofadza.
Tafura yaiva pedyo nesu yakabvunza kana akapwanya mazambiringa iye amene apo bhodhoro ravo rewaini rakanga rava kunonoka pakupedzisira rakasvika.
Chikafu chikuru (spinach uye chibage dumplings uye massamman curry), ushamwari chaizvo uye hapana nonsense basa uye yakachena uye funky yokugezera.
Mudzimai wake Tanya, mugamuchirakadzi, anopedza mugariro unonyaradza kupfurikidza nokuva ane ushamwari hunofadza nenyasha.
The pachena pizza akanga soggy uye okusika musango howa (chizvarwa chechitatu-Fornini) pizza taiva akanga akanyorova truffle mafuta pakati( zvakare kuita kuti soggy) uye nothingon vamwe.
Zvose zvakaendeswa zvakanaka kumusuo chaiwo.
Yedu yakabvumirana kufarira ndeye orrechiete ine sadza uye huku (kazhinji vashandi vane mutsa zvakakwana kuparadzanisa dhiza nehafu saka iwe unosvika pakuedza nyama dzose).
Ndingakurudzira zvikuru Nina's kune chero ani zvake anoda kudya kwerudo mumwoyo unodziya wakapoteredza wakazadzwa nemakenduru nemifananidzo yemhuri.
Tafura yedu duku yevaviri (ndiro dzekudya kwemanheru dzakaturikwa pamucheto) yakanga iri pakati chaipo peimwe yenzira dzemotokari dzevashandi.
Basa racho rakanga rakateerera, asi risina kuisa, chikafu chakanga chiri nani zvikuru kupfuura maresitorendi akawanda ane mukurumbira muMidtown uye waini yewaini yakakura uye yakanyatsobhadharwa.
Nzvimbo iyi yaizova saka zviri nani kushumira nokufambiswa neboka kuti chaizvoizvo kunzwisisa vatengi basa.
Zvisinei, ivo vane pastrami inoshamisa zvikuru uye soups yakarova nzvimbo.
Kuruma kwega kwega kwezvokudya paKai zvechokwadi kwakanga kunonaka, kutsva, uye kwakanaka.
Great pizza kuti masikati nzvimbo.
Chikafu chiri avhareji, uye ndingati kunyange cheni resitorendi Baluchi's inonaka zviri nani.
Kubva pakutanga appetizers, ari scallops vakanga incredible, kuti zvinonaka chokoreti souffle pamwe rasberry mint sorbet, takafadzwa kuravira kunzwa.
Chikafu chikuru (spinach uye chibage dumplings uye massamman curry), ushamwari chaizvo uye hapana nonsense basa uye yakachena uye funky yokugezera.
Iwe unofanirwa kunge uine crabmeat lasagna iyo iri kunze kwenyika ino uye chokoreti chingwa pudding ye dessert.
Zvinoita sokuti vakatora huku yakasara, vakadurura mafuta uye vakasasa pepper powder pamusoro payo (muto wacho wakanga uri translucent uye mutsvuku).
Basa racho rakanga rakateerera, asi risina kuisa, chikafu chakanga chiri nani zvikuru kupfuura maresitorendi akawanda ane mukurumbira muMidtown uye waini yewaini yakakura uye yakanyatsobhadharwa.
Hatina kumbobvira tave nematambudziko ekubhadharisa zvokudya kana mari, uye zvokudya zvakaendeswa nokukurumidza, asi tinorarama maminitsi mashomanana chete kubva kwavari.
Kana iwe uri kutsvaga yakakwana yechinyakare sushi, enda pano - kana iwe uri kutsvaga kusanganiswa kunonakidza, edza sushi yeGari's (East Side).
Tinoenda nemusi weMuvhuro kune prix fixe uye ruzivo rwedu nezvokudya rwave rwakaenzana neBlue Ribbon.
Nokuda kwenzvimbo, mitengo inonzwisisika zvikuru.
Takadya kunze mu patio yemashure, iyo inokosha sezvo inotonhorera uye mimhanzi inonzwa zvakanaka ikoko.
Handisati ndamboita cheescake yakadai.
Waitstaff yakakura, inonyatsoteerera.
Restaurant snobs havafaniri kunetseka, ichi chiduku, nharaunda mhando nzvimbo.
Edza tandoori salmon!
The waini mazita haasi zvikuru, uye desserts vanotumirwa kubva Bruno pasi mumugwagwa, izvo zvisiri zvakanaka sezvazvaimboita.
Ipapo takarayira dinosaur rolls uye chena tuna sashimi.
Uyewo, kana usingadi kugara pane imwe tafura, haufaniri!
The chaiyo kicker pamusoro menyu, zvisinei, ndiyo nyama yemombe cubes kana huku pamwe chili uye mandimu uswa.
The chete hanya ndine pamwe slighly zvose-bhizimisi waitstaff vanoraira uye kukanda zvokudya pasi, achimhanya iwe kunze.
Asi kana iwe wakagara mawaitresses makuru, vanotsanangura zvose pane menyu, uye mutengo wezvokudya chaizvoizvo wakachipa nokuda kwebasa raunowana.
Hove dzakanyanyisa.
Waini huru, chikafu chikuru.

Mwanakomana wedu anoda pizza uye tine yakasimbiswa Neapolitan pizzaria muguta redu rekumusha (Seattle), isu takafarira izvi zvinenge zvakanyanya - uye misiyano yakanga iri yakawanda pamusoro pekuda kwemunhu pane chero kufungisisa pane imwe resitorendi.
Kupfuurirazve, mupunga wacho wakanga usina zvokudya, naizvozvo sushi yakanga isina kujeka uye inonyangadza.

Asi usambofa kuraira bacon kunonoka pa nite (kana ndiro kana mumasangweji, nokuti nyaya iyoyo regai kubva chero kutora kunze nzvimbo) sezvazviri kubva mangwanani frying anobuda zvakaoma anenge sezvinoita bacos, kukuvadza molars yangu.
The ambiance zvishoma zvokudya hazvisi phenomenal, asi zvimwe ndiro zvakanaka zvikuru, akadai eggplant parmesan, veal mu carozza huku saltimbocca.
Inogona kunge yakarongedzwa zvishoma pakupera kwevhiki, asi vibe yakanaka uye ndiyo yakanakisisa chikafu cheFrance chauchawana munharaunda.
Simple nyaradzo zvokudya uye chii inopisa uye lage zvikamu.
Cornelia Street inoratidzika seBroadway yakagadzirirwa West Side Story uye mukati mePo inotonhorera kwazvo quaint iwe chaizvoizvo haugoni kumusoro kwekugadzirisa kudya kwerudo muNYC.
Great waini mazita, zvine musoro mutengo.--Sara

Ndinonzwisisa nzvimbo uye vabereki iwe haufaniri kuuya pano kune rudo, kukwezva ambiance kana basa renyeredzi shanu rinoratidza sommlier uye maze yakaoma yekaputeni uye kumashure vashandi - iwe unouya nekuda kwezvokudya zvechokwadi, zvinonaka, ruzivo.
Handina chokwadi kuti muongorori wekare, lonk, akadya, asi Sauro ari munharaunda huru uye ane zvokudya zvikuru!
Iyo decor iri nyore kwazvo asi yakasununguka.
Kana iwe uri muboka guru, nzvimbo iyi yakakwana nekuti inogadzirisa kugoverana - vane simbe susans pamatafura akawanda - kunyange mhuri dzinogona kunzwa dzakasununguka pano.
Kunyange zvazvo matafura angave pedyo nzvimbo, ari makenduru-chiedza, zvokudya-unhu uye basa overcompensate.
Chikafu chacho chairatidzika kuva chinonakidza zvikuru uye chinonakidza sezvo chakauya pane zvakasiyana-siyana zvemhando yepamusoro.
The dosas vari skimpy, asingakwezvi uye kudonha pamwe mafuta, uye pachangu ndaizonwa popcorn topping ndisati ndadya mumwe izvi.
A inotonhorera bhaa pamwe zvokudya zvikuru, uye matani doro rakaisvonaka.
Very inokwanisika uye yakaisvonaka ambient!
Chikafu chikuru, basa rakanaka.

Asi usambofa kuraira bacon kunonoka pa nite (kana ndiro kana mumasangweji, nokuti nyaya iyoyo regai kubva chero kutora kunze nzvimbo) sezvazviri kubva mangwanani frying anobuda zvakaoma anenge sezvinoita bacos, kukuvadza molars yangu.
Iyi inogara iri nzvimbo huru yekudya kwemasikati kana kudya kwemanheru.
Vashandi ikoko zvakare zvachose kutakura bagel pamwe kirimu chizi (anowana zvishoma tsvina).
Nzvimbo yacho inotonhorera kwazvo uye basa racho rinokurumidza uye rinoda kuziva.
Chikafu chacho chaiva chikuru.
chete akadzoka kubva masikati paTamarind uye zvakanga zvakaisvonaka.
Basa racho rinoita dzimwe nguva kushaya pfungwa uye hazvina kunaka kana iwe uchimhanya asi ini handina kumbobvira ndabatwa zvisina kufanira.
Nziyo dzacho dzinoita ruzha zvishoma pane dzimwe nguva, asi dzakangoita kuti ndide kutsamira pedyo nomudzimai wangu akanaka, uye sezvandakaita, ndakawana kunhuhwirira kwecorriander.

Ndiyo resitorendi yakakwana ye NY hupenyu hwehupenyu, yakawana inotonhorera dhizaini, zvinwiwa zvinotyisa uye zvokudya uye zvakawanda zvevanhu vanotarisa zvakanaka vanodya uye vakarembera pa pink bar ...
Hostess ane utsinye kusvika pakugumbura.
Menyu yesake haifaniri kufuratirwa!
Zvisinei, muzhizha ra2003, zvinoita sokuti manejimendi akachinja uye musuo mukuru mukuru wakatsiviwa negirazi pamberi richizvibvisa pacharo rima rudo getup.
Iva nechokwadi chekuedza mwaka, uye nguva dzose inonaka, zvakakosha.
Hatizoendi kunzvimbo ino zvakare kuti tidye zvakanaka.
Cheese ndiro inofadza zvakasiyana-siyana uye yakakura bargain pa $ 10.
Ndakawana zvokudya zvacho kuva zvinoshamisa, zvikurukuru ndiro yesalmon yandaiva nayo.
Takatanga nechizi fondue (iyo artisanal mix) uye takawedzera maapuro uye kielbasa kudzika.
Chinhu chimwe chete chinoshamisa kupfuura chikafu (icho chakasiyana) ibasa racho.
Thalia iri resitorendi yakanaka ine vanhu vakanaka vanokushumira iwe, asi zvokudya hazvinyatsoenderani.
Unhu hwezvokudya pane iyi resitorendi inoperekedzwa ne fantastic live jazz inoita kuti nzvimbo iyi ive yakakwana 10!
Mukomana wangu aiva neNew England Chowder zvakanga zvakanaka asi ndinofunga kuti mubairo unofanira kuenda kuLobster Bisque.
Ini ndingadai ndisina kunyange kunyunyuta zvachose kana chikafu kanenge chakaravira zvakanaka asi unhu hwezvokudya hwakanga huri crappy, zvakare.
Ndingakurudzira reservations pakupera kwevhiki kunyange.
Very yakakurumbira manyorerwo Izakaya (Sake uye chikamu chiduku sake-ushamwari ndiro ).
Vanhu vane rude bit zvakare zviri New York!
Nzvimbo inoshamisa!
Zvokudya zvinonaka uye zvakagadzirwa zvakanaka pamwe chete nebasa reushamwari uye personable.
Takatanga ne lox uye mussels (yakanakisisa ive yati yambova nayo, nguva dzose) uye takanga tine cod uye trout yekudya kwemanheru.
Kana iwe uri kutsvaga unhu hwakanaka, zvakachipa zvinodya - iyi ndiyo nzvimbo.
Uye chaizvoizvo zvikamu zvikuru.
Kugara kwacho kwaiva kana vaiedza kupinza huwandu hwakanyanya hwevanhu muresitorendi, saka iva akanaka kumuvakidzani wako paunodya pano.
Iyo eggplant parmesan yakakurawo, uye shamwari yangu yakakurira muManhattan inotaura kuti hapana munhu anoshumira ziti iri nani yakabikwa nenyama.
Nzvimbo iyi ine realy itsva sushi uye yakanaka yakakura menyu yeJapan classic cuisine.
Ndingadai ndakawana cole slaw uye knish kudai dumbu rangu raiva nenzvimbo yakawanda.
Zvokudya zvakanga zvakanyatsogadzirwa uye basa racho rakanga risina basa.
Zvigaro hazvina kunaka kana iwe wakagara pamadziro pamabhenji emapuranga.
Mutengo unonzwisisika kunyange zvazvo basa racho risina kunaka.
Kana ndichienda kunodya zvokudya zvakanaka, ndinoda ambiance yakanaka pamwe chete nezvokudya zvakanaka kwazvo.
Pizza inotyisa, sezvakaita pasta yakagadzirwa kumba.
Kudya kwemasikati kwakauya ne pickels uye slaw, hapana mubhadharo wekuwedzera.
Nezvakasiyana-siyana zvikuru pane menyu , ndinodya pano kazhinji uye handimbofinhwi .
Iyi inogara iri nzvimbo huru yekudya kwemasikati kana kudya kwemanheru.
Hongu, vanoshandisa zvinhu zvemhando yepamusoro, asi kunyange zvinhu zvakaisvonaka hazviiti kuti pizza yakanaka kunze kwekunge mumwe munhu achiziva nzira yekuwana crust zvakanaka.
Vashandi vakaisvonaka, specjal: musikana iyeye shure kwebhawa, european chic.
Haiwa, musatombondirega ndichitanga kuti zvikwereti zvaidhura sei!
Weti yedu yakanga yakanaka, nzvimbo inotaridzika zvakanaka mune iyo isiri-kuedza-yakanyanya kuoma nzira, asi pamitengo iyoyo, zvishoma zvinofanira kutarisirwa zvekudya zvako.

Kunyange zvazvo iwe pasina mubvunzo uchagara patafura ine izvo zvinoratidzika sezvisina kukwana nzvimbo (zvisinei kuti ndeipi saizi yebato rako), atomosphere inodziya yakakodzera nzvimbo dzakamanikana- iwe uchanakidzwa uye wakakanganwa pamusoro penzvimbo yakasimba yauri.
Pakanga pane kumirira kwenguva refu kwetafura kunze, asi zvakanga zvishoma zvakanyanya kupisa muzuva zvakadaro saka tafura yedu ye insde yakanga yakanaka kwazvo.
After 2 tries by the waiter to take it away (we had not even looked at it yet, we had full beers yet to drink), maneja akasvika ndokutiudza kuti vaida tafura yevanhu vane reservations.
Kure, yakanakisisa pizza muManhattan.
Pasinei nekuti nzvimbo yacho yakakura, ivo vakazara pasi nematafura.
Zvokudya zvakanaka, kunyanya zvokudya zvavo zvinokosha, uye zvinwiwa zvinonaka.
Sei vanhu rave pamusoro ambience?
Ok, saka maseva anodzungaira zvishoma clueless, asi pane zvinopfuura zvakakwana servers kuti boka vanowana - zvakanaka, iwe chete vanofanira kuita duku kuedza kuwana pfungwa dzavo.

Tinogara muNew Jersey uye pose patinopinda muNew York City tinotenga bagels kuti tidye zvinopisa uye ipapo kutonhora (vakandiudza kuti kana ndikadana mukuraira, vaizobudisa kune motokari kuitira kuti ndirege kutsvaga nzvimbo yekupaka).
Wow pamusoro 100 doro kusarudza kubva.
Pizza yakanga yakanaka uye yakakura.
Zvakatipoteredza ndezverudo, asi zvokudya zvinotyisa, basa racho rinosuruvarisa, uye gabriella anonyepa pamusoro pezvose zvaaigona.
Nzvimbo iyi inofanira kunge yakadhura varidzi pfuma yekuvaka.
Chikafu chacho chairatidzika kuva chinonakidza zvikuru uye chinonakidza sezvo chakauya pane zvakasiyana-siyana zvemhando yepamusoro.
Ndapota edza Filet Mignon, ayo chete zvikuru nyoro chidimbu nguva dzose.
Ini nemudzimai wangu tinogara tichinakidzwa nevechidiki, kwete nguva dzose vakanyatsodzidziswa asi kunyange zvakadaro vane ushamwari, vashandi, vose vane nyaya.

Ndakagumbuka pamusoro peiyi yechipiri yepauriri kufamba-up maviri Chishanu apfuura apo ndaiva neshamwari mbiri muguta kubva kuLA. Kuva zvakakomba sushi vanoda, takagara pa sushi bar kuti tive pedyo nechiito.
Takashamiswa zvikuru nokuti zvokudya zvacho zvakanga zvakanaka sei pashanyo yedu yokutanga pano pausiku hweSvondo.
Zvikuru vanokurudzira ichi sezvo kukosha kukuru kwazvo sushi uye basa.
Hazvina kukodzera mitengo.
Iwe uri kubhadhara mhepo, iyo yakanaka, asi inogona kuva munzvimbo dzakawanda muBay Ridge.
Mhepo yakanga yakazara asi yakanga iri huru bistro-mhando vibe.
Iyo dhizaini uye mhepo yakafanana yakanaka.
Madziro epuke akasvibirira anosiya zvakawanda zvinodiwa, asi zvokudya zvakanaka kwazvo.
Basa racho rakanga richikurumidza uye rine ushamwari uye chikafu chakanga chichinaka zvikuru uye ivo vaive neyakanakisisa inopisa muto wekuwedzera kudya kwako.
Inowanikwa pamugumo webhuroka rakaisvonaka.
Ini chete akaedza nyore ndiro sipinachi ravioli mune chiedza mafuta uye garlic muto, asi chaizvoizvo faired nani kupfuura vakawanda NYC Italian majoini ndakaedza zvakafanana ndiro panguva.
aspects: Spinach ravioli mumafuta akareruka uye garlic sauce
polarities: Spinach ravioli mumafuta akareruka uye garlic sauce

sentences: Oh hongu, uye vanorara pafoni, vachiti vane zvigaro mubindu, ipapo chokwadi zvigaro hazviwanikwi.

zvokudya zvakanga undercooked-muto mvura, uye miriwo mbishi.
Nepo ini zvikuru kufarira zvokudya uye ambience, Handisi chaizvo chokwadi kana ivo chaizvoizvo vanofanirwa nayo Michelin Rating ivo vakaratidza saka prooudly muhwindo.
The zviratidzo, chinokosha menus, zvokudya, uye kunyange vose waitstaff vari ALL TOTALLY Japanese.
Kusarudzwa kukuru kwewaini, Gigondas inokosha mutengo, uye imba champagne inokosha zvikuru.
Kunyange zvazvo vachiita zvakajairika, rudzii rwemvura rwaungada mibvunzo, basa racho rakanga rakanaka uye rose rose rinozorodza zvikuru kunzvimbo yekudya.
Chikafu chakabuda zvisina kunaka, weti yakanga isiri nzvimbo yekuwanikwa uye waini yakaratidza pakupera kwekudya.

Kubva kune inorumbidzwa chef app yeiyo yakanyanyisa butternut squash ravioli mune inonaka truffle sauce kune inoshamisa buttery uye nyoro langostine entrée kune dessert yandisingagoni kuyeuka nekuda kweiyo yakaisvonaka Cakebread Cabernet yatakanga tichinwa - manheru ose aishamisa.
Chii chinoita kuti resitorendi iyi ive chaiyo ndeyechokwadi sichuan kubika uye kuva iyo chete muNYC inopa yechokwadi chongqing hotpot.
Basa rakanga riri devine, oysters apo munhu wenyama sezvavanouya, uye mutengo haugoni kurohwa!!
Baba vangu pavakangosimudza peni yavo mucheki mumwe mubiki akaonekwa achitibudisa.
Asi vashandi vaitityisa kwazvo.
Great mapoka, zvikuru musi, zvikuru mangwanani brunch kana nightcap.
Edza zvinonhuwira shrimp appetizer (zvakare, kwete kukosha kukuru munyika asi kukosha mutengo) uye gwayana vindaloo zvikuru.
Takanga tine champagne uye caviar uye takanzwa semachindakadzi!

Ndinofanira kunyevera muverengi kuti zvikamu zvakakura zviduku zvikuru (kunyanya appetizers), saka kana iwe uchironga kudya kusvikira wazara uye usina chinangwa chekuraira chef's special tasting menu, gadzirira kuraira uye kubhadhara appetizer (1 dish yemunhu mumwe nomumwe nekuti zvikamu hazvisi zvekugoverana),  chinhu chikuru entree, uye udon inotonhora pakupera kwekudya.
Ndinokurudzira zvikuru Cafe St. Bart's nokuda kwezvokudya zvavo, iyo ambience uye basa rinoshamisa.
Takapinda usiku hweChitatu ndokugara nokukurumidza.
The fried mupunga zvinoshamisa pano.
Ne theatre 2 blocks kure taiva nezvokudya zvinonaka muimba yakanaka.
Mugamuchiri wangu akakumbira appetizers yeboka uye weti akatipa kwete chete zvatakarayira, asi zvimwe zvimwe zvinhu zvisina kurairwa.
Zvingadai zvakanga zvishoma zvikuru zvinonhuwira shamwari yangu, izvo unogona couteract pamwe kudya mupunga zvakawanda uye kuchengeta mvura paruoko.
Nzvimbo yacho iri zvishoma zvishoma zvikuru kune mimhanzi mhenyu, saka pausiku hwejazz, inogona kuva inonzwika uye yakamanikana.
Namatira kudimsum, kwete super overpriced noodles.
Ndakadya clams, oreganta uye saladi inoshamisa ine zvakakwana marinated cucumbers uye matomatisi ane shrimp yakawanda uye basil.

Zvokudya zvino hazvipindirani.
Vatatu vedu takasvika kudya kwemanheru anenge 5:30 pausiku hwevhiki pasina reservations.
Iyo blonde wood decor inonyaradza zvikuru, iyo premium sake yakaisvonaka uye basa rakakura.
The zvokudya, zvinwiwa uye basa zviri pachena pakati yakanakisisa muguta.
Tinoparadzanisa samosa yemuriwo inonaka uye Malii Tikka wrap.
Kudya kwemanheru kwakanga kwakanaka, hapana chandingadai ndakaita zvakare.
Hatina kumbobvira tave nematambudziko ekubhadharisa zvokudya kana mari, uye zvokudya zvakaendeswa nokukurumidza, asi tinorarama maminitsi mashomanana chete kubva kwavari.

Ita kuchengetedza asi tarisira kunonoka 15-20 maminitsi sezvo vashandi vekugamuchira vakanga vachinetseka kugara vaenzi vakasvika nekuchengetedza nekuti zvichida vaive nehuwandu hwekufamba ins kuva pedyo kwazvo neTime Square.

Nice ambiance, zvakanaka zvishoma bhaa, zvakanaka bartender, Francois, uye basa rakanaka.
Decor anosiya chimwe chinhu chinodiwa.
Hongu iwe unofanirwa kumirira kugara uye nekuti diki yayo hapana nzvimbo yekumirira uye chigaro pabhawa chakatorwa zvose.
Zvokudya zvakanaka paresitorendi (a zvishoma zvinodhura, asi zvikuru kana uchida kuorora musi wako).
Handisati ndambodya zvidimbu 40 zve nigi yakanaka zvikuru.
Vamwe mwana pizzas kuwana chido chavo.
The chete hanya ndine pamwe slighly zvose-bhizimisi waitstaff vanoraira uye kukanda zvokudya pasi, achimhanya iwe kunze.
Saladi yavo yechienzi inokosha zvikuru saladi duku yakasvibirira ine muto wenzungu wakakwana pamberi pezvavo zvinotapira basil fried tofu.
Basa nguva dzose zvakaipa kunyange zvakadaro, usatarisira zvakawanda chero chinhu kubva Server yako, uye handingakurudziri kuunza musi pano kana.
Iyo pizza inonaka - ivo vanoshandisa mozzarella itsva panzvimbo yeiyo yakachipa, yakaomeswa, shredded cheese yakajairika kune yakawanda pizzaria's.
Zvidzidzo zvekutanga zve2 zvakanga zvakanaka kwazvo, asi chokoreti sampler yakanga yakapfuma zvikuru kwandiri uye dessert waini yakanyanya kutapira.
Zvokudya zvisingadaviriki pamutengo unonyanyisa unondidzosa chete pamusoro peimwe zuva rega rega kune iyi yechokwadi Thai restaurant.
Zvokudya zvakanga zvikuru uye basa akanga kunyange nani.
Ambiance is barely romantic but management anoedza.
Muto wacho unonaka uye crust yakakwana.
Yavo sake list yakanga yakakura, asi takanga tichitsvaga Purple Haze, iyo isina kunyorwa asi yakagadzirirwa isu pakukumbira!
Nguva yokutanga ndakaenda, uye yakatorwa zvachose nehupenyu hwejazz band uye mhepo, ndakaraira Lobster Cobb Salad.
Thalia iri resitorendi yakanaka ine vanhu vakanaka vanokushumira iwe, asi zvokudya hazvinyatsoenderani.
Zviri nguva dzose pachena, catering kuti Pakistani cabbies mutsetse pamusoro Crosby St., saka pane zvakawanda turnover pamwe zvokudya kupfuura waizotarisira (kureva, zvinoshamisa itsva).
Tafura imwe neimwe ine hari yemvura inovira yakanyura pamusoro payo, uye iwe unowana ndiro dzenyama dzakatetepa dzakatsemurwa, miriwo yakasiyana-siyana, uye mupunga uye magirazi noodles.
Iwe unogona chaizvoizvo kuwana 2 saladi inokosha kana iwe uchitora kumba uye uchiwedzera kune imwe lettuce!
Edza tuna ine crunchy, ndeyokufa.

Nha Trang, nepo kuva nomukurumbira nokuda zvachose kushaya nyaradzo uye decor, zvinotyisa kunonoka kumirira vashandi uye zvinotyisa nokukurumidza zvokudya, ndeimwe yakanakisisa Vietnamese mumaresitorendi ndakamboenda. Iyo pho inonaka uye inouya nemavegtables matsva kwazvo.
Waini inogara yakanaka, iyo tapas inogara iri yummy, kunyanya nechingwa chinodziya chepita.
Ndave pano kakawanda vashandi vanoziva zita rangu.
Decor yakanaka uye minimalist, chikafu chiri nyore asi chakanyatsoiswa uye chakabikwa, uye waini yewaini inoenderana nezvokudya zvakanaka kwazvo.
Best Italian zvokudya ndakambove (uye kuva Italian, kuti zvinoreva zvakawanda).
Maseva anokupa zvimwe zvidimbu zvemuenzaniso zvekuraira kwako paunenge uchimirira (kurumidza ndingawedzera).
Ndakaenda kuresitorendi iyi kanopfuura kagumi nemaviri uye kana ndichishuva Pho, Lemon grass chicken kana Beef Cube pamupunga, iyi ndiyo nzvimbo yekuenda.
Waitstaff vane ushamwari chaizvo.
Chii kunyange nani, ndechokuti mitengo inokwanisika chaizvo uyewo, uye zvokudya chaizvoizvo zvakanaka.
Chikonzero chakaipisisa chekudya kweJapan chandakambosangana nacho.
Kunze kwekuva zvishoma zvakazara uye zvishoma overpriced, mhepo yakazadzwa nesimba (uye vanhu vakanaka zvechokwadi) uye zvokudya zvakanga zvinoshamisa zvakanaka!
Mutengo uye unhu hwehove chete zvichatidzivisa kuita shanyo yekudzoka.
Kutanga, weti yakatibatira yakaregeredza kutizadza pazvinhu zvakakosha, izvo ndingadai ndakasarudza kudai ndaiziva pamusoro pazvo.

Barbecued codfish yakanga yakanyorova zvakaisvonaka - sokunge yakavhimwa - bva iyo yakaisvonaka yakagadzirwa yakaregedzwa nenzira inoshamisa bland seasoning - zvinonhuwira zvinonhuwira zvingave zvakanyanyisa, zvisinei kusanganiswa kwemishonga kana mumwe muto ungadai wakaita zvakawanda kuwedzera.
Zvichienderana nekuongororwa kwekudya kwemanheru, iyi inzvimbo yandingafungazve kudzokorora kuti, asi zvechokwadi kwete Dim Sum zvakare.

Ndinonzwisisa nzvimbo uye vabereki iwe haufaniri kuuya pano kune rudo, kukwezva ambiance kana basa renyeredzi shanu rinoratidza sommlier uye maze yakaoma yekaputeni uye kumashure vashandi - iwe unouya nekuda kwezvokudya zvechokwadi, zvinonaka, ruzivo.
Chikafu chakanga chiri avhareji uye creme brulee yakanga yakaipa - shuga yakatsva, kwete caramelized uye yainhuwa parafini.
Ndinosarudza kuenda neimwe yeiyo chaiyo, iyo braised gwayana shank muwaini tsvuku, iyo yakanga yakaisvonaka.
The dim sum zvisinei akanga akanaka chaizvo.
Small servings for main entrée, i had salmon (haana kuororwa) musikana aiva nehuku, zvakanga zvakanaka.
Takauya pano musi weMugovera usiku hwakazara vanhu uye takanga takagara pakarepo pasinei zvapo nokunonoka kwemaminitsi 15 nokuda kwechengetedzo yedu.
The Halibut akanga zvikuru munyu, dessert akanga saka saka (usatambisa chero macalorie ako) uye basa rakanga risina kunaka.
Ndakanga ndine tuna tartare ne sake, mushroom ravioli ne pinot noir, uye chokoreti sampler ine dessert waini ye $ 49.
Kunyange pasta inonaka pano (chinhu chisingawanzoitika muNew York pizza restaurants).
Steak inonaka, nyama yenguruve, mabasa.
Zvinwiwa zvakanga zvakaisvonaka, uye dessert yakanga yakanaka.
Uye Kruno, maneja wezvinwiwa ndiye mutengesi webhawa wakanakisisa wandisati ndasangana nawo.
Mhepo yakanaka, mubatanidzwa wezvose zvinopisa zvikuru zvemimhanzi yekupfeka zvakanyanya kuoma kunze kweChishanu.
Ndinokurudzira garlic shrimp, okra (bindi), uye chero chinhu chine gwayana.
Kana uchida imwe yakagochwa duku, nyama yenguruve kana huku pamupunga ne ginger, edza navo!
The zvokudya inludes akakurumbira scrumptious bombay manyorerwo chaat akadai bhelpuri, sevpuri uye samosa chaats, uyewo mamwe makuru Indian appetizers.
Nzvimbo inotonhorera yekurembera neshamwari dzako kune vaviri vanonwa zvine utano uye desserts.
Ndakaenda kunzvimbo dzinoverengeka dzeDim Sum uye izvi zvinofanira kuva WORST.
Ndakaenda neshamwari 5 and we lingered at the table for a bit and didn't feel rushed at all even though there was a wait.
Ini nemurume wangu tave tiri ikoko kanoverengeka uye nguva imwe neimwe takagara pa sushi bar (chef Yoshi) ndokuraira zvose ala carte.
Chikafu chacho chakatanhamara uye basa racho rinokurumidza, rine ushamwari uye nyanzvi chaizvo.
Uye pakupera kweizvi zvinotyisa zvekudya cheki yakapiwa patafura yedu nekugogodza girazi remvura.
Chikafu chacho chaishamisa, uye basa racho rakanga rakakurumidza uye rinobatsira, asi kwete kupfuura-kubereka kana kumhanya.
Iyo ambience yakadzikama zvikuru uye yakanyarara.
Ndingakurudzira Roxy's nokuda kweizvozvo, asi kwete zvekudya kwavo.
Kunyange zvazvo kamuri risina kunyanya kusununguka, kana wangogara uchakanganwa nezvezvinhu zvose kunze kwezviri pane yako ndiro.
The chete kuodzwa mwoyo akanga jasi cheki vasikana vakanga vasingaratidziki kuziva chii mutengi ari pamusoro chaizvoizvo asiri akabatikana usiku (nokuti jasi cheki vasikana).
The waitresses zvakanaka--uyewo unogona chete kuwana counter basa kugara.
Waini iyo basa racho rakanga rakanaka zvikuru zvakare.
The Dim Sum akanga saka-saka, asi kwete zvinoshamisa.
Rao's ine basa rakanakisisa uye mhepo muNYC.
Mutengo unonzwisisika kwazvo.
Kubva pakutanga appetizers, ari scallops vakanga incredible, kuti zvinonaka chokoreti souffle pamwe rasberry mint sorbet, takafadzwa kuravira kunzwa.
Bagels yakatanhamara, asi iwe unowana zvaunobhadhara.
Ndinokurudzira zvikuru Cafe St. Bart's nokuda kwezvokudya zvavo, iyo ambience uye basa rinoshamisa.
Vashandi vakanga vachigara, zvokudya zvakanga zvachose zvinonaka uye nzvimbo yacho inofadza.
Chikafu chikuru, chikuru chakarara kunze uye basa rinotyisa.
Hapana chikonzero chebasa rakaipa rakadaro!
Shamwari dzangu neni takawana chizi inoshamisa uye inonaka, itsva yezhizha menyu paArtisanal nezuro usiku.
Chinhu chimwe chete chinoshamisa kupfuura chikafu (icho chakasiyana) ibasa racho.
Kubatanidzwa kweiyo itsva tomato sauce, itsva mozz cheese, basil uye donje ravanoita nehupfu hunobva kune dzimwe nyika, inoita kuti iyi ndiyo imwe ye pizza iri nani muNY.
Zvose zviri zviviri zvine musoro chaizvo mutengo (pakati pe $ 8 yekudya kwemanheru uye $ 5 yemasikati), uye inonaka uye inozadza.
Chikafu chikuru, decor huru, basa guru.
Muto we udon wakanga uri soy sauce nemvura.
Tichifunga mutengo wavo $ 6.25 nokuda kwemasikati chaiwo, ndiro yakanga ridiculously duku.

Guacamole + shrimp appetizer yakanga yakakura chaizvoizvo, isu tose takanga tine filet, yakanaka kwazvo, haina kunyanya kufanana nema frites akauya nawo, asi filet yakanga yakanaka kwazvo, hapana mumwe wedu ane hanya.
Fast basa.

Kusvikira kure ichi ndicho chete Chinese desserts nzvimbo ndinoziva NY kana chero pedyo muNortheastern America kuti anoshumira desserts pamwe frog jelly mune vaviri mhando uye nguruve tsoka ginger simmered mu dema vhiniga.
Kana ichingova martini inokurumidza pabhawa (iyo ini ndinokurudzira Jeffery's) kana pfungwa inovhuvhuta Roast Chicken, enda kuVillage!
My pachangu kufarira chinhu zvose bagel pamwe lox kupararira, asi zvose bagles vari unbeliavably zvakanaka.
Kutanga, weti yakatibatira yakaregeredza kutizadza pazvinhu zvakakosha, izvo ndingadai ndakasarudza kudai ndaiziva pamusoro pazvo.
The dim mari iri delectable apo mitengo zviri nyore zvikuru pamusoro chikwama.
Edza congee uye donut yakafanana neyakadzika yakagochwa dovi yavanoti Ow Ley Soh, chingwa chinonakidza uye chinotapira chekuravira.
Takaudzwa kuti kumirira kwakanga kunenge maminitsi makumi maviri uye kwaizova kusina dambudziko kwedu 8:00 pm curtain call.
Vakatibata zvakanaka uye zvokudya zvakanga zvakanyanya kutsva uye zvakanyatsogadzirwa.
Nguva yedu yokutanga muNew York uye taifanira kuedza New York Bagel.
Vane Indian yechokwadi pamitengo inoshamisa.
Grilled hove yose inoshamisa, guru spicing.
Kunyange zvazvo ndakaita kuchengetedza pa 3pm kweusiku humwe chete kuburikidza neDinnerbroker, takanga takagara patafura neimwe yemaonero akanaka!
Great bhaa, vakawanda gorgeous bartenders iwe wakamboona (kunyanya blonde mukadzi).
Basa rakanatswa zvikuru: kugara kwedu kwakanonoka maminitsi e35 kupfuura kuchengetedza kwedu uye maitre d 'akakumbira ruregerero uye nguva dzose akatichengeta tichiziviswa nezvekufambira mberi.
Chikafu chacho chakanga chakanaka tradional asi chaipisa uye chakanaka nezvikamu zvikuru.
The bruscetta zvishoma soggy, asi saladi vakanga vatsva, zvinosanganisira akanaka musanganiswa greens (kwete iceberg) zvose ndiro dzinoshandiswa piping inopisa kubva mukicheni.
Appetizers vari pane imwe nzvimbo yakapoteredza $ 7 imwe neimwe uye zvokudya zvikuru zviri pakati pe $ 11 ne $ 16.
Muto unopisa uye unovava wakanga uchipisa zvisingatsungiririki uye wakaravira mhiripiri chete uye hapana chimwe chinhu.
Kunyange zvakadaro, edza kamwe chete, sezvo kana iwe ukapedzisira uchida zvokudya, zvinogona kuva chimwe chezviitiko zvako zvakanakisisa zvekudya.

Isu tiri chaizvo pamusoro pe sushi uye isu tose takanga tiri ndapota nesarudzo yega yega iyo yaisanganisira: ceviche mix (chaiyo), crab dumplings, assorted sashimi, sushi uye rolls, mhando mbiri dzesake, uye banana tempura.
Great mapoka makuru uye mhemberero - yedu SUPER HAPPY waiter yaiva varaidzo yemanheru.
Ndaida chaizvo zvakasiyana uye inovated kubata kuti ari cheff anopa zvokudya.
The zvokudya zvegungwa zvinoshamisa, pane zvakanaka waini mazita, uye nguva dzose-kuchinja menyu nguva dzose inopa zvimwe zvikuru zvinoshamisa.
Zvokudya zvacho zvaityisa chose chose!
Nzvimbo iyi ndiyo nzvimbo huru yekumira kwezvokudya zvikuru.
Nguva yokutanga sushi yakanga yakatanhamara, nguva yechipiri yakanga iri zvishoma bland.
Panali kuyembekezera kwa nthawi yaitali tebulo kunja, koma kunali kutentha pang'ono kwambiri padzuwa kotero tebulo lathu la insde linali labwino kwambiri.
Nthawi zonse ziwiri tinayembekezera bwino pa theka la ola la tebulo (ngakhale kuti tinali ndi zosungitsa).
Iwo analibe mayonesi, anaiwala toast wathu, anasiya zosakaniza (mwachitsanzo tchizi mu omelet), pansi kutentha kutentha ndi bacon anali kotero pa ophika izo anagwa pa mbale pamene inu anakhudza izo.
Chakudyacho chinali chodabwitsa, ndipo utumikiwo unali wofulumira komanso wothandiza, koma osati wonyamula kwambiri kapena wothamangira.
Pamene iwo kusunga capex kuti zochepa, iwo amachita kuika ena ndalama mu bagels, chifukwa iwo pakati pa abwino mu mzinda.
Ngati mumakonda nyimbo zanu kuphulika ndi dongosolo si kuti kwambiri ndipo ngati mukufuna kulipira osachepera 100 dollar botolo minimun ndiye inu kukonda izo pano.
KUDANDAULA KWAKUKULU: PALIBE TOASTING YOMWE ILIPO.
Tinathamanga pang'ono mochedwa ku reservation koma sizinali vuto kupeza tebulo lathu nthawi yomweyo.
THe Pizza ndi vinyo anali kwambiri-ntchito kwambiri--koma chimene kwenikweni ANAPANGA malo awa anali kumbuyo malo odyera.
usiku wopanda kusungitsa, tinayenera kuyembekezera pa bar kwa kanthawi, koma bwana anali wabwino kwambiri ndipo anapanga kudikira kwathu kukhala chochitika chachikulu.
Tinali ndi mphika-zomata zomwe zinali zazikulu komanso mbale ya tempura yomwe inali yaikulu.
Ine sindinadye nkhosa chop monga zokoma ngati zimenezo,saladi kwenikweni zabwino atavala ndi mandimu ndi owonjezera virgnin mafuta azitona.
Malo awa samafanana ndi a Mamoun pankhani ya mtengo, mwatsopano, phindu, ndi khalidwe la consisent, koma ndilo lingaliro langa chabe.
Kotero, menyu yalembedwa mu chalk pamwamba pa mutu wanu ndipo zonse zimamveka zokoma.
Kuchokera ku utumiki woopsa, kupita ku chakudya cha bland, osanenapo za oyang'anira osadzipereka, chochitika chonsecho chinali choopsa.
Mkazi woperekera chakudya anapereka lingaliro la magalasi a vinyo amene anapita bwino kwambiri ndi chakudyacho.
Zosiyanasiyana zatsopano, zabwino kwambiri, komanso zoperekera mofulumira kwambiri.
The vinyo ndi tchizi mbale ndi zambiri ndipo sangathe kudikira kuyesa fondue kapena tebulo grilling.
Zokometsera zolimba komanso zochenjera.
Kukondwerera tsiku lobadwa, atatu a ife tinapita ku Mare tikuyembekezera chakudya chachikulu.
Zinali ngati maseva anaiwala kuti iwo kwenikweni ntchito kumeneko ndipo m'malo ankafuna kucheza ndi kukhala ozizira.

Nsomba ndi yatsopano ndipo chidutswa chilichonse chimadulidwa ku ungwiro ndi zokometsera ndi wophika sushi (kawirikawiri ndi wasabi pang'ono atsopano ndi msuzi wa soya komanso nthawi zina ndi mchere wina wa nyanja).
Utumiki unali devine, oysters kumene chilakolako pamene iwo akubwera, ndipo mtengo sangathe kumenyedwa!!
Zonse ndi za chakudya !!
iwo anachita kupereka 15% kuchotsera kumapeto, sizinali zokwanira, monga iwo ankadziwa utumiki anali zoopsa.
Pamene banja linabwera anawapatsa mapulogalamu kuti ayese ma palets awo, kenako anawalamula.
Pitani apa chakudya chamadzulo chachikondi koma osati chifukwa cha zonse kunja wow kudya.
Sungani ndalama zanu ndipo musawononge ma calorie anu, pitani ku Margharita's ku Washington Street m'malo mwake, ali ndi chakudya chodabwitsa ndi utumiki wa BEST.
Kukongoletsa ndi minimalist ndi woyera - palibe chosokoneza kapena kuyamikira.
Wakupha Sushi!

Ndiyenera kuchenjeza wowerenga kuti magawo a magawo ndi ochepa kwambiri (makamaka appetizers), kotero ngati mukukonzekera kudya mpaka mutakhuta ndipo simukufuna kulamula menyu yapadera yolawa ya wophika, konzekerani kulamula ndi kulipira appetizer (1 mbale kwa munthu aliyense chifukwa magawo sali ogawana),  entree yaikulu, ndi udon yozizira kumapeto kwa chakudya.
N'zomvetsa chisoni kuti malo abwino, abwino monga Pink Pony akhoza kuwonongeka kwambiri ndi utumiki lousy.
Ngati mukuyang'ana chakudya chachikulu pamtengo wabwino, pitani ku Del Frisco's!
Tinali crawfish wophika ndipo ngakhale kupanga chisokonezo, zinali tani zosangalatsa ndi zokoma ndithu komanso.
Ife, tinali anayi, tinafika masana - malowa anali opanda kanthu - ndipo ogwira ntchito anachita ngati kuti tikuwakakamiza ndipo anali amwano kwambiri.
ine ndikanangopempha kuti palibe mafuta nthawi yotsatira.
Tinangolamula desserts ndi zakumwa, koma palibe refills anaperekedwa.
Zonsezi ndi zokoma, ophika ndi aubwenzi ndipo amafunitsitsa kutenga kanthawi ndikulankhula nanu ndikugwedeza dzanja lanu.
Chakudyacho ndi chochititsa mantha - ndithudi yesani bass yamizeremizere.
Ngakhale kuti Spider Roll ingawoneke ngati yovuta kudya, ndi nkhanu yofewa ya chipolopolo yomwe imakhala kunja kwa mpukutu, ndi bwino mtengo womwe mumalipira.
Ogwira ntchito amamvetsera kwambiri ndipo pafupifupi nthawi zonse tikhoza kupeza tebulo.

Khonde lopapatiza limatsogolera ku malo ang'onoang'ono omwe pali ma counter atatu ang'onoang'ono oyera a tiled, chisokonezo chachikulu (nkhokwe za mabotolo, zitini) ndi counter yaying'ono yomwe imagwira 12-14 entrees.
Utumiki nthawi zonse zoipa ngakhale, musayembekezere zambiri chirichonse kuchokera seva wanu, ndipo ine sindingalimbikitse kubweretsa tsiku pano kapena.
Komabe, quibbles aliyense za bilu anali kutali-anapereka ndi kutsanulira-wanu miyeso ya liquers amene anali courtesey wa nyumba ...
Chifukwa chake, burgers awo anagwa m'manja mwawo ndipo anapanga chisokonezo chotero kuti iwo did'nt kumverera ngati kuwamaliza.
Menyu inkawoneka kuti ili ndi zakudya zosiyanasiyana kwa okonda nsomba za m'nyanja ndi njira zosangalatsa zokonzekera.
Ngati simukudziwa bwino zakudya, mungakumane ndi mavuto olamula pano ndipo onetsetsani kuti mubweretse ndalama zambiri ndi inu monga iwo salandira makadi a ngongole.
Malowo sanali ovuta kwambiri kupeza, koma anali mtundu wodzaza, mwamsanga pamene ine ndi chibwenzi changa tinapeza chakudya chathu, mzere unafika pakhomo.
The Steak Tartare ndi kubetcherana kwambiri, iwo kukonza izo kwa inu pa tebulo.
Chonde ngati kuganiza kwanu za izo kupita, ndi kukhala kudikira simudzakhumudwa.
Menyu si kanthu monga yomwe ili pa webusaitiyi.
The zokometsera nsomba mpukutu anali zachilendo zabwino ndi thanthwe nkhanu tempura anali zozizwitsa, appetizer kwambiri kugawana!
Chakudyacho chinali chodabwitsa, utumikiwo unali wosamala kwambiri ndi munthu, ndipo bwanji za ambience imeneyo!
Ogwira ntchito ndi eni ake sanali osasamala za izi ndipo analonjeza kuti adzaitana wolanda koma sanali okhumudwa kapena opepesa monga momwe ndikanayembekezera.
Tinali kukonzekera kupeza dessert koma woperekera chakudya kwenikweni kudzera mu bilu pa ife tisanakhale ndi mwayi wolamula.
Sindine wotsutsa zakudya, koma ndikufuna kuganiza kuti ndili ndi chidziwitso chaching'ono pansi pa lamba wanga pokhala ku NY kwa zaka 11 zapitazi.

Ngakhale Kuti Sapphire ndithudi sakusowa ambiance, ndipo mwinamwake ali ndi zokongoletsera zabwino kwambiri za malo odyera aliwonse a ku India omwe ndakhala ndikupita ku New York City, chakudyacho sichinali chimene ndinkayembekezera.
Mbatata ya tuna ndi wasabe ndi yabwino kwambiri.
