Komabe chakudya chokhacho ndi chabwino kwambiri.
Ogwira ntchito anali accomodating, chakudya chinali chokoma kwathunthu ndipo malo ndi okongola.
Mkate ndi mkate wofewa wa paratha (mosiyana ndi mkate wamba womwe amagwiritsa ntchito ku Calcutta), ndipo zodzazazo ndi tandoori kalembedwe komanso zokoma kwambiri.
Chifukwa cha zovuta woonda pakhungu, kutenga-kunja pies kupeza soggy m'mabokosi awo.
Kalembedwe kotchuka kwambiri Izakaya (Sake ndi gawo laling'ono la mbale za sake-friendly ).
Chakudya chachikulu, mitengo yayikulu, utumiki waukulu.
Iwo sanathe ngakhale kupanga saladi yomwe inali yosangalatsa.
Menyu inasintha, magawo anali ochepa kwambiri kuposa kale, mbale ya lentil inali yamchere yosatheka, mbale ya mpunga ya basmati inalibe kukoma.
Sizidzaphwanya banki koma inenso sindingabwerenso kukalandira chakudya.
Ponena za utumikiwo, odyerawo sanali aubwenzi kwenikweni, koma anapeza ntchitoyo.
Zokometsera ndi zazikulu, ndipo menyu ndi yaikulu.
Mkazi woperekera chakudya anapereka lingaliro la magalasi a vinyo amene anapita bwino kwambiri ndi chakudyacho.
Zakudya zochititsa chidwi za chakudyacho zimagonjetsa m'kamwa, moona kukumbatira kukongola kwa zakudya zenizeni za Thai.
Winnie ndi antchito ake ndi gulu labwino kwambiri limene mungapeze likutumikirani.
Pizza ndi yokoma - amagwiritsa ntchito mozzarella yatsopano m'malo mwa tchizi chotsika mtengo, chozizira, chosweka chofala kwa pizzaria ambiri.
Kawirikawiri 3 vs. 4 zinthu pa mbale.
Kwa inu nonse atsopano ku chakudya cha ku India, yesani Paneer Roll, ndi chidutswa cha kumwamba.
Ma appetizer onse ndi saladi anali abwino kwambiri, steak inali kuthirira pakamwa ndipo pasitala anali wokoma!!
Paneer wa palak anali muyezo, ndipo sindinali wokonda malai kofta.
Mwiniwake ndi waubwenzi kwambiri komanso mnyamata wamkulu, pitani mukayese pizza yake, mudzakonda!
Kukongoletsa matabwa a blonde kumatonthoza kwambiri, chifukwa cha premium ndi chabwino kwambiri ndipo utumiki ndi waukulu.

Ndikumvetsetsa dera ndi anthu omwe simuyenera kubwera kuno chifukwa cha chikondi, zokopa ambiance kapena utumiki wa nyenyezi zisanu zomwe zikuwonetsa sommlier ndi maze ovuta a kapitawo ndi othandizira kumbuyo - mumabwera ku zakudya zenizeni, zokonda, zochitika.

zosankha zanga ndi izi: - Scallion Pancake (wokazinga ndi madzi a masamba, wapadera kwambiri komanso wokoma) - Guizhou Chicken - Shredded Squid Family Style (imodzi mwazomwe ndimakonda kwambiri) - Sichuan Spicy Soft Shell Crab - Shuizhu Fish (iyi ndi ya mafani a zakudya za Sichuan hardcore, sindingalimbikitse anzanga a ku America monga momwe zimakhalira zokometsera kwambiri.
Chitsanzo ndi msuzi umene unali pafupifupi 6 oz kwa $ 12 madola ndi bowa kumene $ 12 pafupifupi 1oz.

Ndiyenera kuchenjeza wowerenga kuti magawo a magawo ndi ochepa kwambiri (makamaka appetizers), kotero ngati mukukonzekera kudya mpaka mutakhuta ndipo simukufuna kulamula menyu yapadera yolawa ya wophika, konzekerani kulamula ndi kulipira appetizer (1 mbale kwa munthu aliyense chifukwa magawo sali ogawana),  entree yaikulu, ndi udon yozizira kumapeto kwa chakudya.
Chakudyacho chinafika mphindi 20 nditaimbira foni, kuzizira ndi soggy.
Tinadya kuno mu March, 2006 ndipo tinalamula chakudya chamadzulo cha 3-course chisanafike ndi ndege ya vinyo.

Ngakhale $ 20 entrée osiyanasiyana si okwera mtengo kwambiri, ku New York City, palidi chakudya chabwino mu mndandanda umenewo, ndipo kotero Sapphire, ngakhale kuti ndi mlengalenga wokongola, mwinamwake sadzakhala malo odyera omwe ndidzabwerera.
Koma thai ndithudi si wamkulu -- bland ndi indistinguished.
Koma chinthu chimene ine ndi mkazi wanga ndinkadana nacho chinali chofuula kwambiri ndipo chinamveka ngati 'bar' kapena 'pub'.
Ma seva ena akupangitsani kumva ngati akukuchitirani chifundo kuti akubweretsetseni chakudya.
Choyamba, tinauzidwa kuti panali kudikirira kwa mphindi 30 ndipo tinayamba kuchoka, pamene mkazi wolandira alendoyo anadzipereka kutiimbira foni yathu pamene tebulo linali lokonzekera.
Ngakhale tinali kufunafuna letesi nthawi zonse ndi walnuts ena saladi tinapeza anali kwambiri.
Mlengalenga ndi wabwino kwambiri ngati kufunafuna kwanu malo okhazikika kumbuyo ndi njira yotsika mtengo yothera masana a sabata.
Eni ake ndi ogwira ntchito ndi aubwenzi ndipo pizza yawo ndi yosangalatsa.
Ive anapempha woyang'anira ngolo kuti apereke mpunga wokutidwa ndi tsamba la lotus ndipo anayankha mpunga kumbuyo ndipo anangochoka.
Chakudyacho nthawi zambiri chimakhala chabwino koma ndithudi si malo omasuka kupita.
Mwamwayi tinasunga malo a BBQ Salmon, Sea Bass ndi Crispy Duck.
Kwa zaka zambiri, nthawi zonse yapereka chakudya chosangalatsa ndi chakudya chabwino ndi vinyo.
Atatu tsamba vinyo menyu, tsamba limodzi entrée ndi horedevous.
Kamodzi chakudya chamadzulo ndi kamodzi kwa brunch.
kukonda chakudya.

Ndikudabwa ndi ndemanga osauka- Ine ndikupeza malo awa kukhala standout Chitaliyana m'dera anasefukira ndi Italy- mitengo yaikulu, mlengalenga kwambiri, utumiki wabwino ndi mndandanda vinyo zodabwitsa.
Amapereka menyu yomweyo koma ali ndi zakumwa zolengedwa zomwe zimakhala ndi mowa ndi mayina a cheeky - koma zimakuwonongerani.
Chifukwa chakuti tinalibe malo osungirako, tinkangokhala m'munda wakumbuyo, koma zinali zabwino kwambiri, zodzipatula komanso zangwiro m'nyengo yabwino.

The sushi wakhala kuchokera pafupifupi kuti pansipa pafupifupi, utumiki kudikira nthawizonse wakhala sub-par m'mlengalenga amapita kuchokera zabwino kwenikweni zokwiyitsa (ngati inu kukhala m'deralo kupitirira khitchini, ndi acousitcs ndi zoopsa, chirichonse echoes ndi phokoso kwambiri).
Great vinyo mndandanda, moyenera mtengo.--Sara
Popeza tinapeza Ping's pa intaneti, tinalowa ndi mavuto koma nthawi yomweyo tinayikidwa kuti tichepetse ndi matanki a nsomba omwe amakupatsani moni monga u walk in.
Chitowe chinali chosangalatsa komanso chapadera ndipo ma pasta anali odzaza ndi kukoma.
Chakudyacho sichinali chatsopano, msuzi unali wa bland ndi mafuta kwambiri.
Utumiki ndi waubwenzi, mitengo ndi yabwino - nthawi yoperekera inali pang'onopang'ono pang'onopang'ono, koma momwe pizza iyi imakoma, ndine wofunitsitsa kunyalanyaza.
Wogulitsa moŵa pa ulendo wanga waposachedwapa anali wamwano kwambiri kwakuti sindidzabwereranso.
Menyu ya takeout imanena kuti muyang'anire menyu yowonjezera yopereka mbale zambiri za ku Italy, sindingathe kudikira!
Pakuti chakudya chachikulu Chinese pafupi, muli Wu Liang Ye ndi Grand Sichuan basi chipika kutali.
Ogwira ntchito anali otanganitsidwa kwambiri kulamula sushi kaamba ka chakudya chamadzulo ndiyeno kuiika kuti adye pa bala ngakhale kundibweretsera cheke changa.
Ndinali pano masabata angapo kumbuyo ndipo tinali ndi zochitika zoipa kwambiri za makasitomala ku malo odyera.
PALIBEnso kusungitsa, nsonga zodula ndi zinthu zokhumudwitsa.
Zokonda zimapangitsa pakamwa panu kukhala madzi ambiri.
komabe, ndi utumiki umene umasiya kukoma koipa mkamwa mwanga.
Other kuposa utumiki crappy kwa anthu awiri, ndi kwambiri.
Oyang'anira alendowo sanali atcheru kupatulapo kuti ndalamazo zinapezeka patebulo tisanamalize.
Malowa ndi okongola, amakono komanso osewera ndipo ndidzabwereranso pafupipafupi.
Nthawi zambiri ndimapita kumeneko pambuyo pake usiku ndikachoka kuntchito kuti ndisathane ndi makamu kapena mizere.
Mphukira ndi yowonda, zosakaniza zimakhala zatsopano ndipo ogwira ntchito ndi aubwenzi.
Ndikuyang'ana mozungulira, ndinawona chipinda chodzaza ndi anthu a ku New York akusangalala ndi chakudya chenicheni mu lesitilanti yeniyeni, osati clubhouse ya kuyesera kodabwitsa kuyesa kuwonedwa.
Tinathetsa zochitika zathu zazikulu pokhala ndi Gulab Jamun (dessert) yomwe inalimbikitsidwa ndi woperekera chakudya.
Mkati mwa miyezi yapitayi ya 3, wophika ndi ogwira ntchito anasintha ndipo sizinali zabwino.
Makamaka ankakonda nkhuku tikka ndi naan, ndi dals.
The chakudya inludes wotchuka scrumptious bombay kalembedwe chaat monga bhelpuri, sevpuri ndi samosa chaats, komanso ena appetizers kwambiri indian.
Sindikudziwa ngati ndingatchule chakudya pano Indian monga ndi fusion ya zomwe zikuwoneka ngati French ndi Indian kapena kukhudza kwachilendo.

Zakudya zoperekedwa zinali zapadera, zokoma kwambiri komanso zatsopano kuchokera ku soseji za nkhosa, sardines ndi mabisiketi, nkhanu zazikulu zonse ku ayisikilimu wodabwitsa wa pistachio (zabwino komanso zatsopano zomwe ndakhala nazo).
Ndinali ndi chakudya chochititsa mantha, ndipo seva yathu inkatitsogolera ku vinyo wabwino kwambiri mu mtengo wathu, m'malo motilola kugula vinyo wamtengo wapatali mofananamo womwe sunali wabwino.
The kudikira ndodo ndi zosangalatsa, zosangalatsa, ndipo kwa mbali yaikulu zokongola (mu zodabwitsa kukongola kukongoletsa njira, osati kuti iye-njira-cuter-kuposa-ine-kuti-b@ #$* njira).
Anali ndi chakudya chamadzulo usiku kwambiri Loweruka usiku.
Ogwira ntchito nthawi zonse akhala aubwenzi popanda kuwoneka ngati grating, ndipo wophika watipatsa moni nthawi zingapo.
Wogwira ntchito waubwenzi yekha anali mnyamata pa bala.
Mpunga unali woipa ndipo unaphikidwa moipa kwambiri moti unali wovuta.
Ndadikira chakudya choposa ola limodzi.
Ogwira ntchito amakupangitsani kumva kunyumba, chakudya ndi chachikulu ndipo mlengalenga ndi WODABWITSA!

Tinapanga kusungitsa chakudya chamadzulo koyambirira ndipo tinachita chidwi kwambiri, kundikumbutsa za agogo anga aamuna, malo ake akale a sukulu ya ku Italy okhala ndi zinthu zambiri zosangalatsa zosirira.
Msuzi pa pizza ndi wabwino kwambiri ndi adyo ndi tomato atsopano ndipo samawononga.
Pamene ine ndinakhala kumpoto kwa kanthawi ine kugula amaundana bagels ndipo iwo adzakhalabe bwino kuposa wina aliyense.
Utumikiwu ndi wabwino kwambiri, zokongoletsera ndi zazikulu, ndipo chakudyacho ndi chokoma ndipo chimabwera m'magawo akuluakulu.
Kuchokera ku caviar yochititsa chidwi kupita ku waitstaff yochereza alendo, ndinamva ngati mafumu ndipo ndinkasangalala ndi sekondi iliyonse.
Pasitala wapadera wa bowa wa porcini anali wopanda kukoma, momwemonso tagliatelle ya nsomba za m'nyanja.
Utumikiwo unali wosamala ndipo malingaliro ake a zinthu za menyu anali pa chizindikiro.
yesani zokometsera nkhanu appetizer (kachiwiri, osati mtengo waukulu kwambiri padziko lapansi koma woyenera mtengo) ndipo nkhosa vindaloo ndi yaikulu.
Ogwira ntchito ndi othandiza kwambiri komanso atcheru.
Takhala tikutsatira chakudya cha chef Lyle kuzungulira New York kwa zaka 15 ndipo pamene tikukhalabe akale, zatsopano zake ndi bistro fare zatipangitsa kubwerera ndi kubwerera.
The sushi ndi pafupifupi ndi mitengo ndi chirichonse koma.
Kukongoletsa malo ndi mabafa obisika kunapangitsa kuseka kwabwino.
Woperekera chakudyayo anandithira madzi m'manja ndi kuchokapo.
Best Reuben sangweji konse!
Ngakhale ambiance ndi mlengalenga anali kwambiri, chakudya ndi utumiki zikanakhala bwino kwambiri.
Baluchi's ili ndi chakudya cholimba komanso chokongoletsera chabwino pa mitengo yoyenera.

Ngakhale atakankhidwa kunja ndi Famous Ray's yopanda kalasi, Sal wawuka kachiwiri kuti apitirize cholowa cha amalume a bambo ake ndi kumwetulira, chikondi chenicheni kwa dera lake, ndipo tisaiwale Pizza Yopambana!
Iwo anasonyeza mphindi 15 nsomba ya tuna itasungunuka.

Ngakhale kuti mosakayikira mudzakhala pansi patebulo ndi zomwe zikuwoneka ngati malo osakwanira (mosasamala kanthu za kukula kwa phwando lanu), atomosphere yotentha ndi yoyenera malo opanikizika- mudzasangalala ndikuiwala za malo olimba omwe muli nawo.
Mlengalenga ndi waukulu!!
Ndikungodabwa kuti mungakhale bwanji ndi chakudya chokoma chotere cha ndalama zochepa chonchi.
The kudikira pano ndi yaitali kwa dim ndalama, koma ngati simumakonda kugawana matebulo kapena ngati wamba raucous dim sum m'mlengalenga si gig wanu, ichi ndi wosalala (kwa Chinatown) njira.
Pizza inalidi yabwino.
Utumikiwo unali waubwenzi ndipo mkhalidwewo unali wamba.
Ndizosavuta kupeza kusungitsa pamalo apamwamba ku NYC ndi chidziwitso cha sabata.

Ndinalamula bakha wa tamarind ndipo mkazi wanga analamula noodles ndi nyama ya ng'ombe yapansi, ndipo tonse tinali okondwa ndi njira imene mbalezo zinadzutsa zokometsera za Thai m'njira zosayembekezereka.
Makhalidwe a chakudya ndi abwino kwambiri ndipo mtengo ndi wotsika mtengo, kumamatira ku nkhumba, nsomba, nkhuku, nkhosa ndi ndiwo zamasamba.
Chakudya ndi chabwino kwambiri, ndipo ambience, chabwino, ndi nkhani ya malingaliro, ena angaone kuti ndi chinthu chokoma, ndinaganiza kuti chinali chokhumudwitsa chabe.
Utumikiwo unali wabwino kwambiri ndipo chakudyacho chinali chokoma.
Anti-pasta inali yabwino kwambiri, makamaka calamari, monga momwe analili kudzaza pasta mains.
Iwo analibe mayonesi, anaiwala toast wathu, anasiya zosakaniza (mwachitsanzo tchizi mu omelet), pansi kutentha kutentha ndi bacon anali kotero pa ophika izo anagwa pa mbale pamene inu anakhudza izo.
Great vinyo kusankha, Gigondas ndi ofunika mtengo, ndi nyumba champagne ndi mtengo waukulu.

The ali pa 100 mowa osiyana kupereka mlendo wawo kotero kuti anapanga mwamuna wanga wosangalala kwambiri ndi chakudya chinali chokoma, ngati ine ndikuyenera amalangiza mbale ayenera kukhala pumkin tortelini.
Utumiki waukulu, chakudya chachikulu.
Zakudya za nyama tsopano zimakongoletsa zosankha, ngakhale kuti padakali chiwerengero chachikulu cha zosankha zamasamba-wochezeka.
Pamene mukufuna chidutswa cha nyama ya ng'ombe, mutu pa pa.

Kuchokera ku pulogalamu yoyamikira yophika ya butternut squash ravioli yovuta mu msuzi wokoma wa truffle kupita ku buttery yodabwitsa ndi langostine entree yofewa kupita ku dessert yomwe sindingathe kukumbukira chifukwa cha Cakebread Cabernet yosangalatsa yomwe tinkamwa - madzulo onse anali odabwitsa.
Ndi pizza ya O.K basi.
Ndadya pa Saulo, nthawi zambiri, chakudya nthawi zonse chimakhala chokhazikika, chabwino kwambiri.
Yesani Pad Thai, ndizodabwitsa ndipo mitengo yawo ndi yotsika mtengo kwambiri!
Kwa anthu omwe akufuna chakudya chachikulu kuphatikizapo utumiki waukulu, Roxy ndi malo oti MUPEWE!
Komabe, mkate ndi nkhosa zimene ndinali nazo chakudya chisanafike zinali zabwino kwambiri.
Koma pitsa ndi njira yodula.
Ndakhala ndi pizza nthawi zonse ndi caprese saladi appetizer.
Chabwino pa deegan yaikulu mumapeza azimayi ochokera mumzinda wonse.
Malo awa ali bwino Chinese kalembedwe BBQ nthiti mu mzinda.
Utumiki ndi wodabwitsa, komabe osati wopambanitsa, ndipo zokongoletsera zimabweretsa kukoma kwa SoHo yamakono ku Queens.
Agalu otentha anali ozizira pakati ndipo ma buns anali akale.
Ndi wapamwamba-zamakono ndipo nthawi zonse pali wina kutenga kuti mpando wopanda kanthu, kotero zikuoneka kuti makasitomala wakhala ankaona osati za mfundo.
Yesani nyanja bass.
Alendo ena ankasangalala ndi pizza, saladi yodulidwa ya santa fe ndi nsomba ndi chips.
Its worth the wait though.
Tinali ndi desserts kwambiri (kuphatikizapo cannoli yabwino kwambiri yomwe ndakhala nayo) ndiyeno iwo anapereka pambuyo pa chakudya chamadzulo, panyumba.
The ambience ndi wokongola ndi zabwino kukambirana, kotero wamba masana pano mwina kukhala bwino.
Tinali titakhalabe pa bala pamene tinali kumwa sangria, koma poyang'ana kutali ndi bala pamene tinabwerera m'mbuyo, $2 inali itapita anthu pafupi nafe anati wogulitsa moŵa anaitenga.
Pambuyo kwenikweni kusangalala tokha pa bala tinakhala pansi pa tebulo ndi kudya chakudya chamadzulo.

Guacamole + nkhanu appetizer anali kwenikweni kwambiri, ife tonse tinali filet, zabwino kwambiri, sanali kwambiri ngati frites kuti anabwera ndi, koma filet anali wabwino kwambiri, palibe aliyense wa ife amasamala.
Chilichonse chikuwoneka bwino, zakumwa, zokongoletsera, chakudya, ngakhale anthu.
Mpunga unali woipa ndipo unaphikidwa moipa kwambiri moti unali wovuta.
Mlengalenga wabwino kwambiri, mbale zokoma zabwino ndi utumiki waubwenzi.
The ndodo si friendliest kapena aluso kwambiri, ndipo ine ndine stickler kwa utumiki, koma zina zonse za malo awa amapanga izo.
Mphindi 20 za kusungitsa kwathu koma zinatipatsa nthawi yokhala ndi ma cocktails angapo ndikusangalala ndi malo athu ozungulira ndi wina ndi mnzake.
Sangweji ya Pastrami inali ngati buttah ndipo inali ndi pickles ndi mowa wozizira wozizira kuti atsuke pansi, zinali zosangalatsa.
Gome pafupi nafe linafunsa ngati iye anaphwanya mphesa iyemwini pamene botolo lawo la vinyo lomwe linachedwa kalekale pomalizira pake linafika.
Chakudya chachikulu (sipinachi ndi chimanga dumplings ndi massamman curry), wochezeka kwambiri ndipo palibe utumiki wopanda pake ndi bafa loyera ndi funky.
Mkazi wake Tanya, mkazi wolandira alendo, amamaliza mkhalidwe wotonthoza mwa kukhala wokoma mtima ndi wachisomo.
The pitsa wamba anali soggy ndi kulenga bowa zakutchire (m'badwo wachitatu-Fornini) pitsa tinali anali ananyowa ndi mafuta truffle pakati( kachiwiri kupanga izo soggy) ndi nothingon ena onse.
Zonse zoperekedwa mosavuta pakhomo penipeni.
Wokondedwa wathu wovomerezeka ndi orrechiete ndi soseji ndi nkhuku (kawirikawiri othandizira ndi okoma mtima kuti agawane mbale pakati kotero mumapeza kuyesa nyama zonse).
Ndikupangira kwambiri Nina kwa aliyense amene akufuna kukhala ndi chakudya chamadzulo chachikondi mu kutentha kwa mtima kozungulira wodzazidwa ndi makandulo ndi zithunzi za banja.
Gome lathu laling'ono la awiri (mbale za chakudya chamadzulo zinapachikidwa pamphepete) linali pakati penipeni pa imodzi mwa njira zoyendetsera chakudya.
Utumikiwu unali wosamala, komabe wosasangalatsa, chakudyacho chinali chabwino kwambiri kuposa malo odyera ambiri otchuka ku Midtown ndipo mndandanda wa vinyo ndi waukulu komanso wogulira bwino.
Malo awa akanakhala otumikiridwa bwino kwambiri poyendetsedwa ndi gulu lomwe limamvetsetsa makasitomala.
Komabe, iwo ali ndi pastrami yodabwitsa kwambiri ndipo msuzi unagunda malo.
Chakudya chilichonse ku Kai chinalidi chokoma, chatsopano, ndi chokongola.
Great pitsa kwa malo chakudya chamasana.
Chakudya ndi pafupifupi, ndipo ndinganene ngakhale unyolo odyera Baluchi a kukoma bwino.
Kuyambira pachiyambi appetizers, ndi scallops anali zosaneneka, kuti zokoma chokoleti souffle ndi rasberry mint sorbet, tinali okondwa ndi kukoma kumverera.
Chakudya chachikulu (sipinachi ndi chimanga dumplings ndi massamman curry), wochezeka kwambiri ndipo palibe utumiki wopanda pake ndi bafa loyera ndi funky.
Muyenera kukhala ndi crabmeat lasagna yomwe ili kunja kwa dziko lino ndi chokoleti mkate pudding kwa dessert.
Zili ngati iwo anatenga nkhuku zotsalira, kutsanulira mafuta ndi kuwaza tsabola ufa pa izo (msuzi unali translucent ndi wofiira).
Utumikiwu unali wosamala, komabe wosasangalatsa, chakudyacho chinali chabwino kwambiri kuposa malo odyera ambiri otchuka ku Midtown ndipo mndandanda wa vinyo ndi waukulu komanso wogulira bwino.
Sitinakhalepo ndi vuto lililonse ndi kulipiritsa chakudya kapena nsonga, ndipo chakudyacho chinaperekedwa mofulumira, koma timakhala mphindi zochepa chabe kuyenda kuchokera kwa iwo.
ngati mukuyang'ana sushi yangwiro yachikhalidwe, pitani apa - ngati mukuyang'ana zophatikiza zosangalatsa, yesani sushi ya gari's (mbali yakum'mawa).
Timapita Lolemba kwa prix fixe ndipo zomwe takumana nazo ndi chakudya zakhala zofanana ndi Blue Ribbon.
Kwa malo, mitengo ndi yomveka kwambiri.
Tinadya kunja kumbuyo kwa khonde, zomwe ndizofunikira monga momwe zimakhalira zozizira ndipo nyimbo zimamveka bwino kumeneko.
Sindinakhalepo ndi cheescake ngati iyi.
Waitstaff ndi wamkulu, wosamala kwambiri.
Restaurant snobs sayenera kuvutika, ichi ndi malo ang'onoang'ono, oyandikana nawo.
Yesani tandoori salmon!
Mndandanda wa vinyo si waukulu, ndipo zokometsera zimatumizidwa kuchokera ku Bruno's down the street, zomwe sizili bwino monga momwe zinalili kale.
kenako tinalamula dinosaur rolls ndi white tuna sashimi.
Komanso, ngati simukufuna kukhala patebulo linalake, simuyenera!
kicker weniweni wa menyu, komabe, ndi cubes ng'ombe kapena nkhuku ndi chili ndi udzu wa mandimu.
The nkhawa yokhayo ndili ndi slighly onse malonda waitstaff amene kulamula ndi kuponya chakudya pansi, kuthamangira inu kunja.
Koma mukakhala pansi ma waitresses ndi aakulu, amafotokoza zonse pa menyu, ndipo mtengo wa chakudya ndi wotsika mtengo kwenikweni kwa utumiki womwe mumapeza.
Nsomba zinachitidwa mopambanitsa.
Vinyo wamkulu, chakudya chachikulu.

Mwana wathu amakonda pitsa ndipo tili ndi pizzaria yotsimikizika ya Neapolitan mumzinda wathu (Seattle), tinakonda izi pafupifupi kwambiri - ndipo kusiyana kunali kwambiri za zokonda zaumwini kuposa kulingalira kulikonse pa malo odyera alionse.
Ndiponso, mpungawo unalibe zokometsera, chotero sushi inali ya bland ndi yonyansa.

Koma musati konse kulamula bacon mochedwa pa nite (kaya mbale kapena masangweji, chifukwa chimenecho musati kuchokera aliyense kutenga kunja malo) monga momwe zilili kuchokera m'mawa frying kutembenukira mwamphamvu pafupifupi ngati bacos, kupweteka molars wanga.
The ambiance ndi zochepa chakudya si phenomenal, koma ena mbale ndi zabwino ndithu, monga eggplant parmesan, nyama yamphamba mu carozza nkhuku saltimbocca.
Zingakhale zodzaza pang'ono kumapeto kwa sabata, koma vibe ndi yabwino ndipo ndi chakudya chabwino kwambiri cha ku France chomwe mudzapeza m'deralo.
Chakudya chosavuta chotonthoza ndi magawo otentha ndi lage.

Cornelia Street ikuwoneka ngati Broadway yokhazikitsidwa kwa West Side Story ndipo mkati mwa Po ndi quaint yozizira kwambiri simungathe kukhala pamwamba pa malo a chakudya chamadzulo chachikondi ku NYC.
Great vinyo mndandanda, moyenera mtengo.--Sara

Ndikumvetsetsa dera ndi anthu omwe simuyenera kubwera kuno chifukwa cha chikondi, zokopa ambiance kapena utumiki wa nyenyezi zisanu zomwe zikuwonetsa sommlier ndi maze ovuta a kapitawo ndi othandizira kumbuyo - mumabwera ku zakudya zenizeni, zokonda, zochitika.
Osatsimikiza kumene wobwereza wam'mbuyomu, lonk, anadya, koma Saulo ali m'dera lalikulu ndipo ali ndi chakudya chachikulu!
Kukongoletsa ndi kosavuta kwambiri koma omasuka.
Ngati muli m'gulu lalikulu, malowa ndi angwiro chifukwa amabwezeretsanso kugawana - ali ndi susans aulesi pa matebulo ambiri - ngakhale mabanja amatha kumva bwino pano.
Ngakhale matebulo akhoza kukhala pafupi, kandulo-kuwala, chakudya khalidwe ndi utumiki overcompensate.
Chakudyacho chinkawoneka chokondweretsa kwambiri komanso chokoma popeza chinabwera pa mbale zosiyanasiyana zapamwamba.
The dosas ndi skimpy, osakongola ndi dontho ndi mafuta, ndipo ineyo ndikanamwa popcorn topping ndisanadye wina wa izi.
Bar yozizira yokhala ndi chakudya chachikulu, ndi matani a mowa wabwino kwambiri.
Angakwanitse kwambiri ndi kwambiri ambient!
Chakudya ndi chachikulu, utumiki uli bwino.

Koma musati konse kulamula bacon mochedwa pa nite (kaya mbale kapena masangweji, chifukwa chimenecho musati kuchokera aliyense kutenga kunja malo) monga momwe zilili kuchokera m'mawa frying kutembenukira mwamphamvu pafupifupi ngati bacos, kupweteka molars wanga.
Awa ndi malo abwino nthawi zonse kudya chakudya chamasana kapena chakudya chamadzulo.
Ogwira ntchito kumeneko komanso mwamtheradi katundu bagel ndi kirimu tchizi (amapeza pang'ono zonyansa).
Malo ndi ozizira kwambiri ndipo utumiki ndi mwamsanga ndi curtious.
Chakudyacho chinali chachikulu.
anangobwera kuchokera ku chakudya chamasana ku Tamarind ndipo zinali zabwino kwambiri.
Utumikiwu nthawi zina umasowa cholinga ndipo sibwino ngati mukufulumira koma sindinachitidwepo mwamwano.
Nyimbozo zimakhala zofuula pang'ono nthawi zina, koma zinangondipangitsa kufuna kutsamira pafupi ndi mkazi wanga wokongola, ndipo monga momwe ndinachitira, ndinapeza whiff ya corriander.
Ndi malo odyera wangwiro kwa NY moyo kalembedwe, izo ali kapangidwe ozizira, awsome zakumwa ndi chakudya ndi zambiri zabwino kuyang'ana anthu kudya ndi atapachikidwa pa pinki bala ...
Wolandira alendoyo ndi wamwano mpaka kukhala wokhumudwitsa.
Menyu ya sake sayenera kunyalanyazidwa!
Komabe, m'chilimwe cha 2003, zikuoneka kasamalidwe wasintha ndi khomo lalikulu lalikulu wakhala m'malo kwa galasi kutsogolo ridding yekha mdima chikondi getup.
Onetsetsani kuyesa nyengo, ndipo nthawi zonse zokoma, zapadera.
Sitidzapitanso kumalo ano kukadya chakudya chabwino.
Mbale ya tchizi ndi chisangalalo chosiyanasiyana komanso mtengo waukulu pa $ 10.
Ndinapeza chakudyacho kukhala chapadera, makamaka chakudya cha salmon chimene ndinali nacho.
Tinayamba ndi tchizi fondue (kusakaniza kwa artisanal) ndipo tinawonjezera maapulo ndi kielbasa kuti tiviike.
Chinthu chokha chodabwitsa kwambiri kuposa chakudya (chomwe chiri chapadera) ndi utumiki.
Thalia ndi malo odyera okongola omwe ali ndi anthu okongola omwe akukutumikirani, koma chakudyacho sichikugwirizana kwenikweni.
The khalidwe la chakudya pa odyera izi limodzi ndi wosangalatsa moyo jazz zimapangitsa malo awa wangwiro 10!
Chibwenzi changa chinali ndi New England Chowder zinali zabwino koma ndikuganiza kuti mphoto iyenera kupita ku Lobster Bisque.
Ine sindikanadandaula ngakhale pang'ono ngati chakudya osachepera kulawa zabwino koma khalidwe la chakudya anali crappy, kwambiri.
i would recommend reservations on weekends though.
Kalembedwe kotchuka kwambiri Izakaya (Sake ndi gawo laling'ono la mbale za sake-friendly ).
anthu ndi amwano pang'ono kachiwiri ndi new york!
Malo abwino kwambiri!
Chakudyacho ndi chokoma komanso chokonzedwa bwino pamodzi ndi utumiki waubwenzi komanso wa munthu.
Tinayamba ndi lox ndi mussels (ive yabwino kwambiri yomwe inali nayo, nthawi zonse) ndipo tinali ndi cod ndi trout chakudya chamadzulo.
Ngati mukuyang'ana khalidwe labwino, zotsika mtengo zimadya - iyi ndi malo.
Ndipo magawo aakulu kwambiri.
Malo okhala anali ngati anali kuyesa kupeza kuchuluka kwa anthu mu lesitilanti, kotero khalani abwino kwa mnansi wanu mukamadya pano.
Eggplant parmesan imakhalanso yaikulu, ndipo mnzanga yemwe anakulira ku Manhattan amanena kuti palibe amene amatumikira ziti yophika bwino ndi meatsauce.
Malo awa ali realy atsopano sushi ndi zabwino menyu lalikulu la Japanese zakudya tingachipeze powerenga.
Ndikadapeza slaw ya cole ndi knish ngati mimba yanga ikanakhala ndi malo ambiri.
Chakudyacho chinali chokonzedwa bwino ndipo utumikiwo unali wosatheka.
Mipando imakhala yosasangalatsa ngati mukukhala pakhoma pa mabenchi a matabwa.
Mtengo ndi wololera ngakhale kuti utumiki ndi wosauka.
Pamene ndikupita kukadya chakudya chamadzulo chabwino, ndimakonda ambiance yabwino komanso chakudya chabwino kwambiri.
Pizza ndi yochititsa mantha, monga momwe zilili pasitala wopangidwa kunyumba.
Chakudya chamasana chinabwera ndi pickels ndi slaw, palibe ndalama zowonjezera.
Ndi zosiyanasiyana kwambiri pa menyu , ndimadya pano nthawi zambiri ndipo sindimatopa .
Awa ndi malo abwino nthawi zonse kudya chakudya chamasana kapena chakudya chamadzulo.
Inde, amagwiritsa ntchito zosakaniza zapamwamba, koma ngakhale zosakaniza zapamwamba sizipanga pizza yabwino pokhapokha wina atadziwa momwe angapezere bwino chigoba.
Ogwira ntchito ndi abwino kwambiri, specjal: mtsikana ameneyo kumbuyo kwa bar, european chic.
O, musalole ngakhale kuti ndiyambe ndi mtengo wa ndalama!
Woperekera chakudya wathu anali bwino, malowa amawoneka bwino m'njira imeneyo osati-kuyesa-yovuta kwambiri, koma pa mitengo imeneyo, pang'ono pang'ono ayenera kuyembekezeredwa chakudya chanu.

Ngakhale kuti mosakayikira mudzakhala pansi patebulo ndi zomwe zikuwoneka ngati malo osakwanira (mosasamala kanthu za kukula kwa phwando lanu), atomosphere yotentha ndi yoyenera malo opanikizika- mudzasangalala ndikuiwala za malo olimba omwe muli nawo.
Panali kuyembekezera kwa nthawi yaitali tebulo kunja, koma kunali kutentha pang'ono kwambiri padzuwa kotero tebulo lathu la insde linali labwino kwambiri.

Pambuyo pa 2 kuyesa kwa woperekera chakudya kuti achotse (sitinayang'ane ngakhale pa izo komabe, tinali ndi mowa wathunthu komabe kumwa), woyang'anira adayandikira ndikutiuza kuti akufunikira tebulo kwa anthu omwe ali ndi zosungitsa.
Kutalitali, pizza yabwino kwambiri ku Manhattan.
Ngakhale kuti malowa ndi aakulu, iwo adzaza pansi ndi matebulo.
Chakudyacho ndi chabwino, makamaka zakudya zawo zofunikira kwambiri, ndipo zakumwazo zimakhala zokoma.
N'chifukwa chiyani anthu rave za ambience.
Chabwino, kotero ma seva amayendayenda mozungulira pang'ono clueless, koma pali ma seva oposa okwanira kwa khamu lomwe amapeza - ndibwino, muyenera kungoyesetsa pang'ono kuti mupeze chidwi chawo.

Timakhala ku New Jersey ndipo nthawi iliyonse tikalowa ku New York City timagula ma bagel kuti tidye kutentha kenako n'kuzizira (anandiuza kuti ndikaitana dongosolo, adzatulutsa ku galimoto kuti ndisayang'ane malo osungirako magalimoto).
Wow pa 100 mowa kusankha.
Pizza inali yabwino kwambiri komanso yaikulu.
Malo ndi achikondi, koma chakudya ndi choopsa, utumiki ndi womvetsa chisoni, ndipo gabriella amanama pa zonse zomwe angathe.
Malo awa ayenera kuti anawononga eni tsoka kuti amange.
Chakudyacho chinkawoneka chokondweretsa kwambiri komanso chokoma popeza chinabwera pa mbale zosiyanasiyana zapamwamba.
Chonde yesani Filet Mignon, its just the most tender piece ever.
Ine ndi mkazi wanga nthawi zonse timasangalala ndi achinyamata, osati nthawi zonse ophunzitsidwa bwino komabe aubwenzi, ogwira ntchito, onse omwe ali ndi nkhani.

Ndinapunthwa pa izi wachiwiri pansi kuyenda-mmwamba Lachisanu awiri apitawo pamene ndinali ndi abwenzi awiri m'tawuni kuchokera LA Kukhala okonda kwambiri sushi, tinakhala pa bar sushi kukhala pafupi ndi zochita.
Tinadabwa kwambiri ndi mmene chakudyacho chinalili chabwino pa ulendo wathu woyamba kuno Lamlungu usiku.
Kwambiri amalangiza izi monga phindu lalikulu kwambiri sushi ndi utumiki.
Osayenera mitengo.
Mukulipira mlengalenga, womwe uli wabwino, koma ukhoza kukhala m'malo ambiri ku Bay Ridge.
Mlengalenga unali wodzaza koma unali waukulu bistro-mtundu vibe.
Mapangidwe ndi mlengalenga ndi zabwino kwambiri.
Makoma obiriwira a puke amasiya zambiri zofunikira, koma chakudyacho ndi chabwino kwambiri.
Utumikiwo unali wofulumira komanso waubwenzi ndipo chakudyacho chinali chokoma kwambiri ndipo anali ndi msuzi wabwino kwambiri wotentha kuti awonjezere chakudya chanu.
Ili kumapeto kwa chipika chokongola.
Ine kokha anayesa mbale yosavuta ya sipinachi ravioli mu mafuta kuwala ndi msuzi adyo, koma kwenikweni faired bwino kuposa ambiri NYC Italy mfundo ndayesa mbale zofanana pa.

Kwenikweni ngakhale, kodi zokometsera zili kuti?

Zizindikiro, menyu apadera, chakudya, ndipo ngakhale waitstaff onse onse KWATHUNTHU Japanese.
Great vinyo kusankha, Gigondas ndi ofunika mtengo, ndi nyumba champagne ndi mtengo waukulu.

Kuchokera ku pulogalamu yoyamikira yophika ya butternut squash ravioli yovuta mu msuzi wokoma wa truffle kupita ku buttery yodabwitsa ndi langostine entree yofewa kupita ku dessert yomwe sindingathe kukumbukira chifukwa cha Cakebread Cabernet yosangalatsa yomwe tinkamwa - madzulo onse anali odabwitsa.
Chomwe chimapangitsa malo odyera awa kukhala apadera ndi kuphika kwenikweni kwa sichuan ndikukhala okhawo ku NYC omwe amapereka chongqing hotpot yeniyeni.
Utumiki unali devine, oysters kumene chilakolako pamene iwo akubwera, ndipo mtengo sangathe kumenyedwa!!
Bambo anga atangonyamula cholembera chake pa chekecho wophika wina anaoneka kuti akutitulutsa.
Koma antchitowo anali oipa kwambiri kwa ife.
Great magulu, kwambiri tsiku, kwambiri brunch oyambirira kapena nightcap.
yesani zokometsera nkhanu appetizer (kachiwiri, osati mtengo waukulu kwambiri padziko lapansi koma woyenera mtengo) ndipo nkhosa vindaloo ndi yaikulu.
Tinali ndi champagne ndi caviar ndipo tinamva ngati akalonga!

Ndiyenera kuchenjeza wowerenga kuti magawo a magawo ndi ochepa kwambiri (makamaka appetizers), kotero ngati mukukonzekera kudya mpaka mutakhuta ndipo simukufuna kulamula menyu yapadera yolawa ya wophika, konzekerani kulamula ndi kulipira appetizer (1 mbale kwa munthu aliyense chifukwa magawo sali ogawana),  entree yaikulu, ndi udon yozizira kumapeto kwa chakudya.
Ndikupangira kwambiri Cafe St. Bart's chakudya chawo, ambience ndi utumiki wodabwitsa.

Ndi zisudzo 2 midadada kutali tinali ndi chakudya chokoma mu chipinda chokongola.
Woyang'anira wanga anapempha appetizers gulu ndi woperekera chakudya anatipatsa osati zimene tinalamula, koma zinthu zina zimene sizinalamule.
Mwina zinali zokometsera pang'ono kwa bwenzi langa, zomwe mungathe kuzidya ndi kudya mpunga wambiri ndi kusunga madzi pa dzanja.
Malowa ndi ochepa kwambiri pa nyimbo zamoyo, kotero pa usiku wa jazz, akhoza kukhala okweza komanso opanikizika.
Kumamatira dimsum, osati wapamwamba overpriced noodles.
Ndinadya clams oreganta ndi saladi zochititsa chidwi ndi nkhaka mwangwiro marinated ndi tomato ndi zambiri nkhanu ndi basil.
